case.state:
Jura is here! And these Earth girls look so overdressed. I'll show them exactly---
{barnette}Uh, Jura...{!reset}
---how to...strip?

It's about time! Now, what surprised await Jura on planet Earth...
{barnette}Jura...!{!reset}
What's up?
...W-wait, why is she---did we walk in the wrong game?

Muhuhu...this planet has no idea what's in store for it! Jura Basil Elden will---eek! B-B-B-Barneeeette!
{barnette}What?
Uh! I-is that---is that it?

Now, Jura will...what's that man doing? Why's he---u-uuhh! O-oh my God, it's---it's shoooowing! We just walked iiiin!
{barnette}J-Jura, it's like---a big cannon!

Jura Basil Elden makes her debut! Ready to stun the competition with---w-what is she doing? Barnette, she's---!
{barnette}Huh?
...Are we late?

This is it! Jura is here, scant and seductive! Earth girls have never seen anything like---um, Barnette. Why is that girl topless?
{barnette}...This must be the wrong table.

I bet we're going to take this place by storm, Barnette...look at how much we're showing already!
{barnette}Jura, I---l-look at how much he's showing!{!reset}
Huh? O-oh!

Jura is here! And all of Earth will know her---uh! ~player~, w-what're you---it's like Bart in the navigation pod...
{barnette}Huh? W-why's he stripping already?

Hmhmhm...a Christmas miracle, in feminine form!
...~player~, it's not even December. Don't tell me Mejare does Christmas differently.
Hoho. Barnette, this planet will absolutely fall in love with us! Look how cute we are---~player~ wanted to see us like this, and it's not even the season for it!
Hmhmhm...a Christmas miracle, in feminine form! And if that's not enough for Earth, she's accompanied by an aproned firebrand...!
Hoho. Barnette, this planet will absolutely fall in love with us! Look how cute we are, dressed for the season!
So, this is where I'll be making my debut! It's about time I won some fans on Earth...ah, look, a schoolgirl's staring already.

Let's see if this Earth is just as hostile to beautiful Mejarian girls.
...Oh, did I capture the schoolgirl's heart just by walking in?
So, this is where I'll be making my debut! It's about time I won some fans on Earth...ah, look, a schoolgirl's staring already.

Let's see if this Earth is just as hostile to beautiful Mejarian girls.
...Oh, did I capture the schoolgirl's heart just by walking in?

Is this the place? Well, it's time to make my illustrious debut on Earth!
...You're Leonie, right? I appreciate any compliments.

The star of the show has arrived---and she's from far beyond the stars.
...Leonie, was it? Well, let's say I used to be noble and still like the look.
Jura Basil Elden, making her debut on her ancestral homeland! I'll win so many adoring fans...and a few enemies, it looks like.

It's time I dazzled the planet we all came from! They'll fall in love with me, I just know it!
...Or just get jealous. Hmph.
Jura Basil Elden, arriving on the scene! Preparing to dazzle this unsuspecting planet of---w-wait, who's the maid-girl? H-how do you know about the Vandreads---?
Ah, here's the place! At last...<hr>{barnette}J-Jura, this girl---I thought we were in a different time! She shouldn't---!{!reset}<hr>I-I know! Hey, who told you about our mechs?

Jura Basil Elden, making her star appearance near what used to be humanity's only star!
...Look at that, I've already attracted attention!
Hmhmhm...this is it, Barnette! The stage for Jura's grand debut! The venue for an elegant performance that'll---get a lecture, apparently.
Strip poker? Well now, someone's forwar---omigosh, that little robot is so cute!
Some strip poker, hm? Why don't I---eek! A little flying robot! It's so adorable!
Hello there, Earthlings---oh my God, what's that thing? It's like a cute little Pyoro with a tube ring!
Strip poker? Well now, someone's---holding an adorable little robo thing! Can I see it, Bunnygirl?
Through time and space, we've arrived! The prettiest girl the galaxy has ever known! And the crew she supports so gallantly...
Is this the spot? We flew a long way here, you know...I won't accept any substitutes!
I'm here! From very far away, and maybe a few centuries in the future. It already looks like it was worth the trip...
From thousands of lightyears away, Jura Basil Elden makes her debut---to play strip poker. That's the best Earth has ever done for me.
Jura Basil Elden has graced planet Earth with her presence! I saw it on the way down---it's almost as pretty as I am.
Ohoho! Jura's finally made it...planet Earth, of the past! They'll just love me here...

Jura's here, so holiday cheer---w-wait, Barneeeette! It's Christmastiiiime!
{barnette}It's Earth! They attacked us last Christmas, you know!

W-wait! Barnette, you're gonna leave Jura alone on Christmas?
{barnette}I'm patrolling! You'll get your present later.{!reset}
Mohhhn...

Uh! L-look, Barnette, they set out a birthday cake for you! You have to play!
{barnette}H-how'd they even know that? I'll come back later...

Barneeeette...don't leave! It's your birthday, you shouldn't have to patrol. I mean---look, this party's for you!
{barnette}T-that's creepy...don't trust that cake!

Jura Basil Elden has arrived, and on her---ohhn, Barnette, stay here! It's my birthdaaay!
{barnette}Do you wanna die on it? Patrol is important! I'll make it up to you later.

N-nooo, Barnette! Where are you going? Can't you stay for Jura's birthday?
{barnette}We need to watch for enemies! I'll give you your present later.{!reset}
Mohhn...

W-wait! Barnette, where are you going? You're not gonna play on your birthday?
{barnette}I-is this my present?{!reset}
Your present comes later...

Barneeette, even if you can't play cards, you shouldn't leave. Jura has to give you your birthday present...
{barnette}I-in front of everyone?

Bar-neeeette, why don't you want to play with us? Don't leave me alone again...
{barnette}We can't all goof off, Jura. Jeez...I'm sounding like Meia.{!reset}

Aww, Barnette, don't wander off! This'll be fun!
{barnette}I don't trust this place, Jura. Stick by Meia and use my comm link if you need me.{!reset}

...Barnette? Heeey, don't go! I want you here with meee!
{barnette}I can't even play cards, Jura...if Meia's not gonna patrol, I will.{!reset}

...Mohhn. Do you have to go, Barnette?
{barnette}You're making a scene, Jura...you hang out with Meia all the time, anyway!{!reset}

...Aahhn, Barnette, stay here! You're gonna end up shooting someone!
{barnette}I'll be around, Jura. Jeez, what is Meia doing on the away team?{!reset}

Bathe in the beautiful glow of our---huh? Nooo, Barnette, you're leaving?
{barnette}Well, someone talked Meia into playing. That means I'm on patrol.{!reset}

Wha---Barneeeette! Don't you wanna watch my elegant strip show?
{barnette}Well, apparently Meia does! I brought the camera for when it's time.{!reset}

B-Barnette! Don't you love me when I'm at my sexiest? What're you running off for?
{barnette}To keep you two safe! Remember what Earth's capable of.{!reset}

...Y-you have to come back later, alright, Barnette? You have to film Jura's beautiful naked body!
{barnette}D-don't shout! Just follow Meia's lead for now...

Are you sure you want to leave, Barnette? Meia's going to be ogling your Jura...
{barnette}D-don't make fun! I'll be right nearby.{!reset}
Mohhn...

Bar-neeette, Jura's big breasts and sexy hips are normally all yours...aren't you a little jealous of Meia?
{barnette}W-why would I be? Just stay put!{!reset}

Bar-neeeette, why don't you want to play with us? Don't leave me alone again...
{barnette}We can't all goof off, Jura. Just call if you need me.{!reset}

Aww, Barnette, don't wander off! This'll be fun!
{barnette}I don't trust this place, Jura. You shouldn't, either. I'll have my comm link on me.{!reset}

...Barnette? Heeey, don't go! I want you here with meee!
{barnette}I can't even play cards, Jura...and we need someone patrolling!{!reset}

...Mohhn. Do you have to go, Barnette?
{barnette}You're making a scene, Jura...I'll be watching your back, like always.{!reset}

...Aahhn, Barnette, stay here! You're gonna end up shooting someone!
{barnette}I'll be around, Jura. And I'm sure Earth will pick any fights!{!reset}

Bathe in the beautiful glow of our---huh? Nooo, Barnette, stay with me! We're not here to fight!
{barnette}And I'm not here to strip, Jura. I'm on guard duty...{!reset}

Wha---Barneeeette! Don't you wanna watch my elegant strip show?
{barnette}Someone's got to patrol, Jura! I brought the camera for when it's time.{!reset}

B-Barnette! Don't you love me when I'm at my sexiest? What're you running off for?
{barnette}To keep you safe! Remember what planet we're on.{!reset}

...Y-you have to come back later, alright, Barnette? You have to film Jura's beautiful naked body!
{barnette}D-don't shout! Yeah, I will, don't worry...

Are you sure you want to leave, Barnette? All these Earthlings ogling your Jura...
{barnette}D-don't make fun! I'll be right nearby.{!reset}
Mohhn...

Bar-neeette, Jura's big breasts and sexy hips are normally all yours...now you're going to leave me alone with Earthlings?
{barnette}I-I'm watching for enemies!{!reset}
There you are, Meia. What's with you not leading the pack?
Jura here. Meia's at the table now, and I think it's getting started soon...
Oh, good. I was worried you'd strike out on your own, Meia. Always scouting ahead...
Update: waiting on---oh, here she comes. We're both ready for the game to start...
Here comes our fearless leader! Crewmates should stick together.
Meia! I was beginning to think you wandered off. But there's no way you would miss my dazzling performance!
Aaaahnn! A birthday party for me? Jura? You shouldn't haaaave! Meia, did you tell them?
Jura here. We're at a little---birthday party? O-oh my God, it's for me! Hold on---oh, come on, Meia, this must've been you---!
I-is this---aaahnnn, don't play dumb, Meia. You told them, right? That it was my birthday today? I love cake...
W-what is---ohhhn! Meia, you arranged all this, right? For your favorite deputy? A whole party and a cake?
Aaahn! Meia, you went out of your way to tell the owners? August 31st, my birthday! You all still get the best gift, though---once the game begins.
Huh? H-hey, I know you don't like it, Meia. I wouldn't tell a bunch of strangers---!
Jura here. Meia and I are---w-wait, is that a birthday cake? I swear I didn't say anything! I know how you get---!
H-have a little more faith in me, Meia! It's one thing when we throw you a party. They must've done their homework---!

This wasn't me, I swear. I guess they're just good hosts---or think they are.
...Well, at least eat some cake.

I-I had no idea about this!
...Our party for you is waiting back on the ship.
...Um, this little birthday cake isn't for Meia Gisborn, right? She's here today, somewhere---but she really doesn't like the fuss.
Jura here. I'm, uh---I-I think they assumed you'd be with me, Meia. There's a---birthday cake.
...Wait a minute, is this party for Meia Gisborn? Short blue hair, white suit, stern look? I appreciate the thought, but---she wouldn't.

Did you set this up for my team leader? She's off at another game.
...No, it's June 10th, it's just---birthdays aren't her thing.
Mohhn...no one is touching that cake, got it? It's Barnette's birthday, October 4th! And Jura will feed her the first slice!
...Everyone better play nice today! Don't ruin the cake, or the party, or anything! Jura can't accept that on Barnette's big day!
Aaaahnn! A birthday party for me? Jura? You shouldn't haaaave!
Jura here. We're at a little---birthday party? O-oh my God, it's for me! Hold on, there's even a cake---!
I-is this---aaahnnn, what wonderful hosts! You knew it was my birthday today? I love cake...
W-what is---ohhhn! You knew it was Jura's birthday today! And I get a whole party and a cake?
The owners did their homework, huh? August 31st, my birthday! You all still get the best gift, though---once the game begins.
Jura reporting. Everyone's filing in...I'm with Meia, waiting on the game start...
...So are we underway, or what?
Hohhn...Jura can't wait to get started.
And who are these new people coming in...?
...Come in. Pyoro, this is Jura's line...can the bridge hear me?
Hmhm...this'll be great, I just know it.
I see I'm attracting some more tablemates.
Meia, take a look at the newcomer...
Some of the people coming through...I'm glad we stuck together. There's even men about.
People just can't resist the exotic beacon of Mejarian beauty.
Jura reporting. Everyone's filing in...I think we'll be starting soon.
...So are we underway, or what?
Hohhn...Jura can't wait to get started.
And who are these new people coming in...?
...Come in. Pyoro, this is Jura's line...can the bridge hear me?
Hmhm...this'll be great, I just know it.

Meia?
...Everything looks good on my end. No attacks just yet...
Meia must have struck out on her own...as she tends to do.
I see I'm attracting some more tablemates.
~name~, have you seen my crewmate? A bit shorter than me, blue hair---a tight suit, and a mean look on her face...
This is Jura. "The Inventory" looks pretty classy...I was worried they didn't bother to clean.
I like the look of this place! Well-kept and very elegant. And not too bright!
This is just like how I decorate my room! Nice soft reds and browns, lots of cushioning...and some sensual lighting.
Hmmn, I wonder if they serve food around here...I can't fly back drunk.
The early arrival's barely said a thing. Have I left you speechless already, ~player~?
Just what do they have an inventory of here? Hmmmn, Jura will find out...
This is a throwback. I wasn't here for quite as long as Meia, but still.
I can't believe this used to be enough for us. Look how shabby the stage is! No furniture, no lighting.
The Inventory's done a good job renovating, hasn't it? This little stage would never be able to hold us all now.
Ohhn, it's weird how quickly we adapt to upgrades. Playing here is like trying to fly my old Dread.
Jura here...hey, why am I on the old default? It shouldn't have been that kind of time warp.
Ohhh, so who's the birthday girl? Come on, I'll give you a big kiss.
Jura here. We're at a little---birthday party? It's outside! No one's claimed the cake...
Hey, don't be shy, you people. If no one wants this cake, I'll eat it.
Ohh, wow. If I knew we'd be playing here, I'd have brought the whole crew along! Our ship's got a bath, too.
Jura here. They're going all out for this game room---it's a hot spring! Now I just want to relax in it.
We're playing by a hot spring? I love the way it opens up my pores---but does it boost my hormones, like back home?
Ooh, our whole crew should've come. They'd love the hot spring, and you'd love the view.
This is Jura. "The Inventory" is outside! A little bar right on a beach. I should go see what "sand" feels like between my toes.
Mohhn, did they really have to put us in front of the bar? I've been trying to drink less.
It's hot on Earth! Good thing I'll be slipping out of this soon.
Ahaha...I'm already sweating. This is a lot different from a spaceship!
Thank God they put us in the shade. It's hot under your Sun! Nothing but the atmosphere between us...
This is Jura. We're playing in a---shower room? Not that I'd mind freshening up.
Are we really playing here? Well...I do look just as good wet.

I know we might be touching ourselves, but just how dirty is this going to get?
...How dirty is the floor?
Ohhh, I get it. They want to make sure we're nice and clean before we start? It might ruin the tease, though.
This is Jura. We've arrived at the game room, and there's---a bed? Um, I'll report back once I see what this is about...
Uhhm...this is poker we're playing, right? We're not in the brothel section?
Heeey, where have you taken me? I know, I'm so beautiful, but you can't just lead me straight to the bed!
I thought we were touching ourselves tonight, not each other. Why the bed?
Ohhhn, the moon's so big. Hey, what's it like having a moon? It looks like a gray Tarak.
It's weird actually being on a planet's surface. All you see on Mejare's fleet ships is space---kind of like now, at night.
W-what's up with this place? Is the hologram computer just making fun of us? Turn it to something clean!
Ew, ew, ew! Ugh, what kind of theme is this? "Starving street rats dirty themselves"?
Eugh, this reminds of me of what I've heard about Mejare's slums. Girls living in shut-down sections off scraps and generators...
This is Jura. My game room's really weird...it's got a bunch of arcade machines! It's been so long, my first thought was our flight sims...
Hmmn...there's too many old machines buzzing in here. I can feel all the static in the air.
Is this a museum tour of men's weapons or something? Really old weapons, too---not even any guns!
This a weird place to play strip poker. What's with all the old weapons? I know I've got a sword, but that doesn't mean I want to duel.
Uhh...interesting theme for the play room. It kind of reminds me of my old fencing classes...
Are we on a historical tour before the game starts? If we go a little more modern, Barnette would love a room full of rifles.
Don't ask me why the men didn't go closer to...twentieth century or so for those Vanguard weapons. No, it's all knives and axes like these...
What an elegant-looking couch back there! Once we're all naked, we should take a group photo!
Aahhn, Earth's moon is so big and bright. Half the time, all we have to look out at on Mejare is Tarak. Dusty reddish-brown...
This place could sure use more decoration. I like what's here, but look how barren it is! You don't visit a mansion for minimalism.
Look how far out the night sky goes...but it's hard to see the stars! A lot of Mejare's living districts had too many lights on, just like here.
Ohhhn, a bath! That's just what I was hoping for, to relax after the game! I don't care who walks in!
So are we all climbing into the bath after the game? It's a chance to wash off, set my hair right...and really drink in the view.
You couldn't resist the bath either, huh, ~name~? Why, why would you? It's one of a girl's greatest pleasures.
This is Jura. They brought us to play in a bathhouse, of all things! I'm not sure why they bothered with the cards.
The beach here---it's so beautiful! I wanna throw my clothes off right now and feel the waves on my feet!
Haah...hoo. I'm baking in Earth's Sun over here! And I thought 28 degrees was bad when our air conditioning broke...
Hey, ~name~, do you play here all the time? You should really appreciate this! There's no ocean where I'm from.
This is Jura. We're on one of Earth's beaches! Somehow, I'm overdressed...
I probably should've gotten a better look at Anpathos's ocean...Jura was too busy sulking. But why shouldn't she have sulked...?
You've come to a late game, ~name~. You've probably never had to rely on clocks to know what time it is.
Jura here. Maybe we shouldn't have landed while it was dark..."the Inventory" plays its games outside, apparently!
Uhh...when I heard our game was at night, I thought it meant---at night inside. Like, a bar? We'll get dirty!
Oooh, there's animals skittering around. And bats overhead...and my boots are dirty! What kind of a game space is this?
Isn't this city pretty close to Switzerland? I think my family's from there.

Look how big your moon is in the sky!
...Enjoy it while it lasts.
Is that a little mat for lovers to lie on? I'll be sure win the game, then, and claim it...
Nirvana, this is Jura. We're playing outside, on a rooftop! The buildings aren't too tall...how old is this town?
Are you from around here, ~name~? It is pretty romantic...there's even a river running through!
I think I get it. Whoever wins sits on the throne for a victory photo. And they'll give a full-frontal view, right?
Ohhhnn..."Princess Jura." Princess Elden! With an elegant, tailored dress, hugging all my curves...and thousands of adoring subjects!
Is this the closest you've been to royalty, ~name~? They certainly won't let me anywhere near the Grand Ma.
This is Jura. I don't know why, but they brought us in front of a throne. Is there going to be an Earth queen watching...?
...Hey, are those coins what Earth money looks like?
I don't what the throne is all about, but if you want to make me your queen, I understand...and I accept.
Doesn't a sword fit a queen better than that spear? Either way, I'm a big fan of shields. I could cover myself with it!
W-why are we in front of a brick wall? That's something the imperial guard would do with us.
Oh, someone else. ~name~, do you know when we're heading to the play room? It's weird just standing by a brick wall.
Jura here. I think "the Inventory" is older than we thought. It's made out of---brick? It's so stuffy, my hair'll start fraying...
...What a attractive location. Don't take us anywhere smooth or anything...
I wasn't paying much attention in school before all the accidents happened...I was queen, OK? Everyone wanted to be my girlfriend.

Are we really playing in a schoolhouse?
...Well, some things never change, I guess. We had math and reading, too...
I was more of a humanities girl than math or science. I loved all the romantic stories of elegance and adventure...
Nirvana, this is Jura. I think we got bad intel. This isn't a bar, it's a---school, or something! Maybe they'll teach us about sex?
If this is a seminar about sex, I have to say, I'm interested. Who knows what you get up to with men in the picture...
Ohhhn, I just know it. Some pounding nightclub would give me a headache. Even this hologram is doing it.
I was a little too young to go into nightclubs before all the---accidents happened. I'd hate it for sure, though. No one would focus on me!
W-what kind of projection is this? A nightclub...full of weird dirty people. Nothing elegant about it...
Is this hologram supposed to make us feel naughty? I already signed up to strip. I'd prefer to do it in a nice, classy room...

Nirvana, this is Jura. This era has computers...to make themed rooms for us to play in!
...But it doesn't look very advanced.
Sheesh...I shouldn't even bother standing up straight. Just look at the background!
...Oh, no. Who am I going to be playing with? And what am I doing with them? I'm not a joke!
Jura here. I thought I was being taken to the Inventory, but---oh, for God's sake. "Da Invuntry"? It's an April Fool's game!
H-hey, what's your problem, ~player~? Jura takes herself very seriously! And so should you!
Oh, this looks a little like my room when I was younger...like, nine or ten, maybe? Then I started getting into sports, and then puberty hit...
W-whose bed is this? Don't think I'll just climb in with one of you. Jura isn't so easy...
Jura here. They put a lot of effort into these theme rooms! We're playing in some---well, it looks like a girl's bedroom. Complete with stuffed animal.
Ohhn, we can't see much of the moon outside! I'll have to take my Dread up later.
This is a nice little garden! It's lit up like we're the shining stars at the city center...
Ahhn, all these plants are so relaxing. Maybe I should take Barnette to the Biopark for a romantic date night...
Jura here. I thought we'd be playing inside, but there's a little fenced-off terrace at the back! And a big city surrounding us...
Oh, is the Sun setting? I want to see! I can just about peer over the fence, but then there's all the buildings in the way...
Isn't this pretty, ~name~? I bet you Earth people take greenery for granted. Back home, we only have it like this, in city gardens.
...A green screen? Please tell me this is being filmed! Please tell Jura! Tell her the whole planet will see her beauty in action...
Is this where the computer projects all the theme backdrops? You could just do some actual decorating, you know...
...Bridge? Can you scan for any broadcast signals? From my location, yeah...just curious.

O-oh my God, is this being broadcasted? To all of Earth?
...Make sure you don't key out Jura's eyes!

Do we really need all this space to play poker? I'm sure you could take us to one of the rooms.
...Classrooms.
...Who's that girl peeking through the window? Was she invited here?
This is Jura...did anyone hear that the Inventory was school-themed? We're being led to a classroom to play...but we seem to have stopped in the hall...
Hey, ~name~, do you know what's going on? This is just a big corridor. Is there going to be a seminar?
There's a big crystal tree in Mejare's grand square, but you don't see a whole lot of thick ones like this otherwise...are they making faces?
Oooh...why are there all these ghosts flying around? It's bad enough being all cold and dirty...

Bridge, make sure you monitor Jura's location closely, alright?
...I know, I'm just---worried I might get, uhm...possessed.
...Um, do we have to play outside? In the dirt? Plus, I think it's---h-haunted!
God knows what Earth is up to make a forest filled with ghosts. Maybe they're already sacrificing people to the Paksis---!
...~name~, you didn't decide to play here, did you? I feel like we all got herded outside...what gives? Is it so the fog keeps us modest?
Wow, real-life snow for Christmas! Jura has only ever seen fake snow from machines...and the lovely sculptures they make!
Are all these presents for Jura? I hope they're pretty clothes...at least give me one of those cocoa mugs before we start!
This is Jura...they're celebrating Christmas down here! There's a tree, a fireplace...a real snowstorm! Oh, "~name~" just walked in...
So Christmas on Earth goes back a long way. We learned it from somewhere.
You're not half bad with the Christmas decoration! As the leader of our Christmas event planning team...Jura approves.
Wow, it's really pretty out here. This is what Earth's surface was like? I don't know how you brought yourselves to ruin it.
This is Jura. They've brought us outside to a pretty lake in a clearing...we should really take a full tour up in the Dreads!
Hey, ~name~, do people swim in the water here? It looks clean, but anything besides a pool just seems dirty...
I never actually lived on Mejare's surface. So this is what they were trying to terraform it into...
Hmm...it does feel refreshing down here, but I think I still prefer a ship. No wind messing up my hair, no dirt scuffing my boots...
Personally, I was hoping to see what a beach looked like. Isn't that a better place to strip?
All these books! I never read too much...not that I didn't keep busy in school.
This is Jura. I've been taken to---I guess it's the reading room. Poker is a game of the mind...
Is this the owner's study or something? I like the decoration---nice earthy reds and browns are so elegant.
Mm, it's pleasantly cool in here. Maybe I can even find a few books on men to claim...and failing that, Barnette will love an old gun manual...

Is there a girl in that locker?
...Oh, it's just a doll. I remember when some jealous types tried to shove me in one...muhuhu...but they were the ones who fit.
Jura here. I think we're in a changing room before the game starts...but what kind of sense does that make? We'll be "changing" out of everything...
Oh, is there a locker with my name on it? Of course there is. Management must have heard about my glorious arrival---!
Good, a place to store our things. This dress is my prettiest and most functional. Do you understand? Jura can't imagine losing it!
If we're being led to showers after this, I can see that being fun...if it's a gym, I can pass for today.
Watch out, ~name~---locker rooms allll over my living district still quake in fear of Jura Basil Elden. She'll beat you on the court and then pounce on you afterward...
Is this a---school library? Not exactly what I had pictured...you know, fancy drinks, cushioned seats? Dim lights?
Bridge, are you sure you got the right location? We're circled up, but this seems more like a book club meeting...

case.state: Meia tells us that if we ask, Elf-girl. Maybe if my belly started to poke out my neckline, she'd crack the whip---and I'd deserve it.

...What are you blubbering at her for, Miss Jessie? You're not that old! Defend yourself!
...What, you want to let her hear you beg, Miss Jessie? Don't give her the satisfaction! If it were me, I'd---I'd kill her!
...Oh, God, she's crying now. This has put an awful air over the whole game. If those were my breasts, well...I wouldn't waste time with tears, I'll say that.
Just what I wanted from a friendly poker game on Earth, a magical jealous psycho holding all our breasts hostage. You cast that spell on me, and it'll be your last.
God, imagine if I showed up on the ship with an A-cup. Barnette would leave me! Well, don't think you've intimidated me by going after the old lady, you hear?
Oh, were you staring at us, Pit? I'm sorry---I gave you a rear view of Natsuki, but not of myself...
La-la! Oh, Pit, you seem a bit googly-eyed after my embrace of little Natsuki! I'd hate to disappoint you...
Oooh, Pit, I see the faces you're making. Is that what men like---women pressing against each other? Or maybe a rear view?
Oh, have I finally made headway in seducing a man? Little Angel Boy liked seeing Natsuki smushed in my chest---how's my butt look, hm?
Oh, did putting Natsuki's adorable little behind on display catch your eye, Mr. Angel? Here, let me show you a real woman's backside...
Are you sure you're an adult, Natsuki? Sayori here has the more typical signs---you know, like breasts.
Forgive me for thinking you're a child, Natsuki. Next to your classmate, your lack of...well, anything sort of stands out.
Can you blame me for being confused, Natsuki? I mean, your friend here actually has breasts. And hips. You know, womanly things.
Can you get your little Pint-sized classmate to pipe down, Sayori? Or at least eat something, because she sure doesn't have adult measurements.
Hey, what's with the school field trip? Are you two taking the evening off getting to know each other?
Hey, are you two sure this is how you want to start your relationship? Wasn't there a nice bench on the schoolyard to talk things over?
Hey now, this Mejarian knows a date when she see one. You two are even wearing matching uniforms!
You Earth schoolgirls sure are forward with your first dates. Barnette and I just had a dinner together our first night!
Pfft! Don't deny it, Natsuki. A Mejarian knows a woman's love when she sees it, and you keep staring at Monika's waist.
Deny, deny, deny, right, Natsuki? Monika's got some nice hips---you don't need to justify yourself to me.
So how'd you two lovebirds meet, Natsuki? Yeah, I know you denied it, but I see the way you stare longingly at her hips.
Opposites attract, Natsuki---Monika's got the measurements you lack. I don't blame you for going after her.
So what's with your friend, Bright-Eyes? You've got some nice hips, but she looks like a little kid.
Why's your miniature classmate here with you, Sayori? Your figure's fine---you don't need her around to make you look like an adult.
Worried we would think you're too young, Sayori? I can't imagine why else you'd drag along your twelve-your-old classmate.
Hey, Schoolgirl. The tall one with a naive look in your eye. Tell your little friend to beat it---this place is adults-only.
Hello, Earthlings! Today is a very special day---yes, Mejarians are gracing your planet, but it's also my crewmate's birthday!
Hi there. Jura Basil Elden, and blue-hair-over-there is Meia Gisborn. Meia Gisborn the Birthday Girl!
Beauties of planet Mejare, hitting the scene! And it's a very special day for one of us...come on, Meia, tell them! They won't throw you a party, I promise.
It's a very special day today, Earthlings! I mean, besides your first encounters with Mejarian beauty. It's my scowling team leader's birthday!
I see those glasses don't do you much good. If you actually read books, you'd know alien just means "foreigner."
Check out the brainiac Earth girl, Meia. All those books she claims to read and she thinks "alien" just means scary monsters.
My, what a xenophobic little Earth runt we have on our hands, Boss. She doesn't even know how broad the definition of "alien" can be.
Is Earth really so nasty that it calls its colonists aliens? Or is this just you being a know-it-all without understanding what "alien" means?
Oh my gosh, you're such a naive little thing! Listen, Mejarians aren't shy about nudity. That, and the Nirvana doesn't exactly have private showers for us all.
I figured Earth girls were naive, but wow. You think we haven't seen each other naked?
Hey, shared nudity is the least of our concerns. It's more likely you Earthlings are going to harvest our organs...that's what we know you for.
Elizabeth, look. Once you've killed your fair share of soldiers together, seeing each other naked is as exciting an afternoon nap.
Hey, where does a shrimpy little bookworm get off calling me a bad pilot? I happen to be Meia's second-in-command.
Bold of you to judge my piloting skills, Miss Library. I'm second-in-command on our ship---that's how good I am.
Maybe a jealous little gremlin like you wouldn't believe it, but women can be beautiful and smart. I'm the secondary squadron commander.
Oh, sure, claim I'm a lousy pilot because I take care of my appearance. The typical play of the ugly and envious---I happen to be Meia's trusted second officer.

Meiaaa, you're being so naughty!
...Hey, I get it. Maybe I should do it, too!
Mhmhm...feeling sexy, Meia? Welcome to my world...and I can't let you upstage me!

Meiaaa, you're being so naughty!
...Hey, I get it.

You know, you should do something nice for our guests. There might be some hard feelings about your "emergency underwear."
They already saw you bare-naked for a bit earlier. You'd better up the ante...and do something dirty.
You know what? I think you're right. I remember when we first captured the men, and Dita was just the crazy UFO girl. Now she's a social darling.
That's true. We used to get on each other's nerves all the time...we all made fun of Dita's alien obsession, but by the end we were all rooting for her!

...And you're not the only one! It might make a good inroad...

...Well, that's the nice formal explanation Meia just gave you. But really, Cynthia, shouldn't you be pleased that I rock your aesthetic across the galaxy?
What, Cynthia, are you afraid that people will come to associate your blonde-in-black aesthetic with me instead? Anyway, Meia gave you the official reason.
Meia said it all. We're not the stuffy Mejarian imperials---even when a woman goes into battle, she should bring her own style! Or your style, apparently.
Who's to say I wear this dress when I'm piloting in the first place? I do, but what are you implying---I only have one outfit?
That's quite the assumption that I wear the same dress for both piloting and strip poker. I have other outfits---like my pajamas.
When did I say I flew in this dress, anyway? I think she's looking down on us, Meia. "Oh, they're pirates, they must wear the same outfit for everything!" ...Well, I do.
How pathetic can you get? The young woman with the sword scared you off, so you pick on the senior citizen? Well, I hope you're proud of yourself---she's just blubbering about it.
I guess you figure you could outrun an old lady's fists better than a trained pilot's sword. Not that she seems interested in defending herself, the sobbing wreck.

...So are you going to grow her breasts back or not? This is longer than mine went for.
...Jessie, stop crying! If I only had my fists, I still would've come after her!
...Are you crying? Stand up for yourself, Jessie! It's a matter of woman's honor---she changed mine back because I didn't let her get away with it!
...Miko, did you say something about arranged marriages? That's the realm of the really uppity families on Mejare. Political bigwigs just looking to merge accounts.
"Arranged marriages" are a little primitive, don't you think, Miko? You only get that on Mejare from weird super-rich families who marry for political reasons.
...Hey, Ayano. What did you say about "removing his other options"? I wasn't talking about any man in particular, you know.
...Whatever you said about "eliminating the opposition" sounded really creepy, Ayano. I was talking about men in general, not your schoolyard crush.
Who do you take me for, Potato-head? If I have something to say, I say it. For instance: people will think I'm hanging around you to look better.

...Now, are you really uninterested, Leonie, or just inexperienced? I have a feeling Meia falls into the latter category, even if she'd claim otherwise.
Twenty-one today. I really thought I'd be married by now, but---well, I thought a lot of things.
I guess I didn't say, right? This is my twenty-first birthday. I'm gonna have to get married soon!

Kumatora? I have a lot of friends on our ship.
...But even if we're not showy about it, I think we're pretty close, Meia.
You knooow, the "Magno's Family Best Friends" award always goes to girls like Amarone and Bel. But, Meiaaaa...I think we're a real sleeper pick.

I think I'm feeling yours and mine put together...it couldn't be that schoolgirl, could it? Maybe she's another esper kid---!
H-hey, Meia, are you OK? I mean---do you feel anything? Maybe another vision coming on?

...N-no, I'm OK, it's just---you know. That foreboding.
Hahaha! Don't you think it's kind of cute, Meia? Maybe he's not as lecherous as your typical man!

Oh, he's just shy, Meia. I guess the shrinking-violet types exist among men, too---who knew?
Hey now, maybe we've only met the daring military sorts that men have to offer. Dust here must not be able to handle the thought of so many girls!
Hahahahaha! That's the story Meia will spin you, but she's just curious about those dangling male tubes like I am!
Oh, is that the official recon report you'll be telling the captain? Can't you just say this is a "male anatomy expedition study"?
I have a very happy relationship with Barnette, Miss Jessie, and only Barnette. Meia and I are just a little curious about men, that's all.
Trying to invite Barnette here would've been so awkward. Meia won't tell the crew---plus, she wants to see a nude man, too.
I can always count on my fearless leader to protect me---and keep it quiet, too. But don't let her tell you she's not interested in men.
Can you believe ~player~ is so bold? Well, come on, then...I could always use another mugshot.

Oh my God, Meia, it is an aura camera. Where did you even get that?
...And what are you waiting for?
Uh---! Y-yes, by all means, check someone else! I hope you realize she'll really do it, Alice! And she'll abuse yours, too!
I hope you're---not just teasing, Miss Monster, because she'll do it! And she'll squeeze them so hard, they hurt!

Ugh, whatever it takes to get Revy's awful hands away from me. Your breasts are even bigger, Alice, and she'll nearly pull them off.
W-what? Of course my breasts are real! I am the pinnacle of Mejarian beauty, not some sliced-up has-been!
I told you they were real! Why would I lie about that? I'm proud to represent my planet's beauty, thank you!
Hmph! As if my breasts' genuine nature was ever in any doubt. You and Shrimpy should both learn how gorgeous Mejarians are!
I'm surprised you could conclude anything by just squeezing and pulling them like that---but yes, they're real! And they're my planet's pride!

...Uggh! I can't believe I was violated by some horrible Earth woman. ...Violated, Cynthia! If you'd rather have her, by all means, take her!

...Nothing about that made me feel warm inside, Cynthia! My body was defiled!
Get off! Ugh! You're so rough! ...Oh, very funny, Cynthia, as if I wanted that! Why don't you let her try to pull your breasts off your chest for a while?
Get off---! Hagh! Revy! Where do you get the nerve to grope me like that? Especially all rough...don't make light of this, Lyralei! I'm sensitive!

Y-you---how dare you! I'm twenty years old, you skank! Perhaps you should learn a few things about paying compliments if you want friends so badly!

Hey, Aqua, if you really want something, you make time for it. Don't make excuses!
I'm not just anyone! Ugh, what're you looking down on me for? I at least deserve a real reason!

Ugh, you're so annoying! You were supposed to do it too, you idiot!
Get out of my way! Haven't you heard of joining in instead of trying to ruin it?
