Ah. I guess I should have figured the girl who can't speak her mind is a virgin. All those feelings you have for her---imagine being able to express them for real, physically. That's all it is.
Ah---zero experience. Well, you know what romantic tension feels like, don't you? The anxiety, the cautious glances---you just let it all spill over in a wave of catharsis.
...You haven't been with a man, either, have you? Well, think about all the uncertainty you feel. "Does she really love me?" Once it moves to your bodies, you finally know.
Oh, Duero doesn't pay me much mind, unfortunately. He's smitten with our chief engineer Parfet, even if he's too stoic to admit it.
Duero's not quite talkative enough for my tastes. All he does is give me painkillers and send me on my way with a stoic frown---he's more into geeks than daring pilots.
Well, he dutifully treats my wounds and such, but he's just not the social type. Besides, I think he has more of a thing our chief engineer.
Duero's what you might call the strong, silent type. Tall, handsome, intelligent---but good luck prying him away from his work if you're not our engineer.
I don't know that many, you know. I think it just comes down to exoticism. A reversal of everything feminine, yet still somehow human---so I guess the "handsome" types?
You ask such good questions for a girl who can't speak! Men almost seem like inverted women, you know? So stiff and angular---it's exotic. But I like some refinement.
I'm not quite sure---all men just seem new and intriguing. Maybe with time I'll fall into the same patterns you Earth girls do, but right now I enjoy some handsome charm.
Well, I've only seen our three prisoners up close for long, and they're each pretty different. I know some men get pretty dirty or ugly---I like handsomeness, cleanliness.
Why, thank you. Barnette impresses all by herself---she's just a lot smaller and angrier. In any case, we're quite happy together.
Yes, she's very happy with me, and I with her. She's not quite as statuesque as I am, but she's got a thinner waist---she's a tight little bundle of fury.
This might be the first time I've left a girl speechless in the written form. Barnette has a nice figure herself, but she's shorter and cuter---not to mention tougher.
She's like my little gunslinging bodyguard---smaller bust, thinner waist, shorter hair, tougher beauty.
That sounds awfully messy. The throes of passion don't seem like the ideal time for family planning, either. Are you just making fun of me?
So, the "natural" couple combines the clinical with the passionate? I suppose you set the family budget while you're making love, as well. Men...
Is that how you're supposed to get their seed? I figured you worked the tube with your hands or something. You must pick your men carefully before heading to bed!
Is that why they're called "sex cells"? So men and women can have children without the aid of a machine. Sex doesn't always coincide with good decisions, you know.
Would you like me to put on one of our raid suits, then? I can survive in the vacuum of space with that on, but it makes me look like a chubby demon.
A simple little combat dress doesn't need tech. Don't get me wrong, we have some--- but bulky spacesuits and masks aren't what you'd call elegant.
Now you're coming to understand my world's fashion sense. Practical without sacrificing elegance! And my legs are so comfortable.
It's really the ultimate combination, don't you think? Snug, supportive, and comfortable---yet refined, elegant, and deadly.
Is that still a style on this planet? With all your extreme seasons, I was worried you'd all have fur where your womanhood is supposed to be.
Oh, did shaving get its start on Earth, even with those nasty winters I hear about? As far as I'm concerned, hair just gets in the way sometimes.
Oh, I'm not offended. You know, it sounds like there's a girl back home you have on your mind, and you're looking for some validation.
Perhaps you use childish teasing to project your own feelings. Is there a computer game-loving girl on Planeptune I should know about?
..."Les slang"? I was talking about my home planet. I traveled a long way here to visit where my ancestors came from.
The combination of stunning beauty and mortal terror is absolutely divine, don't you thi---hm? I wasn't using slang. What are you talking about?
It's not cloning, it's a combination! You see, the Oma donates an egg for half the DNA, and the Fama is impregnated, providing the other half. Marvelous, isn't it?
I think I heard that cloning was all they could manage in the early days, but now, we combine the genes of two eggs. We don't all look the same!
No, no, no, you're thinking too hard about all this! It's DNA from both mothers---we're not grown in some dingy test tube, like the men are.

condition.saying: The Chazz is one of the greatest men around

case.state: I see. I hope you'll show me how much fun the men of this planet can be, because I haven't had good first impressions of Earth.
Is that so? Earth has proven to be quite nasty to the Mejarian people in the past, but maybe you'll help me overlook that.

condition.saying: I have pictures I can show you

case.state: No, that's alright. Barnette tells me she won some marksmanship trophies as a girl, but I'm swept off my feet when I see her in action.
Don't worry about it---I prefer seeing action. My Barnette is much more breathtaking with a gun on a mission than at the target range.

condition.saying: you had better learn Duel Monsters

case.state: I haven't seen anyone else with one of those things, so I think you're lying to me. I don't intend to stay on this planet, anyway.
You know, it's really very rude to try to take advantage of the foreign girl by lying to her. Why are you the only one I've seen with a Duel Disk if it's so popular?
See, that's more like it! I love getting compliments. That said, my current job as a Dread pilot is probably more exciting.
I seem to excel at everything I try, all the way up to piloting an advanced Dread fighter. I'm sure I could be a good duelist, as well---thanks for saying so.

condition.saying: Why keep those tits on your home planet

case.state: I'm not a stripper, you know, even if I'm currently stripping. Any trashy girl can spread her legs onstage---I should be modeling as the perfect female form.
I'd like to do a little better for myself than just a showgirl for lecherous Earth men. You know, like modeling---something more elegant and befitting my beauty.

condition.saying: I could be your tag duel partner if you wanted

case.state: I'll pass. I already have a partner to engage in any nudism with if the mood strikes us.
I already have a Dread partner. Nudism is optional, but we do take that option quite a bit.
It's good to know my attitude stands out even among men. I wouldn't have thought you had any sense of modesty a year ago.
So my cavalier attitude strikes you as much as it does women, does it? I always pictured men as hairy naked beasts, and here you are, worried about covering up.
It's funny how most Mejarians shriek and cover themselves when they barely wear any clothes to begin with. I never thought men might do the same.
Oh, we don't deal in money too much. Our captain seems like she's against it...but the Mejarian ships we capture are often quite well-furnished.
Maybe it's the old priestess in her, but our captain seems to shy away from money. A lot of those fancy things were already on ships we captured.
Hey, even Imperials are just girls who want to be pampered. We got our jacuzzi from a Mejarian Border Guard ship---better that than paying for it, our captain says.
Are you going to be flattering me all game? Maybe all I needed to get this treatment from men was zip myself up back into one of those things.
Well, I did wear them early on as a recruit, and the stares I got...kind of like yours. Maybe that's why I haven't gotten men's attention---my dress is too conservative.
Oh, does the mental image of me in a flightsuit suddenly inspire flattery? Maybe I'll dig my rookie one out of storage and finally catch our prisoners' eyes.
On my homeworld, men are very much that. Have I not introduced myself loud enough for you to hear?
My home planet would tell you they're an exotic species of subhumans, and filled with bacteria. You're not taking me seriously, are you?
Mhmhmhm. That's what I hear from new recruits.
I know. Perhaps you're normally less scatterbrained.
Well, I wouldn't want to lure in someone without the patience to wait for a good thing, now would I?
Bait and switches. As if there isn't plenty enough of me on display already. Anyone worth my time knows to be patient for what awaits.
"Blueball"? That must be an Earth saying, since it is one. Then again, so is Mejare.
Now what does "blueball" mean? You happen to live on a little blue ball, you know.
Well, thank you very much. I was starting to think I wouldn't garner any praise from you unless I grew another six legs.
So you've come around on me. I know I'm not about to lay any eggs, but this is a game about gorgeous grace, not creepy crawling things.

condition.saying: a few tricks of my own

case.state: You might want to start playing them, then. Unless you don't mind me hogging the spotlight.
And are you just going to sing about them? Take your glasses off---that's a good first trick.
...I see. Well, you'll be pleased to know that I've never slashed my own clothing. They teach you that on the first day.
...How would you even manage that? No, I don't slice my own dress to ribbons. I took lessons with that thing, you know.
Wouldn't that just ruin your chance to wear pretty clothes for months?
Vacuums...maybe you'd be better off chatting with our engineer. Anyway, from what I've heard about seasons, all I'm missing is having to put the dress away...
So what you're saying is, I'm too perfect for them? But I still want the attention! How about my problem is getting a broader fanbase?
So I'm supposed to take them ignoring me as a compliment? Girls worship the ideal, and men chase the broken? They're such a pain!
W-what? No, no, Earth is the one killing us all! No wonder when the women on it jump straight to violence!
Execute them? E-Earthlings would know all about executions, wouldn't you? That's what I meant, you slaughtering us!
C-corpses? No, but---you people certainly do! Earth wants to harvest all its "female parts" from Mejare, by force!
That's---Earthlings really think alike! You've already got the idea in your heads to loot our corpses for "female parts." That's what I was talking about!
Someone who enjoys the elegance and thrill of saving entire planets---oh, damn it!
It's for those who can enjoy a special kind of flip-turn. The grace of flight with the power to move mountains! All at my finger---tips.
Ahhh, I don't know...you just made the whole thing a lot more complicated. Maybe I should try the fake first, for practice.
I-I mean...we don't jump into a Dread before trying the flight sim first. I have to take this all in...before I take it all in!
Oh, you're---not wrong there. It turns out we're like pigs for slaughter, or something...just a womb farm.
Mejare's no paradise, that's for sure. Apparently they're in on some plot to let our organs be harvested...reproductive organs!

I should be a fantastically famous model or something! A---powerful, elegant monument to Mejarian beauty!
...That was my dream!

Do you know what I wanted to be when I was a girl? Mejare's greatest heroine! The strongest, most beautiful woman of them all!
...Haaagh.
Maybe it will be, if you keeping making fun of me...
Sure. That sounds like fun, as long as you're done making fun...hmph.
I come home to someone cute after every mission. And I don't take my dress off before that.
Go home with? Hey, what're you trying to say? And I'd be doing it naked, too? Barnette wouldn't like that...
Hmph! That's what I figured. All tease without any...payoff.
You sure like to talk without backing it up, don't you? As if you knew anything, anyway...
Well, you tend to be a little more adult once you manage to spit out the words "I love you."
Maybe you're the weird one. Let me guess, you're still worried about your first kiss?
Everyone's a pervert as far as you're concerned. Just pipe down if you're not ready to be a grown-up.
That's strange. They always seemed tenacious to me. But in bed...I guess the script is flipped?
Hmm. They can last pretty well in a battle. And I can...w-well, that's a little private.
So...men dominate the battlefield, and women dominate the bedroom? That's interesting...
I am humble! I've barely said a thing about my Dread, or my powerful, elegant Vandread fusion, or the planets I've saved! Just some simple measurements...
I could be bragging about my planetary heroics, you know. Cutting through space in a scarlet fighter craft...or we can just keep talking hips.
She'd gone blind, and I'd broken my arms, and it was soooo cold, and we had to work together to send out an SOS...hmm? Oh, well...it's what I know.
Our life support was dwindling, we were both injured---injured bad! We could've frozen to death before we got our distress signal out, but...? Ahaha. It's been my best romance.
She'd gone blind, and I'd broken my arms, and it was soooo cold, and we had to work together to send out an SOS...honestly, we didn't make up until we were rescued.
Our life support was dwindling, we were both injured---injured bad! We could've frozen to death before we got our distress signal out, but...wellll, we were both complaining.

Ta-daaaa! Jura Basil Elden in her natural state---gorgeous!
...Hey, aren't I good enough for a normal magazine?

Ahaha---ohohoho! Behold! My body, as I was born...
Wait, is that all I am to you? "Naughty"? Rude...
Huuh? Noooooo, keep going! What about its color contrast? Or its seamless integration with my belt?
H-hey, I didn't tell you to stop. You didn't even mention my hair!

Ta-daaaa!
...Hm, useless as always. You knoooow, if you wanna leave an impact, you have to commit to things---!

Here I aaaaam! Ohoho...
...I figured. At this point, I wouldn't expect you to be the one to do anything.

Ahahaha! Great, right? Full-figured, but with a youthful slenderness...
...Oh, brother. The only thing you're full of is excuses...
No, I could definitely stab something right now. Like a four-foot windbag.
Some peace and quiet might be relaxing...
...Well, you win if you have fun with it. That, and you put on a show every chance you get.
It's nothing but a pain. But if you want to get by, you have to have fun with it somehow...and try to look great doing it.

state.text: You would know all about acquiring tastes...
I think you acquire tastes a lot faster than I do.
So am I. Just ask Barnette.
Quite the cuddler, or just good to cuddle? Well, both are true for me.
You should really let her back out.
I'd love to see her on the outside.
One curve, mostly. One really big curve.
Curve, singular. It doesn't change direction...
I like how I am now, thanks...it's a great feeling, in case you forgot.
Who's the one who doesn't like the state she's in?
Then stop moping and do something about it.
Then what are you waiting for? Burn it off and stop trying to convince us you look good.

...I'm sorry, handstands? Why not drop my sword on the ground while I'm at it?
...You do a handstand, right now!
Why would I be doing handstands? And when's the last time you tried, exactly?
If you're trying to get one over on me, fine. Wear an extra-large dress at your next gala.
It's nice to have fun now and then, yeah. If you're the royal guest of honor on this planet, then sure, fill a big round dress...and don't forget the fries.
Oh, I wonder where I could find a forbidden partner. From another planet, perhaps with different anatomy...
There's a thought. Forbidden partners...who could possibly be so exotic and forbidden on the world of Mejare?
...I don't know what that means. Why would I hang out with them if I thought there was no benefit?
...What? Of course it's a benefit to have friends.

case.state: ...And from what I can tell, you're never satisfied.
Fully? I haven't known you for long, but---you're never full.
You've certainly taught me that. But even if there's room, someone'll hog it.
And some girls just fill that room, no matter how much you give them.
It eats its twin, and everything surrounding them, too...it just can't get enough until it bursts.
In fact, the bigger one just seems to eat everything around it...until it explodes.
No, I was---mmn. If it weren't for you, I might actually want to indulge a little...
W-wait, I was kidding. I hate to say it, but you've kind of ruined fries for me now...
Sheesh, the least you could do is share. Maybe be generous and treat the whole table.
Well, there you have it---a glutton in every sense. If you bought us all some food, I might start warming up to you...
There's nothing I could say to stop us from finding out...
Oh, you'd do it alone, I'm sure about that...

state.text: Haven't I been doing that the whole time?
I feel like I've been giving you that treatment all ~background.time~.
It wasn't civilians that put us in this mess, you know. Maybe one day we'll be some again.
We used to be civilians! You don't want a bad reputation from your future recruits.
Maybe you could be one of our chefs. If you promise to cook more food than you eat, that is...
We're not playing games on our ship, you know. Maybe the cooking staff would take you---if they trusted you around the stores.
You're doing a pretty good job yourself. If you got someone else to do it, they might feel guilty about your situation.
That would be sweet---if they weren't making your belly problem worse. Maybe stick to yourself for now.
Oh, you're so frustrating. You already know what I'm going to say, right?
Well, clearly it hasn't---ugh. Haven't we had this conversation already? You're so stubborn!
For God's sake...you know what your problem is? It's not gluttony, it's stubbornness!
I eat fries. And cookies, and cakes...and even drink some wine now and then. Nothing's ever taken that much of a hold on me.
I hope nothing ever tempts me that badly...but honestly, I feel like I've tried all the really seductive foods. Cookie dough and spiced liqueurs...
Well, it's more the process...if it becomes too much of a chore, it starts to remind her of cooking for all her sisters.
That's not it. She likes to cook, but it's not her job...she had a big family, you know.
I should really watch myself, then...ohh, but I love a good meal! It puts me right to sleep...
Maybe I just get full easily, and then I fall asleep before eating too much. Either way, I'll remember you if the scales start to tip.

case.state: What advice? You just made fun of me. Well, two can play at that game---and I've got the advantage.
Where was the advice? I have some for you: make sure you're in a good position before you attack.
Well, are you just sitting there waiting for it to happen? Maybe she's shy, and you've got to tell her how you feel.
Why does she have to do it? If you want her so bad, just say so. That always makes girls melt.
Uhhh...I think it's just our fusion core. It's quirky like that---you should see what it did to my Dread!
It's what? We know what it is, sort of. Our fusion core has been literally fusing things for a while---but always to our benefit!
Hmnnn...and I thought Hibiki was a loudmouthed idiot.
Uhhhn, how obnoxious. I should've stuck to our prisoners.
Sure, sometimes. After to~background.time~, though, I think I'm all done with those...
More like sweets and fancy dinners. I can get a baked potato in the mess hall...not that I ever think I'll eat one again.
...Not much of a fighter, are you? That sounds like a good way to get killed.
I'm all for peace and understanding once the fighting's over. Just don't hesitate to end the fight.
...Hmph. Jura wouldn't mind defending her honor, if she really had to...wait, I meant "Jura" as me, not...ugh.

...Ahaha. Who else could call Jura's bluff?
...Oh, it might get really confusing if I don't say "I"...
I---ugh, damn it! This whole thing is throwing me off! I had a whole striptease laid out in my head...
N-no, I---agh! You're the one whining---how am I supposed to focus like this? All my teases and flourishes...
...Can we talk about something else, please?
This is why Jura talks to other people, and not herself...
...The two of us, together? That's proving tough to handle, even for us.
...As long as we do it separately. Even one of us comes on pretty strong, right?

Ohohohoho! Truly, our minds are unclouded, and our bodies ravishing! If only we could combine our Dreads!
...Could you repeat that?

Hahaha! You hear that? As if I'm not perfect alone, together we make a tag team in perfect sync!
...Sorry, what was that?
You can't love others without loving yourself. And I certainly do...
Well, it's not fair that everyone else gets to enjoy me...
Well...I understand that. It's been fun to see how big the galaxy is outside of our little system...
...Well, I never really pictured life outside Mejare's system. But now that we know what's out there, it's hard to imagine staying put...
...Um, do you think we all just float around onboard? I have to deal with gravity the same as---oh, damn it! You messed me up...

We have gravity! Who would ever tolerate space travel in constant---freefall---ugh, nooo...
Gravity sucks...
You want to talk about not having a choice? Pirates should know that pretty well...
What, like we're doing it for fun? If you stay hung up on all that, you're just going to get yourself killed.
They've cast us out for a lot less. But they might have the right idea this time...I mean, having a baby isn't the kind of thing you should leave up to chance.
When you get pregnant, or what you even get pregnant with...you sure don't seem to have a lot of control over it here.
Oh-hohohohoho! Against Jura's illustrious image, cheap words crumble to dust! You of all people should know---there is strength in beauty!
Jura is perfectly strong...strong in love, strong in battle, strong in beauty! Hohoho...ohohohoho!
Ahh, don't read too deep into that. She's not a huge pervert or anything...or maybe she's coaxed me into being just as bad.
I guess I've said too much. But she's not some kind of---I mean, she has other interests. And seeing her happy makes Jura happy, too...
I-it's not like she needs it to get off! She just---well, it helps. So Jura does it...and when you do something for a while, you start to come around on it...
...Oh, brother. This is really far back...I promise, there's more beyond the waterfall. You don't worship any volcanoes, right?
Maybe I...shouldn't have touched this. You're not tossing sacrifices off the edge, right? Into the valley you can't see through the mist?
The birth of a heroine...they'll build statues of Jura, with a beautiful baby at her breast! Hohoho...oh, did you say something?
...So I have to make him love me. Well, that won't be a problem---one look is all it'll take!
A new heroine for a new era! From exile to excellence! My legacy, immortalized...what are you saying? Obviously the man will love me!
No, I---w-well. Some of the stuff Vandreads pull is magic, pretty much...
M-magic? I---that's not---actually, it's kind of hard to argue...lately.
I will, thank y---ugh, damn it! You messed me up....Barnette will have to make Jura feel better.
Sure, be miserable and---lonely. Ugh, you ruined it! Making Jura lose focus...why isn't Barnette heeeeere?
Accepted. But what Jura really likes is compliments...
Save your apologies and give Jura some praise instead. Muhuhu...hat always lifts her spirits.
Good luck with that. If I can't rein her in on this, and Miss Gasco hasn't even tried...forget it.
Did you see how she talked to me? Even our reg chief can't convince her. Give it a shot if you want a gun in your face.
Fine, be that way. I suppose everyone who doesn't mind pictures is a pervert, too...
You've never met one you could just stare at forever? Didn't any of them want their pictures taken? It's all so confusing...
You'd have to ask our captain...she was there when it happened. Something about an argument and running off with the colonizing ships...
Good question...Mejare doesn't like to dwell on the idea that we were ever together at all. I think our captain's old enough to have seen it firsthand...
Well, you can't force them to like you. But people make up their minds pretty quickly, anyway. You might as well enjoy yourself.
It always seems like girls either like me, or they don't. And I don't have much say no matter what I do. So I've decided to be the Jura that Jura likes.

Ta-da!
...Sheesh, stop shouting. I don't know why Earth girls have such a hard time discussing the men they live with...

Aaaaand the other!
...Sorry, Nonon, what are you mad about now? If it's not the gooiness, then...boy, everyone gets so scandalized here.
Hey, I mean what I say! You just figured as much a moment ago. And I'll prove it again and again...
Oh, please. As the game goes on, you'll learn what you already declared...Jura Basil Elden does not play around.
Too bad---you're playing with me. Me and all my wonderful talents...
I'm afraid if you want to see her so badly, you have to play nice with her Jura. Don't worry---I have plenty to offer.
And you didn't wear them here? Fashion was half the draw of this place, personally...
Hmmn...why didn't you wear them for me to see? I won't be coming back to this planet, you know...
Hmhm, I knew I'd be good at this! All those hands sliding over you is the greatest feeling!
Hahahaha! My business sense is already paying off! Every girl feels like a queen when she's being massaged.
Ohohohoho! Oh, but I'm afraid love runs much deeper than that! So deep is Jura's infinite beauty...!
We? Muhuhu...ohohohohohoho! In this moment, there is only Jura!
I intend only to dazzle! Men can be full citizens if they can appreciate elegance...
Oh, we've learned our lesson about that...now I do my best to charm them!
Well, I don't see what I have to lose. A baby at my breast will only enhance my image...
I'm not sure what you mean by that. Is there a more elegant image than the holy mother?

Those are the fighter ships we pilot!
...Wait, do you know what a pilot is? My whole rank's gonna be lost on this crowd...
Oh, yeah...I'm not sure your "era" has anything like it. You know, big flying gunship? Lasers, missiles, cockpit?
Riiiiight? Even our old captain had never seen anything like it. But, hooghn, it's easy to laugh about a battle once you've all survived it.
I admit, right before we hatched that scheme, I really thought we were all goners. Maybe you've had your own moments like that on the field...
...Haahn. She is a powderkeg only Jura can handle...
Couldn't you tell she's all business? Business and gunpowder...it requires the delicate touch of Jura.
Hoooh-hohohohoho! That's all I need to hear, Lysithea---!
Hahahahah! Ohh-hohohoho! Impossible to ignore, huh, Lysithea---?
You're no fun, Policewoman. I wasn't really going to stab anyone!
Oh, give me a break, High-Kicks. Is it just a policewoman's nature to be anti-fun?
Oh, sure, I was really going to stab people. You stuffy authority types always expect the worst from people.
If you're wondering why I'm a pirate, it's because boring authority figures like Chun here want all the weapons for themselves.
Oh, but the police girl wouldn't check her weapons, I bet. No, confiscation is for the criminal scum.
Oh, I wish I was as good with my rapier as I am in a cockpit. But really, this just sounds like jealousy. Who says I can't pilot?
Ooh, insulting my piloting skills, are you? By all means, present your evidence. Oh wait, you're just trying to put me down because I'm beautiful.
You can't fault my appearance, so you move on to questioning my piloting skills. You're so predictable, Daria...you're not the first jealous girl I've met.
Other way around---I'm a better pilot than a swordswoman. But really, I could claim to be anything, and you'd try to denigrate me out of envy.
Why, yes, it is...one of many pirate weapons. I'm glad you can appreciate the intricacies of my outfit.
Well, I mostly carry it for fashion...I'm more likely to use a Mejarian laser ring when things get dicey.
Technically my Dread is my pirate weapon. And what an elegant ship it is!
My Vandread is the ultimate pirate weapon, actually. It can shield a whole planet, it's so powerful!
...O-oh. Well, I might want to recommend something bigger...or a gun.
Don't you have...oh, I don't know, laser rings? Even those clunky men's guns are better than a sword.
Eep. If I were in a labyrinth, I'd want my laser ring...or my Dread. Or even those men's guns Barnette collects.
...Are you serious? What are you doing in a labyrinth? Especially with a sword---use a gun, woman!
Ohhh, come on, why don't you like me? Do men not like tall women? How can I get handsome men to give me some seed?
...You're breaking my heart, Jotaro. Women love me---do men not like big, tall girls? I can't help it!
Ohhh, don't just leave me like that! At least say why you don't like me! Is it because I'm too tall? Men like short girls?
...Am I too tall? Women love how big I am---do men feel the opposite? Come on, Mister Muscles, give me something to work with here!
Oh, you're so frustrating! Maybe you think I'm some slut, but I haven't managed to get a single man to fall for me. ...Do men hate tall girls?
It's called fashion, honey, not slutty. There's no need to insult my home planet's traditional dress.
You're one to talk, Miss Rags-and-Tatters. I'll have you know Mejarian dress is revealing because we're all beautiful.
It's called a tease, Juri. Mejarians simply dress like this to show off our gorgeous bodies without being indecent.
Who're you calling slutty? You insult my cultural tradition of revealing dresses---it's a celebration of womanhood!
From your Hyrule planet, right? It's good to know Mejare has sisters in this big universe of ours.
It would seem even Planet Hyrule has seen the beauty of the Mejarian lifestyle, then.
What planet are you from again? Hyrule? Good to see you've realized men are extraneous.
Do tell, Navi. You're from planet Hyrule, right? Mejare's influence seems to be expanding.
