True, but it'd be awful rude of me. I'm representing planet Mejare's honor here, you know!
I'm not about to shortchange you all on the nudity you've earned. Who do you take me for, some kind of pirate?
And what would that accomplish, besides irritate our tablemates even further?
Come on, Nagisa. You're a woman---you know what women look like naked! What's the issue?
Perish the thought, Nagisa! Haven't I teased you all enough by now?
My lovely hair could indeed provide that for me. But I've done enough teasing this evening...any more would just be cruel.
What do you mean, cover up? Why play at all if you're not going to let anyone see you naked?
Cute as you are, I think you may have missed the point of this game, Nagisa.
Do you not have a vagina of your own, Nagisa? What are you so embarrassed about?
Hey, maybe Earth men beat your groins to pulps, but mine is prime and pristine. I'm not ashamed.
Aw, what's the matter, Nagisa? Don't you like my naked body? My gorgeous, full breasts and hips?
Says the girl with her own breasts on display. What, my groin is what pushes you over the edge? It's like anyone else's!
That's very hurtful, Nagisa. I spent all that time teasing you, and now it turns out you think I'm too ugly to look at!
Cover your eyes? Well, that's a blow to the ego. Nagisa thinks I'm ugly.
Covering your eyes? Seems I'm not up to Nagisa's standards...shame, because she's cute enough to meet mine.
That's the spirit! Confidence makes any woman more beautiful.
Aw, but you're already so cute as you are! But you can be confident and still be cute.
You're already naked, so I don't know if you'd call that a win. But confidence is certainly sexy!
Go for it! Confidence is how my darling Barnette won me over, after all.
You're right, people should be more like me---beautiful, intelligent, and confident! Or maybe I should be cute like you.
Considering your ridiculous embarrassment, Nagisa, yes, it would. But what fun would that have been?
Why's that, Nagisa? Oh, yes, my hair was blocking the view. Let me fix that...
Hm? Oh, that's right---my hair was covering up my breasts! Good catch, Nagisa...
Don't say that, Nagisa---you were as cute as ever, even as you masturbated! And you got through it like a champ.
...Now let's get a move on to the bigger, brighter, and more buxom.
I'm sure I'll actually take off some clothes any minute now.
If you're not happy, then just take another look down my neckline.
It's not like me to not play it safe, you know.
On a laser-lit landscape, men and women alike underestimate the girl with a sword.
This is my first day on Earth, so be forgiving.
The nice thing is, I can count on Meia and Barnette to keep watch.
...I really hope I don't regret this.
...To show a healthy respect, I'll keep it close by.
Not to say I won't wear a laser ring, but doesn't the elegance of a blade suit me perfectly?
Every team needs its close-quarters operative.
When you're picking who'll train with the melee weapons, all eyes go to the big girl...
...Now all you Earthlings behave yourselves so I don't have to.
...And that's how it's done.
...Hnm! Just a little taste of the elegance to come.
Between my combat boots and my combat dress, I'm worried my fighting spirit might slip away.
Like all my pretty clothes, I got these---"for free."
...Hahhn. The spa crew always starts with our aching feet.
...Hhyah! Happy with that? Don't be---there's more.
Now I can spread my toes and my wings.
...And that's how it's---o-oh, noooo! Moohhhn...Jura practiced so hard.
Ta-da! Hahh...where's Barnette when you need her, soothing me from the bottom up?
...Whoops!
...Aren't separate sleeves just the most stylish thing?
Hahahahaha!

Behold!
...My bare arms!
Ha-hah! Jura once again escapes the Earthlings' clutches.
...Hmhm. Hahahaha! I look good even without them, right?

Oh, wait, these aren't connected!
...You should all learn how to take a joke.
What's with that face, ~player~? And people call me spoiled.
Before my dress slides off completely, let's loosen it up a little more...
...And one little extra move to set the stage.
Are you annoyed? Here's another bit of Jura's advice: you win if you have fun with it.
Did you know? Vandread-Jura can shield a whole planet...cover up the whooole thing.
Hmn...this thing really digs into me after a while. Did it leave a mark?
Oh, isn't my cleavage enough for you people? Look, I'll even unclip the slit on my dress here...
Jura gets the sense some of you aren't happy with the teasing...as if the full dress wasn't skimpy enough in the first place!
...I don't have a problem with being nude, by the way.
Big things are coming---and Barnette will be coming, too.
Heeeeere. No secrets, no embellishment...
My bangs, right? You couldn't quite see the full picture. Let me fix that...
...There! A full shot of Mejare's biggest, brightest star.
I flew all the way here, so I'll go all the way in every way.

My hair's been blocking the view, right?
...It's pretty enough on its own, so I'm doing you a favor.
Sometimes Jura doesn't feel appreciated...but she's so considerate, she'll flip her hair back, and let you see more...
...Jura feels like she could be getting more praise. Is this what you wanted?
Before a provocative pirate, are you captive or captivated?
Personally, my hair is my best asset. Buuut, just for you...
Didn't you like the way my bangs were draped over them, though? A real classical beauty look. This is just---lewd!
Our planetary peace treaty will require full transparency.
~blank~
~blank~
Hey, don't be rude to our little male friend here. He's probably scared half to death, being around all these gorgeous women.
Now, now, Rinkah. That's no way to treat our lone man. His little pea-brain can only handle so much stimulus.
Don't make fun, Rinkah. At least he had the courage to come alone...or the stupidity.
It's not quite that dire. Meia isn't exactly in a good mood, since I dragged her here.
You work for this woman, Pit? Look at that, Meia...it must be Take-Your-Boss-to-Strip Day.
Oh, wow, this woman is your boss? I guess I have no room to talk, considering I brought Miss Ice Queen along for the ride.
Look, Meia, this cute little angel-boy brought his boss, too! I guess he and I are both into taking our superiors down a peg.
Well, what do you know? Pit brought this boss here too, Meia. Only ~player~ has any sense, it seems.
Ooh, you're classmates? Is this an after-school date? I've never seen a man-woman couple!
Ooh, you two go to school together? Are you on a date? Romance between a boy and a girl---in the flesh!
Classmates? Seems we might be intruding on a little man-woman action---but I guess that's common on Earth, right?
A beautiful blonde boy and girl, going to the same school? Strange venue for a date, but I'm too excited to see a male-female romance in person to care!
My, what kind of perverted students is your school generating, going to strip poker together? Well, since you're here...show me how men and women love each other.
Weren't you a man the last time I saw you? I can't say I haven't seen men attempt to dress as women...
Well, hello there, Kazu---wait, "Kazuko"? H-hey, you're that boy from last time, aren't you? I'm getting sick of you men dressing like women!
Eugh, women's clothing just does not fit a man's body---in your case, quite literally. No man I date is wearing my dress.
Eugh. Now I see why men don't dress like we do. And this is your wife's outfit? Even Barnette is not touching my dress.
Oh, it's Mr. Angel, back again. I hope you don't think wearing all-black is going to make you look intimidating!
Oh, it's you, the boy with the fake-blond hair. Time in the summer sun is fun and all, but it won't bleach your hair into my golden shimmer.
~player~...won't you teach me about men? ...Oh, come on, Nayru, don't men like getting naked?
Ooh, ~player~'s turn! ...Really, Nayru? Don't men enjoy this sort of thing?
Oh, ~player~...I want to know all about men. ...Pipe down, Nayru, I thought men liked stripping.
Show me some exotic male skin, ~player~. ...Oh, don't dash my hopes so quickly, Nayru! I thought men were shameless!
Ooh, it's ~player~'s turn! Show something big and male! ...Do men even wear accessories, Nayru?
Ooh, finally, a little exotic male skin. ...You think so, Miss Goddess? Men dress as fancy as I do?
Finally, I see some male body parts. ...I know we wear accessories, Nayru, but we're women! Do men?
At last, I'll see something I can't in a mirror. ...Hey, Sleepyhead, don't give him ideas. Do men even wear small things?
What's the deal with this woman, Rinkah? You know each other? You take orders from her?
So is this girl your commanding officer, Rinkah? You certainly treat her that way.
My, Rinkah, your commanding officer is such a young, fresh-faced woman! Ours is a wizened old crone.
You can cut your hair short, Corrin, but you're still such a cute young girl! I can't believe you order Rinkah around.
Ooh, a schooldate? Far be it from me to understand men's tastes, but I'm not sure you've got the height to woo your handsome blonde classmate here.
I think I can see what's going on here, Shorty. You're in love with your blonde hunk-o-man here, and you're playing strip poker with him so he ignores your more beautiful classmates.
Classmates? Is this the last desperate move from the short, bespectacled girl's playbook? Land a man by dropping the pretenses and playing strip poker with him?
Oh, Little Miss Four-eyes, I'm sorry for interrupting your plan to strip for your blonde classmate. He'll just be staring at me the whole time.
It doesn't take enormous lenses to see through your plan, Futaba---you want to strip for your classmate here. Men are dumb, it could work.
A human robot...like, fully human! I swear, you're indistinguishable! And they've been sending robots after us for months...
Ohh...I'm glad Earth hasn't tried infiltrating us. If you strolled up to our crew...well, you're a man, but I sure couldn't tell you're a robot.
Hey, tell me about your partner. She's tall and fierce, right? Always taking charge of things?
Interesting...so you've got a female partner, right? An "android," just like you. And by the sound of it, she's giving the orders.
Omigosh, there's two of you girls? Are you twins? I heard Earth people could have matching babies called twins!
Ohh, you two ladies are so adorable! One of you even cut your hair short, just like Meia does!
Well, what have we here? Two cute little ladies dressed in matching armor sets?
Wait, you're both named Corrin? Look, girls, I know one's hair is short, but you should really dress different.
Well, aren't you cute! And you're dressed in all that fancy armor. What's your name?
You are just the most adorable thing, even in all that heavy armor. Can't you take it off and show us what an Earth woman looks like?
You're cute! Look, Meia, she even cut her hair short like you do! Must be big on practicality, too.
A woman in armor? Meia, this girl is trying to get on your good side...matching outfits like that.
Wait, wait, wait. You work for this woman? Quite the little boss-employee bonding exercise.
Oh wow, you two work together? I mean, Meia's my boss, but we at least went to different tables.
You take orders from this woman, Pit? Men and women, working together...I see how Earth operates.
Well, now! You work for this woman...how very, very awkward, Mr. Angel.
Quite the streak you had there. Was that beginner's luck, or do men actually understand how numbers work?
That took long enough. More male skin for me!
Don't get a big head over that streak, handsome. You still haven't even touched me.
Feeling good about yourself, ~player~? You have yet to beat a Mejarian woman...well, me, anyway.
So, not to call you a harlot or anything, Miss Misato, but you seem awful interested in these men...so am I. How do you Earth girls get their attention?
Ooh, you seem pretty confident around these Earth men, Miss Misato. From one woman to another, what's the secret to getting their attention?
You seem to be doing a better job flirting with these Earth men, Miss Misato. Am I doing something wrong? I always seem to scare them!
Men just run away from me, usually...I thought they like being flirted with. Miss Misato, you seem to get them!

Oh, aren't you the man I met last time? You seemed to be led around by that little tube of yours. And now you're in a girl's dress that'll have it dangling out! I have to say, it's not a good look for a man.
Oh. Is this what becomes of young men who think with their rods? Women's clothing is just too delicate to stuff your square bodies into.
...Hm. Now I see why men wear all that baggy clothing---stick them in a woman's skirt, and all your bony joints just tear up the lacing.
Oh, it's you, that Rabat lookalike. He probably would be more charming if he wore something sharper than a poncho. Who's the lucky girl this Valentine's?
You look familiar...oh, right, Rabat's long-lost Earth brother. You're even celebrating a holiday our planets share. What, do you have a girlfriend?
So, men can enjoy the summer heat, too. Since you haven't got any breasts, bikinis are strictly women's beachwear, right?

In a man's opinion, would you have preferred to see me in a bikini?
...Men don't wear bikinis, do they? They're such perfect beach clothes.

...Um, is that a new shirt? It matches your jacket better.
...Please don't do anything gross.
Did you just change your shirt and nothing else? I like this color better, but if you're...ugh, it's impossible to tell with this guy...
Hey, I saw that box of chocolates you brought. Don't hide them away for ~player~! You absolutely have to share with Jura!
Come to think of it, I've never had a "job" like yours. I'm sure being a store clerk isn't fun, but... well, it's better than being an outlaw.
Is that pizza? I love when our cooks make pizza! Oh, tell me it's got Swiss on it! Jura loves the flavor...and the smell!
Hey, isn't Santa Claus a man back on Earth? And he's all big and bulky like you, I guess? That's so weird...
Ooh...you look really weird in that thing. It's made to show off curves...w-well, I guess there is one, down there...

Jura is thirsty...but you're way too weird. Maybe you can just give me one of your ice cubes.
But are they your brains, then? Ugh...!
So this is what men wear to school? It's awfully drab and a little baggy...so, exactly would I would expect.
So is this how "Italians" dress? You have to tell me more. I hear it's a beautiful place here, and not too far from where my family lived.
Ooh! I might like ice cream even more than cake...oh, but gelato has that extra rich texture to it. It's more elegant! Do you have some?
You look like you're attending a funeral, not a wedding. This is how men marry? Your bride would be standing there in her beautiful dress!
So men don't wear bikinis or anything like that? Even in the heat, it's always baggier and pruder than whatever we put on.

Isn't that what sailors wear in case they fall in the ocean?
...Haahn, like I've even been on land.
You can dress up all you want, but men were a lot scarier back when I thought they were big piles of germs.
Dressing like your best friend...imagine me stuffed into one of those pilot suits! Or Barnette's leotard, even...
I've got to know just what a mixed-gender date looks like. You're supposed to be really polite to your girlfriend, right?
A man and a woman on Valentine's...so how do you both act on a date? I heard something about the man doing whatever she wants.
Wow, a blindfold at a table full of strangers? I never knew men could be so...depraved.
You're, uh, really making up for your stature with the fetish gear. Can't look me in the eye?
I knew men could be cowardly, but damn. Even the Tarakkians I know can look a woman in the eye.
So the blindfold's going first, right? So you can actually read the cards from now on?
Pod this, data that...you talk like you're a machine. Why the formality?
Why do you talk like you're a robot half the time, huh? Loosen up and enjoy yourself---if men can do that, of course.
Hey, what's with all your formal data-mechanics babble? You sound like you just rolled off the factory line.
Are you so polite and deferent and robotlike because you're short? Because the short man I know is a real fireball!
Hey, darling little boy...why so mechanical in waist and taste? I know Tarakkians are made in factories, but sheesh.
It's now or never, Little Dungeon Bot. Going to look me in the eyes for once?
I spy with my little eye something you can still take off, Dungeon Robo. That's because my eyes are uncovered.
Sure you don't want to part with that blindfold, Mr. Robo-man? Are you aware of the alternative?
Looks like Little Dungeon Bot is all out of dungeon items...well, except for the most striking one of all.
...Ew. What's wrong with your hands...and your face?
...I've got to be honest here. You are very ugly...and I hate ugly things.
...Would it have killed you to wash yourself before coming here? Or maybe not come at all? I would've preferred that.
...OK, ew. I wouldn't collect your seed if it meant they'd make me the Grand Ma for it.
Oh look, a child-man. What's the word---boy? Anyway, I'm not going to strip in front of a kid.
Hey, kid, I know you're male, but can't you read? No children allowed.
I'm going to ignore the cat ears for a second and focus on how you look like you're twelve. Beat it, kid, adults are trying to have fun here.
...Listen, we're playing a grown-up game for grown-ups. You've got to leave...so I don't feel like a pedophile.
Hibiki's just short, but you...I don't think you're an adult. Can't be sure with men, but still...
Woah, talk about hunk! I want to see what those muscles can do.
Well, now! You look like just the big ball of hunk I've been searching for, cutie.
Tall, check---muscles, check---handsome, check! Looks like I've found me a winner, and he hasn't even stripped yet.
Oooh! Look at you, handsome! Just the sort of man I hoped to see here!
And I thought I was enthusiastic. This man's blowing me out of the water.
Talk about bringing energy to the table. Planning on winning this thing, or just shouting about it?
Well, someone's a feisty one. Hibiki's energetic, but you've got the body to match, hot stuff.
You're some kind of racecar driver or something? Seems you're permanently amped-up from it.
Well, aren't you cute! And you're dressed in all that fancy armor. What's your name?
You are just the most adorable thing, even in all that heavy armor. Can't you take it off and show us what an Earth woman looks like?
You're cute! You've even cut your hair short like Meia does. Women can pull that off sometimes!
A woman in armor? You're after Meia's own heart, you sly little thing! Too bad she isn't here.
And who do we have he---oh. El Shaggy Blanco. Great choice, ~player~.
...You know, I put a lot of effort into having all these lines, and then you go and stick me with El Shaggy Blanco.
Thought I wouldn't have lines to April Fools' characters? Well, think again, ~player~.
Everyone give ~player~ a round of applause...they figured out how to use the offline version, as you can see.
...I know you're proud of yourself for deciphering the offline version, ~player~, but you don't have to pick meme characters.
Excellent character selection, ~player~. You picked a joke that stopped being funny in 2017...whenever that was in Earth years.
Oh, good, I don't have to be in character with Shaggy Blanco around. It's hard being seductive all the time, you know!
Ooh, maybe I'll take your seed. You're tall and handsome...and most importantly, you're blond.
What's this, now? You solve mysteries? Solve this...whose handsome blond seed am I seriously considering taking right now?
Hi there, handsome blond man! You look like you could use a woman at your side...or maybe on top of you.
Duero might have better hair, but yours is blond...that's definitely a plus where I come from.
So "gay" is the Earth word for how Tarakkians live? Actually, I'm not sure they even form couples there...
A man loving other men? Well, if women can do it, I suppose men can...not that I really picture men capable of love.
Is this what man-on-man love does to your appearance? Because you're a scary-looking customer.
You know, they taught me as a girl that men were monsters...you fit the part. And apparently you don't like women, is that right?
If "gay" means what I think it does, I guess teasing you isn't going to get me anywhere...not that I want to see you naked.
Hey, hey, hey---check out this handsome stud! What brings you here, Mr. Cool-and-Casual?
You look like you're right at home, Mr. Lackadaisical. You know what I like in my men? Handsomeness...like yours.
Hey, Jacket-and-Pants. You look a little sleepy, but I can't deny how you're making my heart beat faster. What's your story?
I can't take my eyes off you, handsome, even if yours seem a little sleepy. Mind telling me about yourself?
Hey, so what's with those "Neighbors" you keep talking about? I mean, Mejare certainly doesn't get along with its neighbors.
Hey, Handsome, when you say you fight Neighbors, how big a scale are we talking? Let's just say neighboring planet Tarak isn't our best friend.
Who are these "Neighbors" you say you fight? Is this like a front-lawn kind of dispute, or do you mean as a soldier?
Did you say you fight neighbors? Mejarians usually fight their neighbors over gardening, unless we're talking planets.
Oooooh! Hel-lo, Mister Muscles! Tall, handsome, fashionable---you'd give me a wonderful baby!
Oh, my! You just might be the most breathtaking man I've ever seen! I like your fashion sense...want to give me a baby?
Hel-lo, Mister Jotaro! Not only are you handsome---you're fashionable! A perfect man-Oma for my child.
Oh, wow. You must have women swarming you, Mister Jacket-and-Cap. Won't you please give this poor Mejarian a child?
Do you have a little time after the game, Mister Muscles? You seem like a healthy, strong, fashionable man---a good source of seed.
Jotaro, your commanding presence is making me swoon! I've always dreamed of having a baby with a man...
And who's this fiery, shirtless pillar of a man? Hi there, cutie...did you know I'm from a planet of all women?
"Blah, blah, blah, I'm a man and everyone knows it!" Well, Mr. Mighty Man...I'm from a planet of all women. Excite me.
Finally, a man with my approach to covering! Hey...can't you show what men are like to this Mejarian woman, who's barely seen one?
Barely clothed, bursting with pride, and he's got a sword! Kamina, you're a man after my own heart---and I hardly know any men.
Ooh, you're a handsome one...and blond, which is even better. I see you eyeing me up...
Hi there...what was your name again? I forgot it when I got lost in your beautiful blond hair.
I wasn't sure if men could pull off blonde hair the way women do...but you're living proof. I'll keep my eye on you...
Ah, here's what I've been looking for! A handsome blond man. Try not to sweep me off my feet.
So, uh, Mister Bizarro, what's with your friend hanging in the background? Do men like to dress up in costume?
Why is your friend all dressed up in a mask, anyway? He's not cute like you, so he can't get away with being weird.
Hey, Mister Blonde, you're certainly an oddball. I'd say the strangest part is why you've got your friend dancing around in costume behind you.
Can you tell your little Killer Queen performance buddy to settle down? He's not nearly as dashing as you are.

state.text: Well, Mr. Blonde, you've got a strange friend and a bizarre attitude, but...w-wait, what's in your pocket?
...OK, I just noticed how Killer over here has a hand in his pocket. Way to reinforce my stereotypes of men---now stay away from me!
Wha---u-ugh! I-I just noticed your pocket! How dare you try to seduce me! I fight men all the time---you stay away!
Oh, Kira, I can't stop staring! Your gorgeous blonde hair, your broad chest, your---your---severed hand! Eek!

case.state: I see ~player~ has grown so desperate at the gender disparity in this game that they've turned to Kool-Aid Man for their fix.
...Listen, ~player~, I get that this game doesn't have too many men, but you're better than this. Pick a real character.
Doesn't bode well for your opinion of me that you'd stick me with this idiot, ~player~.
...Kool-Aid Man, huh, ~player~? That's...your choice? Are you sure?
Kool-Aid Man? ...Do I have to keep playing? If ~player~'s not gonna take this seriously, why should I?
You're really starved for some male players, aren't you, ~player~? Couldn't you pick, I don't know, Pit? 9S? Come on.
...What the hell am I looking at? Forget playing against, just...looking at.
...My beauty deserves better tablemates than this.
On the female side of things, we have the most beautiful woman on the roster. And on the male side of things, well...well.
So are you, uh, going to produce actual words at some point? Or is grunting and yelling all I can expect from a man?
...I mean, I tease men about being stupid, but did think they were capable of speech.
...It would seem men haven't quite evolved up to the point of grasping language. What a shame.
...You're really showing me new lows for male intelligence, Link. Grunt again if you agree.
Eep! O-oh, you can talk? B-but...why didn't you?
...So are you over your fear of women now? Is that what the grunting was all about?
Oh, you can talk. Did my beauty make you clam up, cutie?
Well, that solves that mystery. Come on and join us in the land of language like a civilized person.
Oh, good, you can talk. I had really lost all hope for men's intelligence for a while there.
Ack! Wha---o-oh, you're done screaming! Uh...OK.
Well, now! There's bizarre specimens, and then there's you. Are you a man or a woman?
I can't really pin down your sex, to be honest...or your species, for that matter.
Weren't you made in a lab? So were all Mejarians before our Famas carried us! ...But I'm not sure if you're a woman.
Way to go ahead and be the ultimate test of judging men vs. women. Gotta say, I'm stumped.
...Oh, you're one of those ann-drazza-nuss types, right? That's the word?
Mejarians get made in labs, too...but our Famas carry us. So maybe you're a man, then? Tarakkians are carried to term in labs...
Well, what do we have here? An adorable little cinnamon roll of a man, dressed up as an angel!
You are just the cutest little man I've ever seen! Hibiki's a little smaller, but he's got too much spunk to be cute.
Ohhh, you're so cute, Mr. Angel! I could just eat you up!
What's an adorable little man like you doing here, Pit? Sure you want to strip nude in front of these scary, hulking women?
You've got to tell me more about yourself, Pit! You're so damn shy...and I'm so curious!
Such a little motormouth, but it alllll clams up when I swing my gaze your way. I love having this effect on cute little boys!
Come on, Mr. Angel, don't be shy! I mean, it's cute, but I want to learn more about Earth men!
There's so much you could teach me about men, Pit...the men in my life always reject me. And you're so nonthreatening!
I can't get over how cute you are...but seriously, what's with the angel outfit? Men are no angels.
Men have always struck as more beastly than angelic...which is fine by me. So why do you dress like one?
So, uh, I read about angels as a girl, but they were always women. Why are you dolled-up like one, anyway?
Do those wings detach? They look pretty convincing, and the rest of your angel outfit is pretty good. Why do you have that on, anyway?
Hey, hey, hey! Talk about a hunk...and he's not even wearing much! Perfect.
You look like you see a lot of physical action, hot stuff...can those big muscles toss me around?
A big hunk of a man with more muscles than brainpower? Just what I've been looking for.
You seem a little clueless about this game, handsome. Don't worry...I'll guide you along.
Ooh, I love blonde hair! And a blonde man is that much more fascinating. What's your story, Mister Student?
Going to school still? I'm afraid I wasn't much of a student---do all the Earth girls fawn over your magnificent blonde hair?
How embarrassing that a man made it further in school than I did. But I can forgive that---blondes always put me in a good mood.
Omigosh, a blond man! Perfect for collecting seed---I could have a beautiful blonde daughter! You can take a day off from school, right?
Uh...you're kind of tall, I guess, but it doesn't look like you wash yourself much. Gross.
I know you're a man, but can't you put a little effort into your appearance? You look like you just rolled out of a gutter.
"Shaggy," huh? That'd be like if my nickname were "Gorgeous." Actually, I'll have to propose that next flight practice...
Gangly, unshaven, all around a mess. I'm starting to miss the clean-cut professionalism of the Tarakkian soldiers I know.
You're friends with that Buffy girl, right? Well...gonna seal the deal, or what?
Well, you don't look so bad for a man. Am I in competition with that Buffy woman?
Not to be too forward or anything, but I'm on the prowl for a good man...for reasons you'll know soon enough. Interested?
You're a pretty average-looking man. I can live with that...but I bet they don't make women like me where you come from.
Oh, an Earth car? I bet our engineer would love taking you apart...but for me, you're just so terribly antiquated.
Hoaaaagh...am I supposed to be blown away by this ratty old mechanical thing? All it does it puff out smoke and make noise...no grace at all.
Hm. I must say, a silly little gearbox chugging along just doesn't impress a pilot of a sleek, airborne fighter craft.
Am I supposed to be enamored with this antique Earth car? Even without my Dread, I'd prefer the quiet, hovering luxury of a Mejarian make.
Now, if you were an antique gun, my darling Barnette would be all over you. I'd have to pry her off so she'd pay attention to me...
I hope you don't think you're the first bald man I've met. Our navigator has a shaved head---a woman's hair is more important, anyway.
Well, I can certainly appreciate the cleanliness of a bald man. But don't expect to scrub down my body that easily.
"Mister Clean"? Well, that will be revealed over time. I know our bald prisoner has a very clean body himself...as do I.
Ugh. Aren't you a bit old to be playing this? Though if you have a wife, I'm curious how she seduced you.
Uhhh...I was looking for a young man's seed, thank you. Not one who's clearly got children already.
I generally expect a man to look me in the eye, you know. Aren't you supposed to be brave warrior types? Or am I too spoiled by our captive soldiers?
Aren't you a bit shy for a man, hiding under that mask? You're rather short and slender for a man, too, but you can't help that.
...Ew. Are you some kind of furry dog-man? Dogs may be cute, but I can't stand how gross they are, slobbering all over my legs.
My, my. Are you really going to play games with my heart, handsome? You won't even tell me your whole name...I'm Jura.
..."N." You really won't even tell us your name? I can't fall for a man I don't know a thing about.
Well, aren't you bombastic? I can appreciate a man with dramatic flair, but is it really over something as silly as cards?
My, men really put their heart and soul into everything, don't they? You even built a little card-holding contraption!
...Is this how older men speak on Earth? I was expecting some handsome, experienced gentleman, and I get a scowling sloucher in baggy clothes.
Well, aren't you charming? I see men lose their luster with age---the young men I know are sharp-dressed and stand up straight.
Well, it's not as if a shorty hasn't caught my attention before. I wonder if you'll impress me with your gumption as he has.
What a pushy little boy. Listen, "Supreme Leader," a Mejarian doesn't take orders from a man, understand?
Hey, a playful back-and-forth is one thing, but no man is my "Supreme Leader." I'm not even from this planet.

state.text: What have we here, but another fine male spec---h-hey! That's one of those explosive launchers men use! Stay away from me!
H-hey, what's the big idea? I've seen men on Tarak lug around those boxes, firing rockets at us!
Hello there, Mister---R-Rocket Launcher? Hey, what're you carrying that thing around for? Men try to blow us up enough back home!

case.state: Hello there, handsome. Is it true you're some kind of servant? I'll gladly allow a man to wait on me hand and foot.
I thought a man would be too proud to describe himself as a servant. By all means, serve me---doesn't my beauty deserve it?
Hmph. Normally I'd flirt with a man to check if your seed is worth my time, but I've got no patience for rudeness.
You...call men "gay"? Does that insult apply to women in love, as well? It's the natural way of things, as far as I'm concerned.
Oh, I don't understand what you're on about at all. You suck on men's rods, then insult them? What's wrong with men in love---or women?
Sucking on a man's tube...I've never considered that. Maybe it extracts their seed better than that penetration business...
...Do men like it when you put your mouth on their tube? I figured my vagina would feel softer, but maybe it makes collecting seed easier...
Ew. You're certainly not as pretty as the dolls I had as a girl. Don't tell me Earth girls have tea parties with creepy monsters.
...You're the sort of toy men play with as kids, right? I played with dolls of gorgeous women as a girl---and then became one, of course.
My, men aren't shy about going topless, are you? But you could stand to have a bit more bravado.
Hm. Cowardly trembling is not a good look for a man, even if he's got a nice chest to show off. Stand up straight, would you?
Hey, now, the occasional show of fear fits a woman's delicate nature. A man doing it is just weird.
Oh. I know my beauty can be overwhelming, but this man started throwing his clothes off as soon as he saw me.
Hey, now. I know you're a man, but patience is a virtue. Don't throw off all your clothes without a good tease first.
What kind of a title is "Suction Cup Man"? I'm afraid to let you anywhere near my breasts.
I think I deserve an explanation for why you're called "Suction Cup Man" if I'll be stripping near you. My body is delicate, you know!
Can you stop waving your gun around like a lunatic? Honestly. I don't listen to my girlfriend's lectures on gun safety just to watch some man use them as a flyswatter!
Oh, my girlfriend would be having a meltdown, watching you disrespect an antique like that. You're going to blow your own head off if you keep playing charades with it drawn!
I don't even like guns, but I've learned enough from Barnette to know you're not handling that thing safely. Put it away!
You'd think a man would know to keep his gun holstered and his finger off the trigger. I guess women are smarter in every aspect...my girlfriend has a collection.
Oh, what's this? You're a more rugged man than I'm used to---and I hear you're a space traveler, too? It's a shame you're a little old for me.
What a pleasant surprise to meet another spacefarer, and a man at that. Say, you wouldn't happen to have any young, handsome companions, would you?
Why is it that every rogue spacefaring man we meet is old and grizzled? I'm too much of a gorgeous, delicate young thing for you.
Oh. I know my beauty can be overwhelming, but this man started throwing his clothes off as soon as he saw me.
Hey, now. I know you're a man, but patience is a virtue. Don't throw off all your clothes without a good tease first.
Well, what do we have here? I figured Earth might have another blonde in form-fitting black, but not an Earth man. Of course, my dress isn't as tight around the butt.
Well, now! I see blonde hair and a tight black outfit is a universal sign of seduction---not just between planets, but between the genders!
Oh, another wiry young boy, like the man on our Dread team. He's gotten a bit more sun than you have, though---what possessed you to go outside and come here?
This looks like the first time you've been outside in a while, "Deimos." You're even blinking the light out of your eyes. Was it really strip poker that brought you out here?
My! Tall, handsome, stoic, and artistic---dressed in white. If you grew your hair out, you'd be just like the doctor we have aboard.
You have a good head on your shoulders, always asking questions and playing it cool. You remind me of Duero, our handsome young doctor---he likes to paint, too.
Yusuke. If you're transfixed by the female form, then why not treat me to a full-body portrait? It would stand among all the classical symbols of beauty...
An artist like yourself must be overjoyed to meet such a perfect subject. I'd be happy to hold any pose---in any state of dress---that you think best captures my beauty.
Meeting an artist on this planet must have been fated! I've never been the subject of a painting before---we should get started right after the game, don't you think?
Is there some kind of dress code among male swindlers? Earthy brown tones and a smug grin on your face? Oh, I'm mad just thinking about that thief Rabat...
I don't suppose you have any makeup products to sell me? That's how that snake Rabat managed to win our crew over. You look and sound just like him.
Oh, are we so blessed as to have a self-styled "Love God" playing with us? You must be the authority on men's sexuality.
It seems like Earth has a god just to answer all my prayers! And all my questions. My homeworld doesn't have any men, so I hope you can share your infinite wisdom.
You're a man? I guess with a slim enough frame, a dress might hide the differences. Our navigator tried once and just couldn't hide those blocky male shoulders.
...At least you're honest, I guess. Do men have a habit of dressing like us to try and fit in? The bridge tells me our navigator gave it a try once, too.
You know, my girlfriend hasn't shown the slightest interest in the men we took aboard. A man with the antiques she collects might have the only shot at changing that.
You think yourself awfully handsome, don't you? My girlfriend Barnette couldn't care less about men's looks...but she might like those antiques of yours.
Ugh, just how hairy can men get? I can only imagine how thick and tangled it gets underneath your clothes. Is this the style on Earth?
Is this what Earth girls want in men? All that dirty, ugly, snaggly, coarse-looking hair...and that's just what I can see now. Keep your shirt on!
Who's this robot who gets to command his own spotlight? I should be the one with a camera crew.
Do robots make enough money on Earth to fund their own media teams? Well, we all know who tonight's guest star is going to be, don't we?
Men take multiple wives on this planet? That's just risqué. And don't be tempted to add me to the pile, Aster---I happen to have a lovely girlfriend.

What kind of family unit has a baby with a male parent and a dozen mothers?
...Well, I guess our crew all pitches in for Ezra's baby. In any case, I'm taken.
A whole harem, huh? Married couples are so ingrained on Mejare, it's hard to imagine. I guess Barnette and I could just marry a man together...oh, I can't do that.
Would you believe me if I said I only knew three men, and you're still not the shrimpiest I've ever seen?
Well, now. Maybe our shrimpy little male pilot isn't so alone in his weight class. Aren't men supposed to grow big and strong?
Is it this common for men to be so short? I could probably throw you around myself. I thought our mech pilot maybe just wasn't eating right, but here's another shrimp.
Didn't you say you studied animals or something? What are you "collecting data" on us for? Some weird Earth experiment?
Just what are you up to with that tablet-thing? I have reasons not to trust Earth scientists, you know! Especially one who said he studies animals!
So, Earth actually has manned mech fleets. Is there room for two in one of your "Sentinels," like my elegant Vandread?
Do you happen to share the cockpit of one of these Sentinel mechs? My own Vandread has a luxurious revolving-chair setup for me and my co-pilot.
Hahaha. You could say Basil is my middle name! You've even got a girlish look to you!
"Basil." Don't tell me my middle name is a man's name. Not that he's far from a woman.
Were you born in a test tube somewhere? Those sperm cells men have might be awfully volatile.
Mix, huh? I hope this isn't what happens when you splice men's seed the wrong way.
Trying to dodge hits forever is pretty risky, you know. I like a powerful shield that lets me size up the enemy.
I'm more of the defensive type in a fight. You have to be able to afford a few mistakes if you want to survive.
If you're the embodiment of death, then maybe there's a reason our crew's defied it for so long. Why would you joke about that?
If you ask me, death looks like a Harvest mothership. The only thing scary about you is how funny you find it.
Does Earth have seven-card draw or something? Hey! I deserve a hand as big as the cauldron-man!
Why's this stupid vase getting extra cards? If we're playing favorites, it should be by beauty.
A walking, thinking bomb? Barnette orders missiles on every sortie...she'd get herself killed if she ever finds you.
My girlfriend always stocks all the bombs her Dread can carry. I don't need them smiling at her, too.
...Not that I feel my most beautiful in the bathroom, but that doesn't mean I want encouragement.
...Uhhhm. I understand bathroom gossip, but...back home, we don't gossip with the toilet.
For someone who specializes in cleaning up Earth's messes, I'd have expected some dirty- or ugly-looking guy. You're not even that old!
I expected the worst from some grizzled "bioorganics agent." So you never got exposed to something that ruined your youthful looks?
"Uno" must be some old Earth game. Or is it what men prefer, since they're so bad at poker? Maybe it's in bars across Tarak.
Men aren't much good at poker. Is "Uno" their game of choice? I never asked our prisoners about it.
Eugh, what kind of germs are buried under that fur coat? Even worse, it's packed under tight clothes.
Thieving in the night sounds like a good way to build up dirt and grime. Then you stuff all that fur into tight pants, and...ew.
How many men on Earth have a taste for the fab and fashionable? I'd hate for most of them to be dirty or ugly, instead of---well-dressed.
A man who knows how important it is to look good---that might be a rare find. Do you think you're special that way?
Ech! Is that garlic and---rotten eggs? Ugh...I should've known strip poker would attract dirty, ugly guys.
Is that smell what I think it is? Yuck. Even for men, shouldn't there be a certain beauty requirement to get in?
Are you actually proud of being greasy? And a "whore"? And I was thinking you might look decent if we hosed you off and shaved you.

Who're you calling a whore?
...Yourself? It's not a good thing, you know. You can learn about that alongside hygiene.
Ewwww, what is that thing? Those claws, that bushy tail---it looks like it might have some kind of disease. Don't let it touch me!
Aaaagh, is that---some rodent, or something? Keep it away from me, got it? It's all---dirty, it has to be!
Men don't mind getting dirty, do they? I don't want to fight if my hair's not brushed. You're hiking around, letting animals crawl all over you...
Haah. Our doctor digs around in blood, Hibiki's always greased-up with his mech...and you trudge through forests with your pets? Men must not care about being clean.
You seem pretty upstanding, Mr. Dunban. I was on an away team to an old relay station, and all the men catcalled me the minute I stepped out of the shuttle.
I remember getting teased by a crowd of men on an old frontier base. If they're the average type, I guess you're pretty polite.
Ugh, losing an arm like that...fighting left-handed is one thing. But there's also...
Oh, I'm really sorry about your arm. From one sword to another, you know, having to switch hands. And besides---ugh, I don't want to think about it!
Oh! I had no idea makeup worked on men. I mean, you're pretty, the way I'm used to! Please tell me Earth's full of your type.
Wow! Most guys seem so dirty and ugly. But you look clean and groomed...and kind of like a girl. Are there more of you?
So there are men who know how important it is to take care of their hair. You wouldn't know it from our prisoners. I can smell your product from here!
Our prisoners either grow their hair out or just shave it off. Why don't they do some grooming, like you or me? It feels so lush and silky...
You're not trying to fool anyone, right? I mean, you've just come out and said you're a man in girls' clothes.
Hey, you're really a guy, right? Even though that's the kind of outfit you'd see on Mejare. Is it even a disguise?
Even a slender little guy ends up building big, bulky mechs. What is it with those things? I piloted one once and couldn't stand how it moved!
Ugggh, I'm getting a headache just picturing one of those "Sentinels" you build. It's got to be some big lumbering machine---I could barely get the men's Van-types to move!
I'm getting awkward flashbacks to trying out the Van-types. Men really must be obsessed with mechs---you're as sleek as they come, and you don't design a Dread?
You're so sheepish! I don't know why, but it's not a good look for a man. I don't even really like it in girls...
I don't get it. When a girl acts all shy, it's at least kind of cute. But when a guy does it, it's just irritating.
Did you say something about having chocolate to share? I hate to say it, but I've got a big sweet tooth...
What exactly is "Tobb-ler-own"? If you brought a big chocolate stash, you have to give me some. Barnette's sweets have ruined me.
I guess some guys pull off the feminine look more than others. It's a little weird, but I like how it gets you to clean up.
Men seem like they're so dirty half the time. If it takes dressing in girls' clothes to fix that---w-well, I guess it makes you prettier.
I remember when me and my friends used to make up our own card games at sleepovers. That's kind of what "Uno" sounds like.
Are you sure Uno's a real game? I remember when I was a little girl and we just messed around with cards, like who could build the prettiest house.
So you don't like boobs at alllll, is what you're saying? But they're my best asset...or, well, maybe my hair...
Saying you're a butt guy just makes me want to get you to change teams. Doesn't my chest look big and supple? Come oooooon.
Heeeey, you have a girlfriend, right? I'm sure she likes Uno, too. How does the whole man-woman thing work with couples?
You have a girlfriend, too, right? Dating a man long-term...that's a weird thought. You must've bonded over Uno.
What techniques do they teach you as a soldier? You know, stance, positioning? I never got that kind of formal training.
I'm guessing a lot of your combat training was how to wield that sword. Me, I've really had to learn on the fly, at least for serious stuff.
S-so, you got hurt just holding some special sword? It's not good for much if no one's allowed to wield it.
That's not even a battle injury, right? Your own sword gave it to you? Maybe it's super special, but I'd rather have a weapon that lets me use it.

I-I'm still warming up to this whole men thing, OK? Nothing dirty or ugly. Or hairy!
...Except on top.
A-ah...you know, big blonde hair is something I could've gotten behind. Hair on your head! You have to ease me in to what men are like!
Ugh, this guy is so aggressive. Are we already down to his---his thing?
T-this whole game is going---full-throttle. Is that it now, your underwear's gone? Is---it coming out already?
You shouldn't be toying around with us, you know! Don't you have any sympathy for me? I'm trying to figure out how this whole planet works!
...Is there more? I don't deserve to be made fun of! I came a long way here to learn about men---seriously!
I can only imagine how bad it is in a spot where girls grow hair. Good thing I still have to imagine...
Maybe I should be grateful. If this is his chest, imagine the hair...down below.
Girls say I'm like the Sun together with Barnette. Who knew there were partners who take that so literally.
Are you two dating or something? I'll believe anything at this point. In fact, girls say I'm the Sun to Barnette's Moon.
O-oh...uughhh! Oh, no, has that red light always been on Earth? It's splitting my head open, being so close---!
A-agh...aaaaagh! U-uhnnn...my head. I can feel it, that same horrible light that's attacked us before...
The way men treat this sort of thing, it's like a---sword! You keep it sheathed until it's needed, and it could---hurt or help.
Mr. Dunban, this---almost feels like another sword! Something men are proud of... but not taken out lightly.
So how human are you, exactly? I mean---do you have DNA? You must have a sex drive if you came here.
Try not to make my head spin with the details, but---what's going on with you underneath? Like, your programming for feelings...or sex.
Mr. Dunban, you look a lot more---nimble somehow! Like all those clothes were just weighing you down. I'm glad your sword's gone...
You already seemed like you knew how to handle yourself, but---I don't know. Even with that arm, it seems like you're moving better now---near-nude.

You know, if this Nancy girl isn't interested, you're better off just chasing someone else.
...Oh, is that what you're doing here?
I guess you're about ready to run off on "Nancy" for good, right? If you wandered all the way here. And just look at the girls you've found.
Am I right that you really want kids? That's a nice change of pace from our prisoners...
Soooo...you dream of having a family, right? Jura's been turned down by all the men in her life...
Ugh, why couldn't I get my girlfriend to stay? Yours seems to already know what you're thinking...and couldn't be happier to listen.
Mohhhn, don't remind Jura how lonely she'll be all game! Even some towering man can bring his girlfriend and have her jump whenever he calls!
What's a prince traveling the land for, anyway? Stripping with outlaws? Shouldn't you two be living in opulence?
I don't know why a self-proclaimed prince is goofing off here, sharpening his blade and rubbing shoulders with pirates...
So you two are some kind of---fighting duo? The swordplay I get, but...does she charge it up with light or something?
I figure Pandoria does a little more to back you up in combat than lighting the way. I'm just not sure what it might be, and how it'd combo with a sword...

state.text: You have kept mentioning your enormous sword. I don't tend to take big opponents like this head-on...
Ohh. T-this must be the Dreamsmasher I've heard so much about, ready to be unsheathed.

case.state:
You two have my flair for elegance!
...Or at least, you know how to be showoffs. A fight's not complete without a good flourish!
I like your attitude, the two of you. Battle isn't just about winning---it's about looking great doing it, and making sure the enemy knows your name!

state.text: ...You really are some kind of lightbulb-girl. Are you sure that chunk of yourself won't turn Zeke all glassy?
I thought I was just seeing things, but no, you've illuminated all your bulbs. How do you know Zeke won't absorb that crystal and start glowing?

case.state: The losses continue. I mean, you're a man, so I wasn't expecting much brainpower.
Still haven't lost, you know. Don't worry, I look for handsomeness in my men, not brainpower.
Still shaky on how poker works, ~player~? I know it's a lot of numbers for a man to keep track of.
Another step towards a wonderful little anatomy lesson.
Going to make it, ~player~? Are all the numbers and shapes overwhelming your primate brain?
I know I've lost my sword, ~player~, but you shouldn't get all cocky.
Just calm down, ~player~. Everything will be fine...for me.
I understand. You've never seen a Mejarian before---we tend to draw the eye.
Is this game getting to you, ~player~? Shall I ask them to turn down the heat?
Are men into feet? Can't think of why else you'd be so distracted.
Feeling sour about your bad luck? You can peek at my toes. Men like that, right?
Don't get down on yourself. You've lasted this long with your mental disability---being a man.
I know all my accessories are frustrating, ~player~, but do try to concentrate.
Can't bear to go on after that sleeves trickery, huh?
Tiny male brain all out of steam? Don't worry, there's handsomer men in my life already.
Are you just doing this to appease me? You're so sweet, ~player~! I like you.
Got anything witty to say? I hope so, because your cards aren't doing that for you.
Don't give out on me now, ~player~. You're closer to seeing me nude than you think!
Come on, now. What good is a man who can't fly steady down the stretch?
Focus, ~player~. You're on the golden road...and I don't mean my hair.
I knew men got distracted by large breasts, but come on, ~player~, get it together.
Oho. My master plan of distracting you with my gorgeous chest is well underway!
I'm not embarrassed, ~player~, so try not to embarrass yourself.
Can't you force this Mejarian to take off her tiny little thong? I mean, really.
You know, I'm offended. My beautiful outfit should have been more distracting than my body!
I just knew flipping my hair back would get to you. Can't focus anymore, Mr. Manly-Man?
Trouble focusing? Yeah, my hair is my super-secret weapon.
It's OK to be overwhelmed, ~player~. After a lifetime of boring Earth women, this alien woman from Mejare comes along and strips for you.
Is something distracting you, ~player~? Something exotic, gorgeous, female, and double?
Oh, come on, ~player~. I'm fairly certain Mejarian and Earth vaginas are the same. What are you staring at?
Don't you have a game to win, ~player~? Or are you totally overcome by my beauty? It's so embarrassing!
My, my, my. Gearing up to join me, ~player~? I'm certainly in the mood to get some seed from you.
Keep going, ~player~...I want to see you nude, and what it'll do to me when I'm like this.
I don't know what to tell you, ~player~. I could understand losing this miserably if I were still playing, but...
Still enjoying your silly card game? Sure you're not unconsciously ready to join me down here?
Keep up the good work, ~player~. Shame you couldn't strip this much when we were---you know, but I guess I'll have to live with purely rational analysis.
Really inconsiderate timing to suddenly strip a whole bunch, ~player~. I've already finished---I can't just go again right away.
And who might you be? ..."Master"? Is that really your name, or some kind of weird Earth version of "Mistress"?
..."Master," was it? I don't know what makes you think I'm going to just submit to a man. I have the proud womanhood of Mejare to uphold, you know.
...Is "Master" some kind of title? You don't have to be all formal just because I'm dressed nice. Why don't I have you call me "Ensign Elden"?
"Master" can't really be your name. What, are you afraid of women, too, even on Earth? Come on, be friendly and introduce yourself.

Aren't you going to introduce yourself? Being a man, and all.
..."Daddy"? Hey, isn't that what you call the men you have as parents?
..."Daddy," you said? That sounds like the "Dad" our prisoners call those male parents they have. If that's a nickname, well...we just met each other, you know.

And you are?
..."Daddy"? That sounds familiar---like what men call their parents. Well, only my girlfriend gets to call me Mommy.

state.text:
Oh, Barne---
{barnette}I-is that a first-model CZ 75? It's in great shape! H-how close are we to its first production date...?
Hey, Barnette, it's not just in our time that men like kinetics. There's a guy called ~player~ here with one that looks just like your CZ...OK, don't get too excited...
W-wha---! ~player~, your gun---it's the short-rail and everything! I've got one, too! Are we in their heyday?
...Is that a CZ 75, ~player~? Barnette would never let me forget what it looks like. You're gonna be the first man to earn a second glance from her...

Oh, Barne---
{barnette}I-is that a MAC-10? It's in great shape! H-how close are we to its first production date...?
Hey, Barnette, it's not just in our time that men like kinetics. There's a guy called ~player~ here...he's got that pistol you have with the bolt and the big magazine...
W-wha---! ~player~, your gun---I've got one, too! T-the suppressor's not really my thing, either...
Sheesh, ~player~, our reputation precedes us. You heard about the man-terrorizing women of Mejare and brought your SMG.

case.state: ...What, are we supposed to feel bad for you? Let's see some of that trademark dumb luck men always pull out of nowhere.
Quite the streak you had there. Was that beginner's luck, or do men actually understand how numbers work?
That took long enough. More male skin for me!
Don't get a big head over that streak, handsome. You still haven't even touched me.
Feeling good about yourself, ~player~? You have yet to beat a Mejarian woman.
Think that streak has changed my mind about men? Not quite...but keep it up.
Good show, ~player~. Got any more of that luck in you? I hope not, or I won't see the good stuff.
I'm still not impressed. How do I know you weren't just lucky?
Not bad at all for a man. But I've got a long way to go, and you just lost your momentum.
Never thought a man would keep me on my toes...or force me to expose them in the first place.
Finally put a dent in that lucky streak. One step closer to seeing you bare!
Come now, your luck can't last forever. I'm positively desperate to see your tube-thing.
If you want to see me naked, your streaks are going to have to last longer than that.
Didn't think a man had that kind of luck in him. I mean, if men were lucky, they'd be born women.
I do know one smart man---Duero, our doctor. And I'd say he's got better hair.
Hey hey. For a second there, a man was giving me a run for my money.
Not bad at all. I like looks, but maybe I'll have your baby so she's smart instead.
Really hanging around, huh, ~player~? Well, not enough to get me out of my dress!
Good work with that streak...but it wasn't enough to make me streak.
I have to hand it to you, ~player~. The men in my life are either terrible at cards or too serious to play them.
And you were soooo close to getting me out of my dress! But no, it's your turn again.
Do men frustrate easily? I hope so, because that streak could have saved you---and exposed me.
Stellar job keeping your focus, especially for a man. I know it can be hard with a gorgeous naked alien woman eyeing you up.
Can't seem to shake you at all, handsome. Maybe you're more into women's vaginas? Well, you'll need more luck to see mine.
Guess you're not a "breasts" sort of guy, to stay focused like that. But then, I'm not sure if any men care about breasts like Mejarians do.
I hope you're proud of your little lucky streak. I saw you staring with your beady little eyes, so I know it wasn't skill.
Can't believe a man has been hogging all my luck. Look how I'm forced to stand because of cruel fortune!
There's just no shaking an Earth man, is there? I guess you're all too used to naked women.

Hey, do you think I'm some brainless blonde who can't remember your name? You're that creepy Ini girl, "Dahlia"!
You look so cute in that costume. Hanging around me must've brightened your spirit over all this time.
Honestly, I could hardly get you to wear a Christmas hat back in the day! It's my influence that's softened you up, you know!
Oh, it's you, the cute little horseback rider whose skirt was too short for her backside. I see you've dropped all pretense of modesty.
Oh, how cute, you've brought a stuffed animal. A bit childish for someone stripping---I have another person to cuddle in bed.
Aren't you a little old to be clinging to plush toys? Adults cuddle each other in bed.
Aren't you that timid Florina girl who had several layers of armor? Who forced you into such a risqué bunny suit?
Well, now! Haven't you matured, Miss Pegasus? You're dressed more provocatively than I am, after all your crying last time!

state.text: U-uh---! A-aren't you---that fiery muscle girl with the tattoos? I didn't mean fiery so literally! S-stay back!
Agh! R-Rinkah? W-what demon crawled inside your head since last time and set it on fire? Don't touch me!

case.state: Well, you were already showing more skin than me the last time we met. What do you wear on Christmas, three pieces of tape?
I admit, I've never dressed as any "sexy animal" for Halloween...it just seems so cliché. I'll have to give it more thought this year...
...Wait a minute. Aren't you that creepy island girl who was always going on about having sex with animals? God, what've you done to your skin?
...You're that oversexed island girl, aren't you? I heard men's seed is a pearly white...I guess you've had a bit too much of it.
And who have we here? It's...eugh. The girl who threatens bodily harm because our names sound alike. Are you enjoying your summer?
Oh, not you again. We're only a vowel apart, and you wanted to tear me apart for that. Just go for a swim and leave me alone!
You're a stirring mermaid, are you? Something about being around you certainly stirs up headaches...
Oh, that's so much better. I'm glad you've freed yourself from all that heavy armor---now let your beauty breathe.
You're that haughty girl with the magical staff and way too much armor. I'm sure this is only for summer, but you ought to just wear it year-round.
Waitress, be a dear and bring me some fruity drink---mostly fruit, and a little bit drink. Thank you!
Hello there, Miss Pinkie. How can you stomach being dressed so scandalously---is that all Earth's Easter is?
Oh, if it isn't the pink-haired, pink-skinned girl from before. What caused you to dress so Mejarian-esque? Earth's Easter?
Oh, don't remind me of my Barnette's cooking with that burger-tube. I'm afraid I'll get fat, the way she feeds me...
Well, look who's passed all her officer's exams! And just what exactly earned you big, hulking Jeralt's final seal of approval?
Oh, are you a fully-fledged officer now, Leonie? And here I am, still stuck as a sub-team leader on the squadron. What'd you do to butter up your mentor?
Ah, it's the Officer-in-Training. "Beach fun" isn't another test your captain assigned you, right? I think I got some of that treatment in school.
Hey, I remember you, Leonie. "Captain Jeralt's" favorite student, out for a sunbathe. You know, I think my old teachers sometimes wanted to see me work up a sweat.
Weren't you that uptight swordfighter in the full bodystocking? I see summer's finally convinced you to air out your pores.
I could never suffocate my body in that big stocking you were in last time. Don't you feel a lot freer for the summertime like this?
Even our flightsuits are too stuffy for me. I feel better just seeing how you've ditched that bodystocking--- enjoy the sweat dripping off.
Ooh, you're classmates? Is this an after-school date? I've never seen a man-woman couple!
Ooh, you two go to school together? Are you on a date? Romance between a boy and a girl---in the flesh!
Classmates? Seems we might be intruding on a little man-woman action---but I guess that's common on Earth, right?
A beautiful blond boy and girl, going to the same school? Strange venue for a date, but I'm too excited to see a male-female romance in person to care!
My, what kind of perverted students is your school generating, going to strip poker together? Well, since you're here...show me how men and women love each other.
Jeez, what a head case. Good thing she's got her girlfriend here to keep her in check.
Running, running, running. We're not trying to kill you here, you know.
Time for take two, everyone. Better than the first, perhaps?
And there she goes. Poor little thing, beaten down by the world.
Ooh, a schooldate? Far be it from me to understand men's tastes, but I'm not sure you've got the height to woo your handsome blonde classmate here.
I think I can see what's going on here, Shorty. You're in love with your blonde hunk-o-man here, and you're playing strip poker with him so he ignores your more beautiful classmates.
Classmates? Is this the last desperate move from the short, bespectacled girl's playbook? Land a man by dropping the pretenses and playing strip poker with him?
Oh, Little Miss Four-eyes, I'm sorry for interrupting your plan to strip for your blonde classmate. He'll just be staring at me the whole time.
It doesn't take enormous lenses to see through your plan, Futaba---you want to strip for your classmate here. Men are dumb, it could work.
Oh my God, Meia! This Sei girl looks just like you! Ask her out, would you?
Deep, gorgeous eyes, short blue hair, even armor! Meia, you and Sei were made for each other!
Oh my God, Meia, look how adorable Sei is! She's like you if you were a few inches shorter and knew how to smile.
Meia, if you don't ask Sei out, I will personally do it for you. She looks just like you---imagine the cute blue-haired babies!
S-so, uh, Meia! I know you and Sei got off on the wrong foot, but look what a cute couple you'd make! Blue hair, gorgeous eyes!
...Better defuse things. Hey, Sei, maybe you want to give my boss another chance? She's crabby, but you two would be so cute together!
I'm sorry Meia was so rude before, Sei. You're as cute as a button---and a cheery girlfriend would really lighten her up!
Please don't judge my boss too harshly, Sei. If you'd like to brighten her mood, she's single!
Oh, Sei, you're such a cutie, and opposites attract! Please understand Meia's unease with soldiers---and think of your cute blue-haired babies together.
Is she ever. All Meia needs is a woman's touch to melt away all her tension...
More than single, Sei---desperately single. She's so overworked and stressed...if only a girl were there in her bed each night.
Ohoho. There's single, and then there's my boss here. She's married to the job.
Is that an invitation, Sei? My leader acts all-business, but she's a sweet little thing beneath the ice...
Well, you're certainly swamped with work, yes. But that just means you need to find a girl who'll relieve all that stress.
Of course, but you'd handle your work a lot better if a woman were there for you. You know, to massage the tension out.
Oh, just stop it. Having a ton of work is no excuse---I'm second-ranked, and I need Barnette around to handle all that stress!
So go and find a girl who's just as work-obsessed, Leader. She'll leave you alone...and then the two of you can snuggle your stress away.
M-Meia? What are you egging her on for? You---always defuse things!
H-hey, Meia, this woman's nuts! Guns or no guns, she's going to try to kill you!
...Meia? What's gotten into you, taunting her like that? What if she does it?
Uh, Leader? What happened to cool, collected Meia Gisborn? The girl who defuses arguments?
What's the deal with this woman, Rinkah? You know each other? You take orders from her?
So is this girl your commanding officer, Rinkah? You certainly treat her that way.
My, Rinkah, your commanding officer is such a young, fresh-faced woman! Ours is a wizened old crone.
You can cut your hair short, Corrin, but you're still such a cute young girl! I can't believe you order Rinkah around.
Hey, what did I just walk in on? Are you two soldiers trying to get to know each other a little better?
My, what a fierce-looking pair of women the two of you are! Have the flames of war lit a fire in your hearts?
The two of you are soldiers? Well, if you're playing this together, you're probably more lovers than fighters at this point.
Interesting choice of a first date, you little fighting lovebirds! But I understand---my girlfriend is a pilot just like me.
And what do we have here? Two little soldiers interested on the bodies beneath the armor? Hey, plenty of womanly love blooms on the battlefield.
Heeheehee! This embarrassed act isn't fooling me---you're just trying to get closer to your ladyfriend here!
Figures such an embarrassed girl would use this as a roundabout way to strip in front of her crush. Just ask her out, Florina!
Friends? I don't buy it---you want Lyn so badly, don't you? You don't need to play a stripping game to ask her out!
As a Mejarian, Florina, I can see two women in love a mile away. I know you're embarrassed, but there's better ways to get close than strip poker.
Oh my God, you're sisters? Don't tell me this sort of thing is a family-friendly Earth pastime!
Oh, wow, I'm playing at the incest table. Is this a thing on Earth? Is your mother stripping elsewhere in the establishment?
Why would you ever invite your sister to strip poker? Unless incest is culturally accepted on this fine blue planet.
Sisters? Well, you're both cuties, but I can't help but imagine this is awkward for you. Or do Earthlings do this all the time?
Wait, wait, wait! Are you two a couple? Ohhhh, that's so cute! Show me some magic!
Oh, do we have two magical lovebirds at the table? The feisty one and the shy one?
I didn't know Earth women could fall in love, too! I bet having all that magic creates some explosive nights together!
You two make such a cute couple! Sola, how'd a shy thing like you land such a fiery girl like this? Did you use your magic?
Pfft! Well, now we know how Earth soldiers act on downtime---taking their little sisters to strip poker games!
Is this the kind of values they teach you in the military? "Strip in front of your little sister"?
Premature white hair, weapons, grim expressions? You don't need to tell me you're sisters---though I do question a soldier's ethics to bring her little sister here.
Well, looks like we're stuck with a pair of literal ice queens! And they're related---I guess they don't teach you that's weird in Earth's military.
I love that Cupid costume on you! It's weirdly...serene. Maybe it's just your dignified look.
That costume is so gaudy, but you make it work! It must be because you're as stoic as ever.
Haahhhn, I remember the day I fell in love with Barnette. We were so annoyed at each other, and then---it was like an arrow hit me!

I felt lovestruck with Barnette, as if by an arrow.
...You know, after we crashlanded and nearly froze to death.
Don't you wish you could fly with those wings for real? Descend from the heavens, blessing us with perfect love...
Are you dropping the wings now? I wish I had wings...real ones. Hovering like an angel above adoring followers... you get it?

Ahaha...it is hard to imagine you pregnant, Meia.
...But it's not hard to imagine you with a baby!
That would get in the way of combat, Meia...a big pregnant belly, and some bigger boobs, too. Babies sure seem to take a liking to you, though!
...So? What's your sense of this place?
...You think it's OK for us to be here, then?
Didn't Miss Gasco give you this treatment when you joined? Playing cards, I mean. You were a bit of a problem child.
I've never seen you play cards, but I heard that some sparks flew in your games with Miss Gasco. Everyone heard about the rookie gnashing her teeth.

You know, if you didn't work out so much, your breasts would be bigger.
...But I guess if your breasts were bigger, you wouldn't work out so much.
I keep telling you you'll burn away your breasts if you train too hard, and here you are acting all embarrassed about it.
Was my dress a little too high-class for this game? Maybe I should've brought gymwear, too, and worked up a sweat.
You know, you might have the right idea with just wearing gym clothes. We're not being elegant here---just dirty and sweaty.
...I know I teased you a little, but you've got a nice, slim look. I mean, the way you move around---I'll just bounce everywhere.
You know? I think we make a great pair. I'm prettier in a pinup, but you look better in motion.
If you're really so anxious about your size, you could always have a baby. It turns out you're pretty good with them.

state.text: I don't think any of us took you for a Fama, but it turns out you can babysit pretty well. Just think of what it'd do for your bustline!

case.state: ~player~ this, ~player~ that. Are you always this desperate, or is it because of my beautiful Mejarian body?
You're such an obsessive little witch of a girl. I bet she's feeling a bit inadequate at the moment, isn't she, ~player~?
You know, Tharja, you really shouldn't obsess over one girl so much. A more well-endowed woman might swipe her away.
It's so cute to watch Tharja squirm whenever I shake my breasts, isn't it, ~player~? I think she's worried about me!
~player~ this, ~player~ that. Are you always this desperate, or is it because of my beautiful Mejarian body?
You're such an obsessive little witch of a girl. I bet she's feeling a bit inadequate at the moment, isn't she, ~player~?
You know, Tharja, you really shouldn't obsess over one man so much. A more well-endowed woman might swipe him away.
It's so cute to watch Tharja squirm whenever I shake my breasts, isn't it, ~player~? I think she's worried about me!
Oh. Am I intruding on your little love affair with ~player~? Jealousy is attractive, but desperation isn't.
~player~, are you and Tharja an item? She sure treats you like it, but she sounds so desperate to me.
Oh. Am I intruding on your little love affair with ~player~? I'd just love to steal a man away from an Earth girl.
~player~, are you and Tharja an item? I hope it's not normal for women to patrol about their men like desperate lapdogs.
Oh...? I know that look in your eye, Tharja. You're not about to...?
Are you...? Why are you so jealous, Tharja? You'd have more luck with ~player~ if you didn't fly off the handle at the slightest flirting. Leave the old woman alone.
Oh, are you about to curse her for flirting now, Tharja? I swear to God, if you touch me again---!
...Tharja, are you seriously---? I understand being jealous of me, but she's an old hag! She's got enough problems without you hexing her!
Why are you gnashing your teeth now, Tharja? It's Jessie turn. ...Oh, no. What, you're jealous of some cryptkeeper because she's got F-cups? At least I warrant that kind of envy!
Haha! No, I'd say dreaded is accurate, at least if you ask the trainees!
Hmhmhm. I don't know, Meia, you're definitely dreaded for a few of the rookies. Just look how you make Dita freeze up.
Of course we are! Didn't our exotically ravishing beauty give that away? ...I think they're just jealous, Meia.
Hmph. You know what I think? Earthlings just don't want to believe there's a whole planet of women as beautiful as we are.
It boggles the mind, Leader. Perhaps it gives Earth girls comfort to think our beauty can be achieved on this little rock.
"Are we from outer space." I hate to disappoint, but you won't find such perfect examples of the female form anywhere but Mejare.
Why, yes! And a magnificent ship it is---although I preferred my name, the "Luxury Night."
Ah, yes, the Nirvana! A fabulous name for an incredible ship. I came up with the Luxury Night, though---much better.
Do you not the like the name, Miss Nippon? I admit, we should've gone with my choice---the "Luxury Night."
Yes, yes, B.C. named it the Nirvana. I maintain that my choice, the "Luxury Night," was far more elegant.
Aliens? Hmph. I like to kid, but we're fully human, you know! Haven't you heard of Mejare?
Hey, Mister N, try to get your facts straight about us. Mejarians are human, too!
Hey, who're you calling aliens? I was joking if I said that. Mejare was settled by Earth women, you know.
Oh, we're remarkably human-like indeed, Mister N. It's almost as if Mejarians are human. So much for your smarts.
Hm? Well, I'm hardly in the mood for it, but maybe. It's a shame Barnette doesn't appreciate a sword's grace like I do.
Oh, is she? I hardly ever get a sparring partner--- Barnette wants to go to the firing range when I want to fence.
Oh, does Meia know what she's talking about, Connie? Even my own girlfriend won't fence with me---I could wear my spacesuit for some makeshift gear.
...Hey, Meia, I think Shouko is using some of the men's language! Those big, ugly symbols...
Are you having a hard time reading Shouko's handwriting, Meia? She's mixing in men's language. Those, uh---kanji.
Shouko, you should know women's writing is mostly kana. You know, simple and elegant? What are you using men's writing for half the time?
...Oh? You don't need magic powers to sense some feminine conflict here. Shouldn't you be jealous of a younger girl, Tharja?
...Oh. All that jealous anger seems to be boiling over. Tharja, she's, like, in her forties. She's not worth popping a blood vessel over.
Is it the old lady's turn again? ...God, Tharja, simmer down. Breast size isn't everything---you're younger and prettier than her, you know.

Miss Jessie's turn again.
...Did you always dream of having F-cups or something, Tharja? Why do you feel so threatened by this relic?
...Tharja? You seem more jealous about the fortysomething with possible implants flirting with ~player~ than me. I can't help but feel insulted.
We didn't go to the same school, if that's what you're asking. No racy stories of girlhood passion.
Mhmhm. Sorry, but we don't go back that far. I think I would've been a year ahead of you, right, Meia?
Oh, don't think we've got any schoolgirl-stories together. We met as pirates. You were in a different district, weren't you, Meia?

I know what your simple male mind is thinking, but we weren't classmates.
...Neither of us even finished school, did we? For the same reason.
Mhmhm. You're wasting your time, Chazz. I can't even set her up with a girl.
Hahahaha! I'm sure your friend appreciates you playing matchmaker, Chazz, but Meia won't even date a girl on our ship! Let him down easy.
W-what? I'm not that shameless! If this girl were a pilot, she'd sell us out for some Paksis crystal.
Hey---Meia, don't compare me to this tramp. I don't pop my breasts out to make a point!
M-Meiaaaa! When I say I don't mind being seen, that doesn't mean I'll tear my dress off for attention!
Why don't you ask her crewmate, Fina? Meia's always in the sim rooms drafting Dread formations. We all wish she'd spend more time with us.
Mhm...we owe a lot to Meia, Fina. We'd have a closer relationship if she wanted one. She's usually off alone somewhere.
...I don't know, Meia, maybe we should give this girl a chance. She did sound pretty sincere.
...Haaaahn. What do you think, Meia? Benefit of the doubt? At worst, maybe she's just doing what she's told.
Nagisa? It is you! Why are you all dressed up like a maid now? You ought to be a fairy or an elf.
Is that so? Well, Ami, you've got to let me know how to become an Earth model. I'm a bit of an outlaw on Mejare, after all.
Thanks for the tip, Meia. Leave it to you to gather a little intel on our friends here...how's life as an Earth model?
Ooh, she's a model? Now I'm curious...that was always my dream job, after all.
Hey, what's all this about the middle of Earth? Is there a spot underground that only you elf-people get to live in?
And I call you pale, Meia. Arwen here looks almost ghostly...is that just the way elves are?
Hey, what's up with those pointy ears? And that pallid skin? You're a strange one, "elf" girl.
So you call yourself an elf, right? Is that another word for "Earthling with crazy ears"? Because you look human otherwise.
Well, aren't you a cute little thing in ancient-looking armor? Catria, you said?
Are you from a time before electricity? That armor is like a prehistoric version of what Meia wears.
Ooh, you've got on chest-and-shoulder armor like Meia here. Hers looks a lot more modern, though---and I think she wears it better.
Omigosh, Catria, you're so adorably shy! And you've got such old-fashioned armor on---it's so cool!
See, Meia, I think you do the "strong, silent type" thing pretty well. Chell here is an example of taking it too far.
Slow on the uptake? The "strong, silent type" doesn't mean literally never speaking, you know.
