Oh, don't feel bad. I know you're speechless at the sight of me---but I'll do enough talking for both of us!
Stunned into speechlessness? I'm flattered, but really, you can talk to me. I won't mind.
Hey, Chell. If I'm the most gorgeous woman you've ever met, don't say anything.
Oh. I can see where this is going, Ice Queen.
Flirting, are we Meia? I figured as much. Best to let the lovebirds just figure things out on their own.
Meia, you're just setting yourself up for disappointment. Earth girls don't like each others' bodies the way we do.
Ooh, you're so cute when a woman actually gets you going! She'll deny it now, Chun, but Meia here is totally into you.
Where'd you say you were from? Planet Korea? Well then, it seems Korea and Mejare share a fashion sense...
You're a cutie, Miss Bodysuit, if a little on the short side. Is that just how they make women over on Planet Korea?
Well, everyone, cards on the table. Who wears the whole bodysuit look better---D.Va or my miserable old boss here?
You're an adorable little thing, D.Va! All wrapped up in that cute bodysuit, just like another pilot I know...who might be sitting here.
I understand. You're so stunned by my beauty that you hid your own face in shame. I'm sure you're still cute!
Don't hide that pretty little face on my account. You've certainly got a beautiful figure.
Look, Meia, a girl with your fashion sense---though apparently she needs a mask to match your sheer lack of emotion.
You've got a lot of sass for someone who won't show her face, Miss Masked. Hiding some grisly injury, or just your own embarrassment?
I know I'm a foreign woman, but can't you be more friendly? What's your real name?
Going by just a code name, are we? You must find the alien woman pretty scary---or you're just miserable.
You're too stoic for your own good, Miss Machine---just like Meia here. But even she uses her real name.
What kind of woman just gives "HK416" for her name? My Barnette is a sour little muffin, too, and she loves guns like you do.
What's up, sourpuss? You look even more miserable than a certain squadron leader I know...the one right next to us.
Hey, lighten up. I could have gotten this mood from playing poker with Meia back on the ship.
Yawn...are you really going to be a miserable bore this whole time? Would having my breasts make you feel better?
Looks like it's Little Miss Sunshine's turn to strip. Between you and Meia here, the energy's just through the roof.
Look, Meia, she's just as pale, serious, and boring as you are. Think she'd smile around Kahlua?
Hey, Meia's standing right here. Isn't that enough boredom for one table without you aping her style?
Look at that, Meia, Earth's found a way to mass-produce you! Diabolical.
Yeah, yeah, Meia, stay cocky. Oh wait, Meia's over here! You two are just so similar.
Hey, Meia, what do you think? Should we try to find you a bodysuit with polka dots? Maybe force you to smile like Marinette?
This girl makes bodysuits look a lot cuter than you do, Meia. Must be because she smiles...or because of the polka dots.
Even with the mask on, this girl emotes much more than you, Meia. Maybe a polka-dotted suit would lighten you up.
If you're not a fan of polka dots, Meia, maybe you could adopt this girl's adorable accent and actually brighten a room for once.
Mei and Meia, eh? I hope our other guests won't mix the two of you up---both are cold in your own ways, after all.
Look, Meia, this girl's nearly got your name. But she smiles, so telling you two apart should be easy.
Mei and Meia? I'd play matchmaker, but you'd be the most confusing couple of all time.
See, Meia? You're so sweet, this girl was nearly named after you. Nearly.
No jokes here! We're one hundred percent alien...if you define "alien" as "not from Earth."
We are from another planet! We're fearless Mejarian pirates...and we've come all this way to learn about Earth.
Yep, just two exotic women from another world! So we stuck together, since we can only trust each other around here.
We're pirates from Mejare, and all we know about Earth is that men and women live together here! Which sounds strange to us.
That's right, Elizabeth---Meia and I are from another world! And we're stripping here---that's how much we trust each other.
...This is Meia Gisborn you're talking about, right? Because I think I talk more in an afternoon than she has in years.
Oh, Kizuna. Clearly you've hit your head---this is my squadron leader, Meia. She only speaks when spoken to...or when she has criticisms.
...Excuse me? I've known Meia for quite a while. If she didn't have to give orders, she'd be mute.
...Meia, do you know this girl? Did you plant her here to try and convince me you can actually carry a conversation?
Hey, Kizuna, Meia is the last girl I'd call a chatterbox. Well, sometimes she is---in the spa.
Hey, what's that supposed to mean? You think they wouldn't believe me if I just said it?
The only proof I need is my trusted word, Meia! Now come here and get in frame.
Oh, come on, Leader, you've got a face the camera loves! They'd believe me on hearsay, anyway.
As if I need proof to convince them. But hey, just focus on giving your adorable smile!
Show Mahiru how cute your smile can be, Meia! That'll be all the crew sees in that photo...not that I need proof.
A boat? The Nirvana is a magnificent pirate ship full of our devoted Mejarian crewmates! And a few men.
The Nirvana is not some silly boat, Miss Japanese. It's a marvel of fusion technology, crewed by our lovely Mejarian sisters!
My, so condescending, calling our ship a boat. The Nirvana is crewed by the most beautiful women in the galaxy---and more sophisticated than you could dream of.
You insult every gorgeous woman who crews the Nirvana, calling it a boat. Its marvelous Paksis technology could run circles around anything you have.
Of course we're comrades! Meia acts all sour because that's her job, but she's a big sweetheart who cares about us!
Miss Japanese-Princess is right on the mark for once. I would never abandon my fearless leader---and she cares, too, I swear.
Oh, Meia and I are the best of friends, Miko! Well, as much as she wants to be. But I know she cares beneath the ice.
All that icy apathy is just a front, Miss Politics. Meia's shared a lot with me, since I'm her second-in-command...
Oh, my boss will always insist we're all-business, but she can be quite a talker in the spa. We trust each other!
You'll have to excuse Meia's hostility. She's absorbed all of our collective pirate hatred of authority.
Oh, don't mind Meia. She's taken the whole pirates-hating---soldiers thing a little too much to heart.
Just let Meia fume a little, Miss Military. We know you're not from Mejare's nasty old ranks.
Cute purple hair, Miss Military. Oh, don't worry about Meia. She's even touchier with soldier women than the rest of us.
Ooh, look, Meia. Another Misty. Don't go falling in love with her, now!
OK, Meia. I know this girl's called Misty, but don't start trying to be her Big Sister, too.
Don't tell anyone, but...Meia's got a bit of a crush on a girl named Misty. Fair warning!
Gonna win over Meia's heart here? You wouldn't be the first Misty to do it.
I think you have a fan, Miss Lullaby. A little blue buzzing squeaky fan.
You might want to acknowledge Little Miss Fairy, Nayru. She seems to be heading up your fan club.
Ooh, Nayru has your gorgeous flowing blue hair earned you a fan in Navi? I understand---I have to deal with fan mail on the ship.
And I thought I was a fan of blue hair and musical skills. Little Miss Fairy is buzzing about for your autograph!
Yeesh. Meia, I'm sorry I ever called you miserable. Next to this girl, you're a field of sunflowers.
I'm glad we came here, boss. Miss Blueberry over here has given me a new appreciation for your sense of humor.
Jeez, I've at least seen you smile, Meia. I don't think this girl has those muscles.
At least you have your face on display, Leader. This girl's both miserable and refuses to show it.
I don't think your complexion quite matches anymore. You've really lightened up!
So much for Miss Blueberry. I mean, you're bluer than ever, but showing all that skin's really warmed you up!
I knew stripping always makes a girl feel sexy and confident! Meia, take some notes---this girl started off even mopier than you did.
Hey, Miss Doom-and-Gloom, you're starting to look like you're having fun. Won't you please follow suit, Meia? I know you feel sexy.
Hmph. Normally I'd do a little flirting with the loser, but I'd rather just ignore Miss Powderkeg over here.
You know, I would flirt with you, Revy---except you're liable to start shooting at me.
You brought your laser ring, right, Meia? Gunslinger over here might get offended I don't want to flirt with her.
You might've noticed I'm trying to flirt with the others, Revy. If you promise to be nice, I can do it with you, too.
Omigosh, Meia, look! Another spacefarer who recognizes the value of a bodysuit. You should chat her up!
Blonde like me, suit like yours, from space like both of us! This Samus covers all our bases, Meia. Go flirt with her!
This woman's practically a Mejarian, between the spacey jumpsuit and gorgeous figure. Go get her, Meia---she's got your sense of style!
Full jumpsuit, shapely behind, cute face, from space? Meia, this girl is prime girlfriend material! Now's the time!
...So it's piloting that really gets you going, Leader. You hopeless intellectual, you.
I knew you were a robot. The only thing that makes you lighten up is another woman's skills.
I guess I'm just shallower than you are, boss. There you go, seeking out girlfriends on things beyond looks.
Oh, thank God, you're flirting. For a second there I was worried you really were sexless.
Oh, for God's sake, Meia, don't go on a damn moral crusade. She's kind of cute, isn't that enough?
We barely know her or what Earth's military is like, Meia. Don't start with your vendettas against authority.
It wasn't Earth soldiers that shut down our living districts, Meia. Cool it and try to have a nice time.
Oh, don't start ragging on the poor girl like we understand the politics of this place. Let's just all calm down and enjoy each others' breasts.
Hey there, Little Miss Leotard! Always good to see a fellow beautiful blonde---and you don't look afraid to show off the goods.
Well, aren't you in shape, Miss Twin-braids? And your butt's hanging out, which makes me think this'll be an easy win.
Ooh, I can see those steel abs poking through your leotard, Blonde-Braids. Normally women show up to strip poker, well, wearing some clothes.
You're pretty dead-serious for a tiny little blonde with her butt on display, Miss Cammy. Look, Meia, another girl who's no fun and hardly wears anything.
Mission this, objective that. This girl must be a no-fun workaholic like you, Meia...but at least you're not pretending to work.
Are you hearing this girl go on about her mission, Meia? That's how you sound to the others. You're lucky I know better.
Ugh, now there's two of you? I guess ~player~ is a big fan of being rejected.
Two Meias? Hey, I've been hitting on you this entire time! What's she done besides give you the cold shoulder?
...You know, I put a lot of effort into my appearance. Meia rolls out of bed, and she's the one to get two of her?
Hey, what's this all about, ~player~? You really think Meia's prettier than I am?
Ooh, I love your makeup! Where do you get it on Earth? I usually make a point to steal some during raids.
You're just adorable how you've dolled yourself up! And you're so teenie-weenie.
Omigosh, that little outfit is so cute! And you might be more into makeup than even I am.
Ooh, do they make dresses that cute in my size? What about your makeup? You look so adorable!
I didn't plan on doing so much reading tonight! Shouko, you write with men and women's symbols mixed together. I should have expected as much from an Earth girl.
This isn't quite the peek into Earth women's culture I expected, Shouko, but your writing is fascinating! It's even got those big ugly-looking symbols men use to encrypt things.
Meia, I thought you were talking for a second. This girl's as stoic as you are! I wonder what her excuse is.
Look, Meia, they've got your species on Earth, too. This girl's been all frowns and one-word answers. Hey, Kyoko, why so stonefaced?
These two...why don't you just kiss and make up? I don't want to get caught in your crossfire...and maybe the planet will, too.
The way you two are going at it, the sea levels will balance out just fine. That, or you'll rip the whole planet apart...
Sounds like Gloria here has a stone-faced friend of her own. I wonder if she's any more successful at cracking the surface.
Aren't you friends with some punk girl who never cracks a smile? Meiaaa, they've got a pair like us in another language.
Meia, you and Kumatora both need to brush your hair. Don't all those spiky bangs get in your eyes?
At the very least, think about brushing your hair, OK? I mean, it's so spiky when it could be silky and smooth...Meia, you listen, too.
...Wait. You read about Vandreads before. Does that mean you know about us? Search for "Jura Basil Elden"---oh, and "Meia Gisborn"!
I don't know who's feeding intel about our crew into your big public encyclopedia...but what does it say about Jura? Or Meia? You have to tell us!
Why is this such a big deal for you, anyway? You're kind of skinny, but you still look fine.
It's not like you're ugly, you know. Just relax and have fun!
Welllll...you're not my crewmate. Can you pledge to support me, too?
Trust offered is trust earned. Can you do that, even when you're so vulnerable? Lay your heart out for a stranger?
Give me a break. You don't want to be the center of attention? That's the whole point of the game!
Yeah, OK. The girl who signed up for strip poker with strangers doesn't want attention.
Are we really supposed to buy that? You can blush all you want, but you came here to be ogled like the rest of us.
Mm, that's one of the best parts of our spa treatment. It's the first bit they do before letting us lie back and drift away...
Oh, I love our foot massages! I mean, I love the full-body treatment our spa does. But they start it with the feet, to ease the pain of a day's battle...
Mohhn. It's a little weird to have turned the corner on being a teenager. It's only been a year, and some of the younger girls get all formal with me...
Hmmn, there's something about turning twenty...I mean, Barnette's nineteen, but doesn't that sound like we're years apart?
Why is this such a big deal for you, anyway? Do men tell you not to show off or something?
I just don't get why you'd be so shy. Is it because there's men around?
Hmmn...well, that's the trouble with putting yourself out there. Sometimes you get made a fool of...or worse.
Jura loves this kind of attention...but, haahn, not everything goes so smoothly. There's embarrassment, and then there's...
What are you implying? Barnette should feel threatened around you, is that it?
Oh? You're trying to seduce Jura's delicate heart, right under her lover's nose?
Oh, yes, show off your endless wardrobe...this is the only good dress I could steal. I ought to be in photoshoots, not dogfights.
Is this the dramatic poetry of the universe? I, a generational beauty, must live a criminal's life while this flat imp can buy forty dresses?
Awww, you're so adorable, Miss Princess! You could never scare anyone just by dressing up like a witch---your eyes are too sweet.
U-uh---! A-are you a---g-ghost? I-I didn't mean any of the nasty things I said about you being flat!

state.text: W-W-Weiss? W-when did you die? Are you haunting me because I made fun of your breasts? Eek!

case.state: Oh, are you a little less glum around Halloween, Raven? I see you're learning to embrace the beauty of long, flowing, shimmering hair.
Oh, it's Miss Assassin, looking for a day of fun in the sun. Water and sand just ruin my hair...I prefer an umbrella's shade.
Aren't you that self-proclaimed goddess from last time? You haven't filled out much, but you could certainly use some sun.
Oh, it's Miss Moneybags again, back for the summer season. Shouldn't you be seeking some shade? Your fair complexion is the best thing you have going for you.
Oh, it's you, Estelle! Were you let out of the castle again to see the sun? I know I have a swimsuit lying around in my quarters somewhere.
Who's this? Why, it's Miss Princess again, ready to read some books in the summer sun. I should've brought my swimsuit!
Oh, it's you again---Little Miss Weiss Schnee. I see you're going for the bold look with those color contrasts---a lesson learned from me, perhaps?
I don't even know you, but you seem dressed up for a special occasion all the same. Feeling sexy today?
Hey, cutie. Is it a holiday on planet Korea? Because you look different from usual.
This "Korea" planet of yours has got quite the range of fashion. I swear I've seen you running around in something else.
What's up, D.Va? That's a cute outfit---but it doesn't seem quite like your usual fare. What's the occasion?
Looking a little different there, Ruby. Brighter, in fact. Something bring up the mood where you're from?
I see you've been mixing up the colors. Not a bad approach, but I'm totally in love with this dress just as it is.
Mixing up the outfits, are we? I've cultivated a certain look with my crewmates I'd rather just maintain.
Hey, check out the new style Ruby's rocking. Not bad, but I'm the kind of girl to just stick with what I know best!
Hey, Miss Moneybags, nice wardrobe. I'm just a poor little pirate---this dress is the best I can afford.
Figures Miss Princess can't go five minutes without changing her clothes. A few months of piracy will teach you appreciate the clothes you've got.
At least you mixed up the colors a little with this new outfit, Miss Heirlooms. What you had before was like if I wore all yellow.
Looking cute there, Coinstacks. Nice new outfit---gotta show off the money somehow, right?
Now, what's so embarrassing about a lemon-printed top? You must have worn it during an incident--- go on, share the story.
Oh, you remind me of another shy-looking girl I played this game with. She was a little shorter and wasn't as well-dressed, but she had your same adorable face.
You have an uncanny resemblance to a girl I met here. You might be taller and better-dressed, but you have the same whimpering face---she called herself "Bernie," the little thing.
Oh, it's Yunyun, the Crimson Magician girl. Have you made any friends since last time? You were so needy about that. You've got a fresh new outfit, at least.
Yunyun? It is you! I hope that dark, stylish skirt is saying you've turned the page and made some friends. That display last time was just embarrassing.
Oh, aren't you...? The vampire girl---Mavis! Well, you're certainly dressed like a girl who knows what humans want this time. When did you get so bold?
Mavis? I hardly recognized you with all that skin showing! I take it you learned how to win humans over?
...Mavis, is that you? You were dressed so conservatively last time--- you could spill out of that thing any second! I guess you're more human than vampire after all.
Oh, you're that cute little bookworm princess, aren't you? The one who couldn't keep her hair under control. Earthlings must have hearts if they celebrate Christmas.
Estelle? Oh, you look adorable in that outfit---even more than you did in that overcoat you called a dress. Who would've thought Earth celebrates Christmas?
...Bernie? It is you! Oh, look at you, all dressed up like Santa Claus! Our captain dresses like her every Christmas, too---but I'll take a younger version!
Oh, Bernie, just when you couldn't get any cuter! Now I wish I had my own Christmas dress---I don't see why Santa always has to be shown as an old lady.
Hey, you're that runner girl with the prosthetics. Just who are you dressing up for this Valentine's? If I wore that, well, I'd be matching Barnette.
Oh, it's you, Emi. If you think you're dressing super romantic for today, a one-piece leotard is just Tuesday's outfit for my girlfriend.
Spooky? Not any more alive since last time, I see. I hope you're not haunting hospitals now to make a few ghost friends.
How could I forget the ghost girl? At least you've changed out of those rags---wait, this is just a costume, right? No "medical malpractice"?
Not you again. I don't care if you've got a sun hat on, you're still just as creepy!
Ugh! How'd I end up on a table with you again? What, are you searching for victims with more skin showing for you to stab?
I remember you---you're that cat-girl who told us about the magic she studied. Is this a vacation, or are you exposing those crystals to the sun?
You're the magic scientist, right? "Aether," or whatever it was. If this is another experiment, it's not really my idea of beach conversation.
You're that tropical "Pokuhmon" trainer I met last time. Aren't you worried about those things jumping out of the sand while you sunbathe?
The way you described things last time, I'd expect a two-meter crab to pop out of the sand and attack you on Earth. I guess you're prepared for the occasion?
Oh, it's you, Sheena. Do you have a spare bunnygirl costume, maybe for a taller girl? We do share some measurements, and I'd like to see how I look.
You're that "assassin" girl, right? With the magic spells? I don't mean to blow your disguise, but those bunnysuits are cute---I bet I'd look fantastic in one.
I remember you---"Sheena." You know, you could stick bunny ears on my girlfriend, and she's otherwise wearing that suit---I wonder how I'd look?
Hmph. I'm not used to being outdone on height and muscle from a girl my age. And now she shows up in a swimsuit...
Personally, I prefer being the tallest girl in the crowd. I knew I should've brought my swimsuit, especially with the Warrior Princess around.
I guess women do read on the beach---I'd rather relax. Speaking of which, does the encyclopedia girl know any famous Earth beaches? I could fly right over.
Oh, it's you, the encyclopedia girl...say, do you know anything about the best shorelines Earth has to offer?
I may like to flaunt my chest, but bust size isn't everything, you know. Did they take some extra fat from your brain?
Bigger is better when it comes to breasts...up to a point. Don't tell me you stuffed them with your old books.
...Is this how the jealous girls see me? Big fat boobs on a skinny frame, constantly running her stupid mouth...and leaking fluid everywhere.
This is reminding me of my old science class. Mejare may look pretty, but it's a hot boiling mess under the surface.
You know Mejare's mostly a fleet nation? It's not easy to terraform when it's got magma bubbling up from all the craters.
You're sure bouncing between teams a lot. If you're a girl with nowhere else to go, come join Magno's Family---and my fan club!
First "Magma," and now "Wikipedia"? Lots of girls on our crew are drifters like you. You can come admire me every day!
Is this what computer models look like before they're finished? I should stop daydreaming about being made into a holo-idol.
In the world where I'm all booked up on photoshoots, my lovely CGI model would pick up the slack. But I'd hate to see myself as some half-rendered faceless blob.
Aren't you that spirit-taker girl? This is like if our captain threw off her priestess shawl and picked up a gun.
Some special agent is pretty far off from all that mystical stuff. I mean, our captain is a preacher, and not a fighter.
Oh, one of our bridge crew has a dress just like that. The ribbons, too! But she wore it on duty like it was no big deal, not for some special occasion.
Our crewmate Cel was so casual with her scarlet qipao dress and hair buns. Is it supposed to be some fancy outfit here?
Heeey, do you think I'd look handsome in a suit? All officious and dignified? Or am I too girly?
I have a lot of dresses, but a suit---that's new! I wonder if I'd look good in one. You know---handsome.
Kumatora? Oh my God, that's so much prettier! Why don't you always dress like this?
Now---that's "Princess" Kumatora. Well---more like Waitress Kumatora, but pretty is pretty. I love this look on you.
Heeey, you know, I haven't just been messing around with you. You're cute, but you'd be much cuter if you just cleaned up a little.
There's a pretty face under that messy hair, and probably a pretty body under that hoodie. Why don't you just style a little?

You really do look much cuter like this.
...It's a little weird, but I don't like the giggling. Wouldn't that be neat? If you were cute, but fierce?
I love the new look, really...why don't you fight like this? Oh, but you could have this serious face on...that really does something for me.

You're that shrimp, Hayase. Dressing up now?
...Well, that costume does suit a petite girl. I'd look kind of silly in it.
Nice costume, Hayase. I mean, you might as well go all in on cute. Imagine me trying to squeeze into it.
So you're a demon now? You're loud like one. Trying to look all sexy doesn't suit you, though.
More like an imp than a demoness. This is the kind of thing I should dress up in.
Oh, hello, Ochako! Are you a cheerleader at your school? I just couldn't bear to sit on the sidelines like that...
Girls in school always thought I had the body and charm of a cheerleader. But I'm a woman of action, despite my buxom figure.
Muhu, a Sun tribe...I've been compared to the Sun. A brilliant golden light shining from the darkness! You should take me to them.
There are a lot of cows just roaming around this planet, right? I only ever see them as beef. Oh, but Cel might have a costume...
...You'd never really train such a nasty thing, right? Some ghost that licks you and gives you nightmares? They're just pajamas?
Even Keyblade masters get breaks, right? Or are you hunting darkness out in the summer sunlight?
If I were a goddess, I don't think I could bear to wear something as plain as a bikini. It'd have to be some ornate dress...or nothing at all!
I hate to say it, but I don't have a classic look. Putting even one good ensemble together takes time! Especially when you can't go shopping...
Aaahn, when's the last time I got a personal show? Make sure to blow a kiss my way, and give out some presents!
What a cute little outfit! We should get a rubber duck for the jacuzzi. Instead it's just Pyoro peeking in...
So you were "reborn" somehow? Maybe that means you still have some growing to do. I can't imagine wanting to stay that size.
So this is officially your "cutest" costume? I feel like you'd say that about whatever you picked out...
You look cute in your little floaties. If you're not gonna alchemize yourself taller, I guess cute is all you can really hope for...
Is there an outfit you don't have? I'm always scrounging around for pretty clothes people have left behind...and I've never found a bunny suit!
You look like a little gift box ready to be unwrapped. Maybe this time you'll be sweet on the inside.

You still have you old school uniform, huh?
...Really old. I still have mine, but it doesn't fit anymore...
Hey, Caitlin, a few changes and you're basically copying me. Don't you have some gothic friend who's more into this kind of look?
I'd say this is blatant, but you never hid how much you wanted to stab us all. Maybe try an angel next time.

Ohhn, my family used to have a maid...she was so sweet, and she always doted on me.
...I never played computer games with her.
Can you play something more acoustic? You're dressed that way. Something to relax by the poolside to.
Mohhn, I wish I got to endorse some clothing line...a high-end fashion label! Dresses, and jewelry, and lingerie...
Ohh, Ibuki, you look much prettier like this. Doesn't it feel good to be all cleaned-up and collected? Tastefully washed and groomed?
To be honest, I was hoping to see the punk rocker in a cute little Santa dress. Is that too cliché?
You didn't just magic a popsicle for yourself, did you? Jura wants one, too, now...and they're even better with a friend.
Are you dressed like another one of those pokuh-mon? There's a witch one, right? Long black gown...if it's cute, I want to see it.
Estelle, that's---provocative for a princess! Maybe if her name was Princess Jura, but I just didn't expect it out of you...!
That's an idea---a full bodysuit just to swim? I don't wear our pilot suits, but you could move a lot bolder than in a bikini...
Mohhn, Jura has been looking all over for a cute sundress. Every chance we get to loot a place, and no luck! If only we lived near the Sun.
Are you one of the reindeer? That's---a little kinky. I mean, if I put them on Barnette, I could grab her by the antlers, and...
Gloriaaa, you can not tease Jura by just dressing as a baker! Barnette bakes me sweets all the time. You have to feed us!
So you're dressing rough to match your way of talking? Hey, uh...I mean, don't let people put you in a little box like that.
Are you going to sing some Christmas carols for us, Miku? Funny enough, our choir only does a few each year... oh, do To Faraway Times!
Ohhn, the luxuries of nobility. Do you know how long it's been since I got to go swimming? Jacuzzis don't count!
Ohh, Joey, you look much cuter in street clothes. It's easy to overdo it with makeup, you know! Now you just need to try on a dress, or a leotard...
Do you think I'd look good as a magical girl? Those outfits always seem so cutesy. I like darker tones and long, flowy hems...
...What's sexy about a tomato? Sure, dark red is nice, but those look like little girls' pajamas.
Is this why you want to drain the ocean? It's full of nasty, fanged, uncaged fish? Maybe just fly over it...
Ooh, you look much prettier like this than that dorky red hoodie. Maybe I'll be convinced to join... if I don't have to wear it.
This is your casual look? It's got stockings, you're showing skin---and your hair's done up! You should just go to school like this.
So you're not actually a nurse, though, right? We're a little shorthanded on medical...just a man and a kid.
There's a thought. A suit...me dressed as some shrewd businesswoman! But they're always so nasty and old...
Waitress! I'm so glad you're here. Can I have a big glass of water, please? Oh, and a snack...are there any bread rolls with a little powdered sugar?
That's awfully modest for a beach look. Don't you think you're cute enough to show some cleavage? Or a bikini bottom riding up your butt?
Aren't you a adorable little bunny? Trying your hardest to hop around all sexy-like. But you just don't have the legs for it.
That is a pretty cute look. If you gave me sweet baby-eyes, maybe I'd let you suck my blood... but just a little bit! Just so it tickles.
This is what a succubus looks like? Talk about trying too hard. I think I'd do a better job, luring you into my warm embrace...
O-oh, my. And people say our outfits are a bit much. At least the clothes go over the important parts!
So the Sun doesn't bother you at all? I thought that was a thing with vampires...I know the sand would bother me, with such a thin towel.
Is this your extra-strength protection from the Sun? I can point out a few holes in your defense before you turn to ash.
The whole girl-next-door thing isn't too popular where I'm from. We're more of a live-it, love-it, flaunt-it kind of race.
This is a bit of a mixed message, don't you think? Christmas is all about giving, and you're all about what you can take.
I hear this Lopunny monster you're dressed as has a reputation for sex appeal. That's the kind of pet I need---if it doesn't steal the spotlight.
I wonder how I'd look in another universe...just as beautiful, but maybe a little taller? Thicker legs? Would I pilot a Mega Vandread?
That'd be funny, if I just walked around in a big T-shirt. Maybe I can borrow it from one of those men who break two meters.
How can a girl who towers over me be so mousy? You should stretch, flex, really push that swimsuit to the breaking point!

...So, does a ghost get hot? I think you're just dressing down for fun.
...Wait, where does a ghost get clothes?
I've heard the blazing heat of summer on Earth is something else. If that hasn't inspired you yet, surely all the extra skin showing will.
You're serving us? And it's complimentary? Jura likes her chicken grilled, not fried, and with a baked potato on the side! And ice in her drink, please!
Don't you think your dress is a bit too much? All those little bells and whistles and fancy patterns just distract from the body underneath.
If you're trying to be "cool," I think you're trying a little too hard. It's like you're about to catch fire. Why not play up your cuteness instead?
You're supposed to be a vampire? I think you're ready for a royal ballroom dance instead. With just a dash of danger...
Is this your warrior's gear? Hmm...I wonder if BC has any Brigidish in her. She's certainly got a lot of fight in her...
You're always out in the woods hunting, right? Tell me you're just as fierce in the water. Maybe you could catch a big fish for us.
Ahhhn, Rin, I think you're much cuter with short hair. I don't know why it turns me on so much! Opposites attract, I guess.
Ew, what are you being all creepy for? Don't tell me this was your biggest hit look. I miss the cute, peppy idol.
Oh, we have Tetris back home. It must be one of those simple games colonists played to pass the time, like solitaire...or strip poker.
Aww, I dressed as a witch once for Halloween. You know, back when I was your height. One lady even gave me an apple.
I think we may have come across your little "timegate" in real life. We got here, after all, to an era when Earth was livable.
Sometimes I want a big poofy princess dress like yours. But it'd hide so much of my body, and I couldn't fight in it! Mohhn...
I swear, every Earth girl trying to be sexy just throws on a bunny suit! Is it because the actresses are doing it? Sheesh, get creative.
You must have starred in a big movie with that thing on. Everyone on Mejare wears Santa dresses around Christmastime.
You must take lots of glamor shots on the beach! They film whole scenes just to put you in a swimsuit, right? The camera loves bare skin.
Hmm, you're dressed a lot more fun in this older look. Did the boss tell you to hide your rods a little better?
Uhhh...you're still going to pamper us, right? You know, a fun kind of punishment? Jura really wanted a pampering...
Senkooo, are you here to give us a summer pampering? I can lie down on a towel, and you can rub some lotion on...or just rub!
Are you wearing a mask of your own face? Just made all cutesy. You didn't have any problems there before, you know.
You're the Reaper now? I didn't know ghosts could get promoted. I wonder if you'll still be haunting us in my time.
Are they keeping you up all night at the lab? Girls can look pretty cute while they're asleep, but it's not my idea of a striptease.
...Your hole is peeking out. Doesn't the summer breeze bother you, blowing through that thing? Baking you a little more?
You're being extra threatening, but I love what you've done with your style, at least. Full-body see-through is just---daring!
So you're friends with yourself from another universe? I think if I met another me, we'd just fight over the attention.
This planet's sun is really strong, especially in summer. Are you sure you won't get fried if you shrink down?
Hahhn...that's what I could really use. I have fancy combat dresses, but hardly any street clothes...it's like I'm always in costume!
Aren't those coconuts? I've always liked the flavor, but I've never seen the real plant it came from.
What do they call a witch on Earth, huh? Are you all just cute little mascots? I got treated to it as a crime sentence...
Uhhh...so you're happy to be here, Y'shtola? No one's...enslaved you, took your eyes, dipped you in acid?
You aren't quite wearing a bunny suit, but reshaping your ears is putting in the extra effort, I guess...don't you ever just do something easy?
You'd think we'd be calling it the "Starlight Celebration." Who's out living amongst the stars instead of just staring up at them?
That's not your idea of romantic, is it? You look you're ready to get down to business. In a---really old-fashioned kind of way.
Is this what girls loving other girls makes you on this planet? A punk-rock rebel? Well, you can be a perfectly respectable housewife with us.
The most romantic time of year, and there's no spell that would give you some curves. What kind of world is this, where mortals outdo the gods?
So is it your "summer goal" to make some friends? That's a nice way of measuring things, by season...I declare this the Summer of Jura!
"Wakey Wakey"? You'd be a cute sight to wake up to, for sure. But chances are this is something about how you have no friends...
I'm not sure how devilish a little computer programmer can get. Do you make the thing beep too loud?
Oh, that doubles as a martial artist's dress, right? Look at the leg freedom! Finding one of those my size would be a dream come true...
The living dead sounds like a mortician's worst nightmare. Or maybe they're grateful for you giving them a nice place to sleep...
Blonde hair and a dark dress is a winning combination. Don't you think you look striking? Dazzling? Like a bright light in pitch black?
...Why do you have those knives? I saw a swimsuit and thought you might be taking the day off for once...
I've only ever swum in pools! I did land on an ocean planet once, but...we were busy. What's it like swimming in it?
Don't a bunch of big animals all sleep during the winter? T-that means in the summer, they come out to eat...how're you managing that?
So it's really cold where you live, right? I mean, just look at that dress! You might have a giant butt for all I know.
Gloves, a heavy dress...I've got no clue what you look like underneath! So you live in a snowy part of Earth?
Mohhn, I wish I had a school uniform that still fit. Some of them were pretty cute. But I've done a lot of growing since I was 15...
So that's your old uniform from school? Hmmnn...Jura's outgrown all of hers. Cute skirts and button-up vests...
Are you OK? You look like you're about to cry. Definitely not the type of girl I'd expect to put on a strip show...
You seem really out of your element. Have you ever taken off that skirt? All sexy, I mean.
You've been talking like it'll be a struggle for you to just strip, period. It's about more than that--you've got to dazzle us!
No offense, but I'll always take sexy over shy. You don't seem confident enough to give a real striptease...or strip at all.
Hmm...the wallflowers really stick out here. It's not enough to just play, you know---you've got to work it!
So you're actually spending extra time in school? I didn't spend enough.
You should've graduated last year, right? It's hard to imagine being a student for all those years.
Hmm, so you're a virgin, right? But you've also been hanging out with a man. When are you two going to start getting physical?
Have you had sex? No...you can barely say sex. But have you done anything with that man you like?
I would not think you're the drama type. Even I wouldn't want to act...I'd want to be myself!
I know I'm a shining star, but Jura doesn't need to be anyone but herself...so no Drama Club for me, OK? I'm surprised you like it!
I hope you're feeling OK at the moment, at least. Chronic illness...I hate it when my hair isn't set right!
If my makeup is smudged, or I've got flyaway hairs...that alone will make me feel so defeated. Your frailty isn't bothering you, right?
Heeey, listen up...you have to say what you're really thinking! OK? You're showing your body, so show us your heart.
It really gets on my nerves when girls aren't honest...Nagisa. I want you to speak your mind for once, straightforward!
You know, I think you're starting to stand up straighter already! In between all the blushing, anyway.

You don't even realize it, do you? You've been standing taller, talking louder...even making eye contact!
...Sometimes.
A giant axe is hardly elegant enough for an officer, don't you think? You could just use a sword.
I suppose you lead by example. Running around with a huge axe, splitting bodies, crushing skulls...it's not very pretty.
It's Jura's number one goal to show off her elegance, even in furious combat! Do you find a way to do that, too?
A terrible war on a bloody battlefield...it's no excuse not to look your best! Don't you think so? It might even inspire your troops!
You have so many clothes that you can just pop on wherever, in a puff of smoke! Jura is jealous...do you know how hard it is to scavenge for the perfect outfit?
H-how big is your wardrobe, anyway? Lucky...even if I find something pretty on a raid, good luck if it actually fits!
We make a nice color contrast, don't we? Keep the black dress consistent, and tone down the hair and skin. Now if you could just do something about the tail...
Who will prevail? The dashing, fair-skinned blonde wrapped in black, or the dangerous, dark-skinned redhead...also wrapped in black.
Hmmn, I'd never want to cover my face like that. Especially if I'm going onstage! The world needs to see Jura!
Are you telling me you've got whole crowds of adoring fans, and you're willing to wrap up your face in front of them? No music is worth that! It's your livelihood!
You Earth girls treat men really weird. Like, you dream of one that you'll spend your whole life with, but you don't want the rest anywhere near.
For someone who wants to marry a man, you're awfully scared of them. And it's not just you! How does anyone find a "husband"?
Horror is horrific, but terror is terrific. I bet a poet like you knows how terrifying true beauty can be.
Behold a beautiful sight, and you may go weak at the knees. Have you ever written about that awestruck, frightening feeling?
Wouldn't I make a good siren? So pretty, no mortal can resist...and then I strip them for all they're worth.
That's a cute costume, Mia. I could see myself the same way...for real! A stunning siren, charming all those who meet her in the vast black sea...
Ohh, your pet is so cute! I had a canary growing up. A lot of girls did, actually.
So girls keep birds as pets here, too? It's really popular on Mejare. I even had a yellow one like that, to match my hair.
Oooh...I had a nightmare once where I was bridge crew instead of a pilot. And our crew was way smaller...so they made me scrub the floors!
Even a princess can be demoted to cleaning duty? I worry about that happening to me...stuck with a durag and a mop!
You're really excited for this, huh? I'd expect someone so enthusiastic to dress up some more...
Your look doesn't match your attitude. Shouldn't you have gone all-out if games are a special occasion?
Hmm...so the goddess dresses like some kind of sailor nurse when this planet gets cold. Is that your power, to keep water from freezing?
I heard winters on Earth could be just---frigid. I mean, you're not an ice goddess, too, right? Can you make sure we stay warm and watery?

You don't see that kind of sweater too much on Mejare. We don't have to dress for the cold.
...Ohhn, but it does look comfy.
Mmmn...do you have a sweater that Jura could borrow? It looks so warm and snuggly...we hardly have any "winter clothes" back home!
How humble of you to dress as an elf. Don't you want to be the star? Every year, it's wall-to-wall Santa sets.
Why would a performer not want to steal the spotlight? I mean, you could've been another sexy Santa! That's what we always compete with.
Turkey, chocolate, presents...can you still enjoy the Christmas cheer when you're a ghost? Or is a hat all you get to bring with you?
I happen to like Christmas. I'd love to keep celebrating it after I'm dead...but I want more than just a Santa hat.
A creature of the night, dressed in white? The holiday season really takes hold of us all.
Only during Christmastime will you find a succubus in white and a heroine in red and black.

Ahhn, wouldn't Jura look cute in a Christmas onesie?
...Oh, wait, you can't tell. Well, you look cute.
Can your seismic sense detect how goofy you look in that thing? Well, there's nothing wrong with a little cuteness now and then. Hmm...Jura is getting ideas.
Are you OK? I mean, you look like you're still getting used to that uniform. Don't you wear it every day?
Hmm...are you putting on a calm face for us? I don't know, you just---seem like you're trying on a new look. New uniform, maybe.
I'm glad you're taking this whole thing in stride. When I saw a schoolgirl at the table, I expected the tears to come at any moment...
Good on you for staying upbeat! I was hoping to avoid any shrinking-types, you know, civvie schoolgirls in over their heads.

Heeey, you've got to tell me what the dating scene is like in an Earth school. Are you involved?
...Wait, are men involved?
So when you roam the corridors of an Earth school, what kinds of relationships do you see, huh? Have you found one for yourself?
You shouldn't stay too sweet all ~background.time~, you know. It's OK to show us a little spice.
I'm sure all your classmates love you for being the level-headed one, but too much sugar can make you sick. Do you have any salt for us?
This is it, Sanako! You'll be revealing the darkest, most intimate parts of yourself. Honestly, it feels like you've been holding back this whole time.
Ah, your turn again. Since you'll be baring it all for us, do you have any juicy secrets to share, as well? Jura gets that impression...
Hmm, I wonder how I'd look in pure white. Usually I go for contrasts, but you're pulling it off just fine!
We blondes look so good in red and black! Here you are, trading that in for all-white. I think I'd feel like a ghost...
What is it with killers turning around and baking cakes in their spare time? Barnette blows off steam the same way!
You look so cute! And apparently you can be so cruel. Between you and Barnette, maybe the fire in your eyes transfers to the oven...
Farming sounds like such dirty, miserable work...but it must feel great to finally wash up, right? To dress up!
You must love days like this after spending so much time all sweaty and muddy! Right? A chance to dress your best and remind everyone how pretty you can be!
You know I actually have a nun's habit? But I never wear it because...why would I? Costume parties only!
My nun's habit was picked up on a raid. It's nice to find outfits my size, but it's not my idea of pretty clothes. So unless I'm goofing around...
Ahhn, Jura once saw some little bunnies in a zoo. They must make such adorable pets for you to train...
Ohhh, are bunny rabbits some of your "Pokémon"? They looked so cute and well-behaved in the zoo...
So you're a helpful "Fox-Bunny"? I'm pretty sure one eats the other. Maybe you...eat yourself in your quest to pamper us?
Predator and prey, huh...what's that supposed to symbolize? The full spectrum of your pampering?
More runs like that, and you'd have a spot on our pilot team. You're always scouting for new recruits, right, Meia?
You've got the ferocity of Mejarian soldiers. Too bad I know how to handle them.
Hey, keep it up. Meia loves women that can put up a fight.
Don't give out on us now! I was starting to come around on Earth women.
Good work, not getting all distracted by my beauty. Bit of a blow to the ego, though.
You had a streak going. You're one step closer to streaking yourself, though.
Nice little lucky run. Luck's a good trait in a pilot...and in a lover.
This Earth girl's got some skill, lasting so long. Do we have any piloting spots open, Meia?
What incredible poker skills to last so long. Only problem: this is strip poker, and the objective is to masturbate and have fun.
Yeah, yeah, ~player~, enjoy your little lucky poker runs. I'm going to roll over and think of my darling Barnette, fully at peace.
Nice job maintaining your poker face despite my little masturbation session. I've always worn my heart on my sleeve, and it's brought so many wonderful women into my life!
Streaks like that might earn you a spot on our crew. You know, if you could pull them off consistently, and knew how to pilot.
What incredible poker skills to last so long. Only problem: this is strip poker, and the objective is to strip.
Yeah, yeah, ~player~, enjoy your little lucky poker runs. I'm going to roll over and think of love and babies, fully at peace.
Nice job maintaining your poker face despite our little "session." I've always worn my heart on my sleeve, and it's brought so many wonderful women into my life!
That's not the kind of skill that impresses our team leader over there. Dumb luck is for men.
Streaks like that might earn you a spot on our crew. You know, if you could pull them off consistently, and knew how to pilot.
...Don't remind me. That's the reason we're in this mess.
...Haaahn. It takes way too much energy to look good.
Hey, Monika, am I not attractive enough for you? You seem awfully dead-set on ~player~.
So, Monika, do you have a crush on ~player~? You're always addressing her.
I wasn't aware I was intruding upon a budding romance. You're really gunning for ~player~'s heart, aren't you?
Hey, Monika, I'm a little offended by your lack of interest. I doubt ~player~ likes being chased, anyway.
So, Natsuki, what's with your little crush on ~player~? Trying to strip your teeny-weeny little body for her?
You realize you're not fooling anyone with your affections, least of all ~player~, right? It's clear you invited her here to strip for her.
You know, Pint-size, if you wanted to strip your eensy-weensy little body for ~player~, you didn't need to play poker to do it.
Does ~player~ appreciate you dragging her out to this seedy place just to strip for her? Clearly you have a crush...
What's your fascination with ~player~, huh, Bowtie? You should just ask her out already before you stammer any more.
You really are like Dita. Hopelessly in love with ~player~, but you'd rather fumble your words instead of spitting it out.
So naive and clueless. Look, Sayori, when you want someone, you march right up and flirt with them! I'll take ~player~ if you don't.
Look, everyone can tell you want ~player~ bad. When I met Barnette, I made my feelings clear from the start!
Hey, Monika, am I not attractive enough for you? You seem awfully dead-set on ~player~.
So, Monika, do you have a crush on ~player~? You're always addressing him.
I wasn't aware I was intruding upon a budding romance. You're really gunning for ~player~'s heart, aren't you?
Hey, Monika, I'm a little offended by your lack of interest. I doubt ~player~ likes being chased, anyway.
So, Natsuki, what's with your little crush on ~player~? Trying to strip your teeny-weeny little body for him?
You realize you're not fooling anyone with your affections, least of all ~player~, right? It's clear you invited him here to strip for him.
You know, Pint-size, if you wanted to strip your eensy-weensy little body for ~player~, you didn't need to play poker to do it.
Does ~player~ appreciate you dragging him out to this seedy place just to strip for him? Clearly you have a crush...
What's your fascination with ~player~, huh, Bowtie? You should just ask him out already before you stammer any more.
You really are like Dita. Hopelessly in love with ~player~, but you'd rather fumble your words instead of spitting it out.
So naive and clueless. Look, Sayori, when you want someone, you march right up and flirt with them! I'll take ~player~ if you don't.
Look, everyone can tell you want ~player~ bad. When I met Barnette, I made my feelings clear from the start!
You didn't know what we were playing? Well, don't run off on me---you look nice and normal, so give me some answers about men!
Hahaha! How clueless can a girl get, walking blind into strip poker? Well, stay a while and fill me in about this lovely planet!
Well, talk about a spineless little girl. You don't lose anything by being seen---why'd she have to up and leave like that?
What was so scary about just showing off your body a little? Maybe the poor thing just felt all flat and short next to me...
Jeez, you're terrified. Maybe men do eat women's livers.
...Are men actually anything to be afraid of? Sure, they're big and lumbering, but they seem kind of slow.
Calm down, would you? Yeesh. Maybe Mejare was right about men, considering the state they've got this girl in.
Hey, I've dealt with my fair share of male soldiers. They're nothing to be super afraid of...too stupid.
Ohhh, how nice to see a Mejarian couple on Earth! You and ~player~ keep whispering to each other like girls on a playground!
I must say, Miss Pixie, it's strange of you to bring your girlfriend ~player~ here! My Barnette is far too delicate for such a horrid place.
Is this your attempt to spice up your relationship with ~player~? Strip poker? Women should be more romantic than that...
Seeing you and ~player~ whisper to each other is so reassuring, Kyu---I wasn't sure Earth women loved each other the way Mejarians do!
Ohoho. Nothing gets by me, Kyu---you and ~player~ are in some Earthling man-woman relationship. I have a nose for these things.
Hey, now. I may be from an all-woman planet, but I'm the authority on my crewmates' relationships. You're dating this man ~player~, aren't you, Kyu?
When the Nirvana wants to know if a woman's single, it asks Jura Basil Elden. And you, dear, can't fool me---~player~ must be shoving his tube into you.
Oooh, Kyu, are you and ~player~ in a man-woman relationship? You keep gossiping---oh, tell me how his thing works! Where's the seed?
Eeeek! It's some Harvest thing! N-Nayru, look out!
Aaack! S-some---shadow! Nayru, it's the Harvest!
...N-Nayru? There's a shadow behind you...was this place a Harvest trap?
Nayru, there's something behind you! ...Does the Harvest take Earth people, too?
...Oh. Well, I didn't mean to bring up that kind of thing in a friendly game. You know, it's not like everyone has a sister back home...
...Hm. So much for playful flirting all evening. You'd be surprised how many only-children there are back on my homeworld.
I think our quartermaster had a sister, but you see a lot of only-daughters on Mejare. Not to mention our crew...well, anyway, sorry about that.
I get orders, too, you know. But the enemy's not going to sit there and wait for you to carry them out. A fighter has to think on her feet.
Hey, Laevatein, do you think I'm captain of our crew? You're going to get cut down if all you do is mindlessly follow orders.
A robot can follow orders, Laevatein. And I get plenty of them from the captain on down, but you've got to stay alert and see when it's not going to work.
...You know, I can stomach fighting just fine, as long as it's got a purpose. What you're doing is...ugh. Why don't you enter these "Contests"?
So if there's more peaceful Pokuh-mon training like those beauty pageants, why do you insist on making them fight? It's barbaric.
Personal stories? I thought you'd never ask. I'll talk about anything!
Oh, the princess wants to hear about my life as a daring rogue? Well, get started already!
Uhhhm...you wouldn't happen to be from Mejare, would you?
Did I...miss something? You could take the average girl off Mejare's streets, and she wouldn't talk to men like you do...
And they say men are tall! You're enough woman for the whole table...do you really not get out much, like I've heard?
You said you don't get out much? Guess men like short women...that makes things awkward for me.
You know, I tend to turn heads with my height alone. I hear you don't get out much...but you're definitely stealing my thunder there.
From what I know of men, you're as tall as one...and built like them, too. Don't worry, you wear it well---so does Gascogne! I'm curious why you don't get out much...
Hibiki's a teenie-weenie man I know---I guess you represent the opposite end of the spectrum on both counts. And what's this about not getting out much?
Well, howdy, pardner, how d'ya---do...
What are you lugging that big men's gun around for---ack!
Well, aren't you spunky! You even brought a model g---eek!
Uh...where are you pointing that thing? Are you---wait---eek! Don't!
Ooh! Ooh! Are you doing it again? Do it again!
Ooh, Aimee's turn! Show us that trick again!
Aimee! You're so cool! How do you shoot like that? Do that trick again!
Give us a show, girl! That last time was incredible!
I'd call you crazy for this sort of thing, but how could I when you defy death like it's nothing?
You're just so awesome! I can't get enough of this!
Can you do it a third time, hotshot? Yeah, probably.
I could watch you do this all day. My heart jumps every time!
Uh, Aimee? Are you sure you want to keep doing that? You nearly got hit last time...and your targets are getting smaller.
Um, it's OK, Aimee! You've been very impressive! Just go out on top, you know?
...Are you sure about this, Aimee? After...last time? Don't kill yourself...
Uh---don't go all the way just for my sake. What you did was cool, but, um...well, you'll be fine.
Well, I guess if you've come this far, you might as well finish the job. Go for it.
I'd expect nothing less, cutie. Be sure to wow us!
Might as well seal the deal, even if it's just your thong. You can do it!
Seems we've got similar taste in underwear. Shame you're about to shoot it right off, but at least it'll look cool.
That tan is something else, and your energy is boundless! Most Mejarians opt for pale, as you can see...
Barnette's kind of tan like you are. She's cute, too, so women can pull it off!
Slow down there, tiger. That energy is going to turn you into a tan smear on the ground.
Tan is certainly a look on Mejare, but pale is the norm for us...where'd you say you were from? Planet Austria?
...Are you alright there? With the knife and all?
...You know, I carry the rapier mostly for fashion...maybe you could relegate that knife to the same thing?
...Could you maybe put down the knife? Hey, are you listening?
What a weirdo...knives are just as deadly as swords, with none of the style.
Better keep my sword on hand, with this nutcase on the scene.
Hey, hey, hey! Check out the all-purple look. That's a new one...
Hey, color contrasts show confidence. Would I look nearly as stunning if this dress matched my hair?
Purple hair's certainly got an exotic appeal...too bad mine is boring old blonde. As for the matching outfit, I don't follow the logic.
Quite the exotic color scheme you've got there. Too bad you forgot to mix it up at all.
Forgive for being a little less than impressed with the so-called "Monster Lord," dearie. Tattoos and skimpy clothes don't make you a monster.
Have they been feeding you indoctrination on Earth? Why would a cute girl call herself a monster just from a garish sense of style?
..."Monster Lord"? I mean, I think tattoos are gross and all, and you haven't got much on, but that's a little extreme of a name.
Jeez, have a little respect for yourself. I don't wear much, but I don't call myself a monster for it. Not even a tattoo would change that...
Talk about weird Earth values---this girl's calling herself a monster just for being all punk-like. ...I wonder if they'd view me that way.
This is all too surreal, Miss Monster. The men of Tarak think we're out to eat them---and here's you!
Make sure never to come to Mejare. The last thing Tarak needs to see is a monster girl who really does eat men's organs.
This is the height of irony---Tarakkian men think we eat their livers, and then on Earth there's literal monster girls who do that.
So, does the Monster Lord see men as food? You're the spitting image of every stereotype Tarakkians have of us.
And the Monster Lord herself is no more! I---wait, what's up? Aren't you naked?
Honey, what's this all about? Are you going to start scrubbing off your tattoos? This is over with.
What's left, your big bad "monster" form? Give me a break---you're out darling.
Truly the buxom, svelte body of a lord, but you're done, Miss Monster. Stop trying to stall.
You're pale as marble! Do they not have a sun on this "Japan" planet?
Are you...flickering? Are you some kind of hologram? That might explain your skin tone.
You OK there? You look a little pale...and non-corporeal.
And I thought Mejarians liked the pale look! This "Japan" planet puts us to shame.
Check out that outfit! Going for the natural look? So would I, if Mejare had much of nature.
Did you just piece that outfit together from bits you found in a forest? It actually looks nice...shame Mejare lacks those greens.
If only Mejare had the same verdant natural resources as Earth. Perhaps then I could try to emulate your all-natural style.
Mejare's a little too wasteful to have the greenery for me to dress like you do. You can see how little we wear to compensate.
Should've figured Little Miss Princess would want to break away and strip for strangers. You must be so sheltered!
Oh, is it true you're a princess, darling? That would explain the haughty attitude...and the phony embarrassment.
I'm a pirate...and no huge fan of authority figures. Luckily, I love girls who strip for fun and pleasure.
So you're a princess, is that it? You should know you're not fooling me---you love being ogled, don't you?
A princess, hm? Only makes sense that such a public figure as yourself would love exhibiting her body for total strangers.
Well, that's that. Do what you must behind those flowers.
You can hide yourself with the flowers, but you're naked, so that's a loss in my book.
Nice try with the foliage, but no one's going to call that clothing. You're out.
And so the frightened little princess falls before her betters. Even the forest spirits couldn't save her.
Even with all that, you're still forced to be naked? It's official---you're totally into this.
Even with your little flower setup, I think you're out of options. Cough up the good stuff---I'm convinced you want to.
That ought to do it, unless you've got more of the plant kingdom at your disposal. Isn't this what you wanted, playing this game?
Oh, I'm sure you're cute---I remember your butt! Besides...I seriously doubt this isn't turning you on.
Hey, someone told me you're a model on Earth...is that true? I'd like to get in on that...
You're pretty cute, but I hear people like legs on their models...better hope I don't hit the scene.
Hey now. You're cute, but there's no need to brag about being a model...not when a Mejarian's on the scene.
Don't be so full of yourself, Miss Model...I'd be a model, too, if not for Mejare's pesky little corrupt government.
You're, uh, looking a little pink. And what's up with those ears?
I know I joke about Earth girls being aliens, but, uh, you really do look kind of weird. What's with all the...fur?
Wait, did they say you're a...a hedgehog or something? Is that some kind of animal? That would explain the, uh, pink...and ears.
...I really can't make heads or tails of you. You kind of look like you should have a tail, what with that fur and all.
Ooh, you're into art? Do you think you could paint a portrait of me? Maybe frame it in your collection to capture my eternal beauty?
Ooh, so you're an artist? I know a particularly handsome man that can paint, too...think you could capture me better?
Did you say you go to school with men? I was never that big on school---except for art, where we could finally appreciate beauty!
Students tend to be such bores---like that egghead Parfet. But an art student? Now we're talking---my whole body is art!
How's a young little thing like you a model if you're still in school? I've got modeling potential, but it's hard for pirates to land a job.
A student and a model? And here I am, with all my beauty, and still a lowly criminal. At least I have my wonderful piloting skills.
If only my circumstances let me be the beautiful model I've always dreamed of being! Guess I'll have to settle for death-defying pirate.
You're a lucky one, Earth-girl. I never had the benefit of much schooling, nor the opportunity to be a model. So cherish what you've got!
Hey there, Plain-Jane. What's brought you here, with all your layers? Looking to overcome some shyness?
Exhibit A of Earth girls' ridiculous conservatism. Can't you appreciate your own body instead of hiding it? Must be men doing this to you.
What's up, cutie? You seem to be making every effort to hide that cuteness, actually. Just look at those packed-on layers.
I guess I'd be a little shyer about my body if I had your height and plain looks, but come on. Confidence makes any woman look better!
Hey there, short stuff. I think you might actually be shorter than Hibiki, which is a challenge even for women.
You said you fight "Titans"? I imagine that's everyone, considering your stature.
"Titans," huh? You mean like me next to you? Or anyone, really?
How's the weather down there, at the very bottom of Earth? You really need to drink your milk.
...See, this is why I'm going to be the Fama for Barnette. I don't want our daughters growing up all short from lack of milk.
Ooh, do you really report the news? Be sure to get my good side---oh wait, that's every side!
Hey there, Jumpsuit. Someone said you're a reporter---but this pirate doesn't mind a little publicity!
I've been in the media for much worse than a few glory shots, so don't think I'm afraid of that camera, newsgirl.
Hey, newsie, I've got all the story you need right here. Your Earth viewers have never seen a body like mine!
Hey, what's all this about the middle of Earth? Is there a spot underground that only you elf-people get to live in?
And I call Meia pale. You look almost ghostly...is that just the way you elves are?
Hey, what's up with those pointy ears? And the pale, Meia-like skin? You're a strange one, "elf" girl.
So you call yourself an elf, right? Is that another word for "Earthling with crazy ears"? Because you look human otherwise.
What'd you say you lived in? An M-M-O---ripgah? I can't keep track of all that.
Did you say you lived in a computer or something like that? Sounds like Heaven to Parfet, with how much she tinkers with machines.
So what's it like inside a computer? Do you have to wear a rubber suit to avoid getting electrocuted?
You live inside a game, right? And now you're playing a game? Is this whole place a game I've stepped inside?
I really thought I'd be the most lightly-dressed woman here, but there you go showing me up on that front.
Way to dispel my stereotypes of Earth girls being overdressed. You wear even less than I do.
Hey, I understand wanting to show a little skin, but you can't walk around in a bikini all day. Even Barnette doesn't go that far.
Even my darling little Barnette covers herself up better than you do...and she's got a reputation for dressing flimsily.
...Are you OK there, Ayano? You look a little on edge...especially when you look my way.
...You're looking a little bug-eyed there, "Ayano." Like you're all twitchy with anger.
Uh, are you OK, Ayano? Your eyes are all shifty, like somebody's watching you.
...Could you settle down over there? You're giving me the stink-eye like I killed someone. It's creeping me out.
Normally I'd say rock the skin color you have, but wow. Pink is not an attractive color...not that pink.
And here I thought Mejarians were the ones with the exotic body colors. Earth girls are breaking out the bright pink skin!
Why's your skin all gross-looking and pink? Like, really pink. It's distracting...so is that eyepatch, too.
Not to be outdone, Earth starts showing this Mejarian just how bizarre its colors can truly get. Next on the agenda: pink skin.
Oho---a fellow blonde! Good to see them running around on Earth---we've got to stick together!
Hey there, cutie! Always good to see more lovely blonde women running around. Got to keep each other safe from those jealous brunettes.
Ooh, is blonde your natural color? It's not as exotic as some of Mejare's other hair colors, but it's certainly appealing to be wrapped in gold.
What, was "Blonde Canary" taken? Because that's what I would advertise, if I were you.
I was gonna say something about that cool dark skin, but apparently...you're just some sort of image? What's that about?
You're..."virtual"? Listen, you can't just assume we know what these things mean. Piloting's a busy life, you know!
Wait, so you're not really here, and you're some kind of "virtual" avatar? Earth has really gotten advanced from all the technology they keep stealing.
Hey, if we can just use computers to project ourselves here, why didn't anyone tell me? I had to fly all the way here!
Ooh, the black-and-white look is a classic! Very striking and confident with that contrast. And such a cute little bow!
Maybe it's just me, but you've got a Mejarian sense of style! Clashing colors, nice and sexy and revealing! A woman after my own heart.
Ooh, that's a cute outfit, Blake! I love this dress, but I don't have anything quite as fancy as all that clashing-colors business.
Mmm...the lace, the contrast, the heels! I like your style, Blake! Not bad for an Earth girl.
