Haaagh...beauty shouldn't be wasted on piracy. How'd we both get stuck like this? Wanted posters over magazine covers!
Farmwork must be so dirty. I know it's important, but having to dress in an apron all day...where's the glamor?
Not to look down on your work, but I could never stand it. No one ever comes by a farm for a photoshoot. All the dirt and fluids...and the outfits!
So your Keyblade is a kind of magic sword. Or maybe more like a blunt object, and the magic does most of the damage. Am I right?
A magic sword...or a big magic key, anyway. Who cares what shape it is if the magic is doing all the work? That's it, right?
Oh, a magician. Are you going to make your clothes disappear? I can make a ship transform---or a planet change color.
Hahhn...not to look down on you, but card tricks seem so quaint these days. I mean, when you fly magical fusing ships that can shield a planet...
I-is this a game, or a trial? You keep talking about justice like we did something wrong.
I-I don't think I like hearing an Earth girl go on and on about justice and evil the minute I meet her. Are you trying to decide who's "good" or not?
U-uh...I heard Earth was full of plant life, but this isn't what I had in mind. W-who---or, what are you?

A-are you a---a plant-girl or something?
...Wait, this isn't going to happen to us if Mejare gets terraformed, right?
You should write a haiku about "Jura's Refined Elegance." Or maybe her "Dazzling Strength"!
Haiku are all about natural beauty, right? Do one about me! I'll even strike a pose.
I've seen a lot of beautiful sights as we've crossed the stars...but I never wrote any poems about them. You must have a favorite subject.
Heeey, Mitama. What's the most beautiful thing you've ever written about? Something that you just couldn't get out of your head.
Two girls who only want to capture their perfect elegance, forced to live lives of combat. Ohh, that was kind of poetic.
We've got some things in common, right? We both love beauty, and we're forced into war---so we try to make it beautiful.
Thinking about it, the men seem more artistic than we do. Our doctor likes to paint, and our navigator wrote this romantic letter to the vice-captain...
Sheesh...on the Nirvana, all us girls do is fight, pilot, engineer, maybe cook or dress up. It's the men who've dabbled in art and poetry.
Now we're getting to the good stuff. I hope your body is as beautiful as your wordplay.
All these fancy lyrics aren't compensating for a plain figure, right? It's time for the final verse.
Sheesh...I can't imagine spending all that time alone growing up. Was coming here everything you hoped it would be?
I hope this game has given you some inspiration. I mean, being raised in some shrine, cut off from the outside world? I'd be dying to meet people.
Seriously, what was "Team Magma's" recruitment process? You're really devoted to this.
How'd you fall in with "Team Magma," anyway? They've sure got you excited about it.
You knooow, you'd be pretty cute if you weren't so obnoxious about this Magma thing. Don't you have any hobbies?
I do other things besides pilot, you know. What's your off time look like? I mean, you're kind of cute.
Hmmm, I don't know how you put up with learning diplomacy. Everyone acting so fake-polite and getting offended at the truth...
Sheesh...you study diplomacy, right? Like an ambassador. I think I'd get kicked out of those meetings for speaking my mind about people...
Did Earth people always have to learn second languages? What a pain. I can't believe it took so long to just unite around one...
Whenever Earth started colonizing space, they were smart to just pick one language and stick to it. I can tell how hard you're trying to sound right.
By the waaay, I like how seriously you take yourself. Always hardworking, right down to your language! I think you'll go far.
You're pretty tenacious, aren't you? Fighting, studying, even speaking. That kind of fierceness is so cooool.
Officers' School...hmmmm. I wonder what I would've gone to school for. Probably not piloting...
Is this where you thought you'd end up, going to some military school? That definitely wouldn't have been my choice...if I ever got the chance.
Hey, what kind of combat training have you been getting that you're so excited about it? Like, what weapons? Swords?
What do you train in, anyway? Swordplay? I think you said something about your mentor and blades.
Curry's your favorite food, right? Barnette tried making some once, but it really didn't agree with me...ugh.
I don't know how you scarf down all that curry, let alone dozens of different flavors. I had Barnette cook it once, and it was so---spicy!
Ahaha, believe me, this stone-faced friend of yours...I can relate to trying to get a rise out of her.
Aren't you friends with some punk girl who never cracks a smile? That sounds...awfully familiar.
I wish I could be a movie star. I'd get to try on so many pretty clothes...all those assistants fixing my hair and makeup...and crowds of adoring fans!
You're so lucky, starring in movies...I should be dressed in scarlet, dazzling fans on the silver screen! And I'd even get personal assistants!
So what is the most beautiful Pokémon, huh? I wanna raise that one. Something elegant and refined...and powerful, too!
Well, if "Jynx" is a no-go, then what Pokémon holds the title of most beautiful? I'll raise it properly, and it'll be my strong, stylish steed, riding into battle---!
You're really pretty, by the way. And even taller than me! What are you really looking for here, huuuuh?
Heeey, we've got a lot in common, you know. Tall, beautiful, and a blade at our sides---sort of. So what exactly are you after---or who?
You're so serious. It's like your whole life revolves around training with that Keyblade. What do you do for fun, huh?

I can tell you're a good swordfighter, but there's more to life. Do you have any hobbies?
Or... other weapons, maybe?
Are you just gonna tease us about your mystical magical "Keyblade"? Once you've got my interest, you shouldn't waste it.
You really should've brought your fancy "Keyblade" if it's really so spectacular. Sheesh, I really wanna see it now!
Seriously, you're a Princess, and that's not good enough for you? I bet you have all these pretty clothes going to waste!
I can't believe being a Princess is some kind of burden in your book. Doting servants, a captive audience...and the outfits!
A-all these PK Powers of yours...they sound so violent. I mean---Freeze, Fire, Thunder? Don't you have---a shield, or something?
Your PK powers are awfully aggressive. Earthquakes and starstorms and things...it pays to have some defense, you know.
The dating scene on your islands sounds pretty grim. Like--- a bunch of old people, some kids, and greasy soldiers? I can see why you're here.
I guess you're into men, right? But it sounds like most of them around you, um---smell bad. And the girls are---is there even anyone your age?
Hmmm, you know, if it doesn't take too much psychic power, you could hold your boobs up that way. A whole life without sagging...
Have you thought of any mundane uses for your PSI? There's killing giant robots, and then there's...not needing a bra, maybe.
Ohhhn, all your talk about hot springs...they're so relaxing. Our ship ended up making one by accident, and it was heavenly...
Now that you'll be naked, I'd love to share a hot spring. There was one on our ship for a while, thanks to the plumbing... and it was great!
"Duel Monsters" sounds so nasty for a card game. And you play this all the time? Are there any pretty ones?
Duel Monsters...so they rip and slash at each other or something? Eww...tell me there's a beautiful card you could play.
So, a blonde on the fringe of society, trying to make do while a man she found wanders around on her ship. It's not easy, huh?
So this man, uh---Mega Man. You just found him, and now he's a crew member? I can relate.
Maybe I should help you move things along. Apply some pressure, and the feelings just flood out.
If you won't admit your feelings, I can always do a little nudging. You'll appreciate that.
...Er-hem. Don't get me wrong, I love being seen, but...maybe this is a bit too much.
"You don't lose anything by being seen." I live by that, but...that doesn't mean they have to see all of you, all the time.
O-oh my God. Can you not turn that off? What kind of a super power is that? Being ignored all the time? That's a curse!
D-do you mean to tell us...you're always invisible? Sheesh, that's one of the worst fates I can imagine! No one'll ever see me? Uggghnn!
Do you really play a game that drops garbage on your head? At least it hasn't left a smell...
Uhhh...does Puyo really involve falling garbage? That's not my idea of fun.
Seriously, you should come back to our ship! Be my own personal attendant. I deserve one, and Barnette's so busy lately...
Forget all your other clients, OK? You can wait on me hand and foot! And travel across the galaxy while you're at it. It'll free up Barnette...
Hey, heeey. Senko! What's the best meal you've ever cooked? What's your specialty?
I get so excited over delicious meals. Is cooking part of your pampering? It has to be, right? Tell me!
Oh, you know what would be a good pampering? Finding me some more pretty clothes. Do you think you could do that?
One of the hardest things to pilfer is a good outfit. We're always raiding the men, after all. New clothes would be a great pampering!
Saaay, what's the hardest you've ever had to work for a client? Someone who just couldn't be pleased?
Have you ever been pushed to the limit of your immortal life? Like, you had to pamper someone who was just a huge mess.
Some people just can't relax no matter what you do for them. I bet you've run into that kind of trouble, right?
You know why I'm so into this pampering thing? I'm a bit of a pleaser myself. In certain ways...
I'm kind of a pamperer, too, you know. Just not quite like you.

Maybe I don't sound like it, but I like giving as much as receiving!
...Almost as much. Still, we're not totally different!
Haaahnn...Earth is a great place, after all. One day I'll have a whole entourage of pamperers...
If I can find a helper here, then just imagine what's waiting for me back home one day. Oh, I can just see it...every day a glamor shoot!
Mohhhn, how come the Nirvana doesn't have some cute girl for a mascot? All we've got is a glowing engine...and Pyoro.
Does every Earth ship have its own cheerleader? That's so cool. We've had to make do with crystals and annoying little robots.
...S-so you've always been green, huh? It---doesn't look that bad. I mean, black's a good color with it.
U-um...I think you've made the most of your whole green thing, for what it's worth. Your dress complements it.
You know they called me a witch, too, back home? And I wasn't carrying a book on magic spells, it was just about having babies with men!
I can relate to this whole witch label. Some nasty judge called me that because I had a book on men and women making babies!
Ugh, OK, I thought it was a me thing, but I swear a headache starts creeping on whenever I look at you...
...What's your deal? I mean, I swear it's you! Every time I catch your eye, I feel a pang in my head!
...Do you ever wonder if you're just a thing to be observed? Even if you love the attention, your beauty isn't really yours?
I've always loved being seen, but---maybe the club president knows the feeling. Are we our own people, or just pretty things?
You understand, right? It's hard to balance practicing with staying beautiful. And sometimes, one can ruin the other!
I have to brush my hair as much as I have to brush up my swordplay. And shower, and groom, and pilot...how do you manage?
So it's not beneath a Keyblade Warrior to debase herself for us? It doesn't make you unworthy?
What's exactly in your Keyblade Wielder Code, huh? You think they'd put something about public masturbation.
Shouldn't a goddess be a little taller? And bigger, and well-spoken, and---not so clumsy.
...If you're Earth's goddess, I think I should apply. Who's gonna worship a tiny girl who keeps making a fool of herself?
Oh, so I'm in a princess's presence. I get being proud of it, but you shorties always go overboard.
...So you're the best Earth can do? You might be rich and noble, but there's nothing elegant about you. You're just shouting.
Aren't there some other elf girls you hang out with? "Kuroeda," and maybe some ogres, or something...?
You're not the only elf around, right? I think you've mentioned, uh, "Kuroeda." You're a whole little group.
Sleek warrior elf girl...it's hard to imagine under all that flab. Even your attitude isn't fierce enough.
You really used to be all agile? Slim and tight and serious? I haven't seen any shadows of elven elegance.
Oh, you must work here. Can I have some water, please? Maybe a complementary chocolate bar? You're so eager to be here!
Shouldn't you be dealing the cards? Oh, maybe you're a waitress. I'm a little hot---can I have a fan, please?
Healing magic...that sounds so wonderful. Jura always has to nurse little cuts and bruises that rack up from her Dread taking damage...
Mohhhn...you're so lucky. I have "magic" that lets me fuse a ship, but nothing that'll heal a little bruise. It just has to sit there until it gets better...
Uhm...you're dressed nice, but what have you been talking about? It's like you keep saying the wrong word on purpose. It's going to give me a headache...
...What's up with you? Is it supposed to be cute that you speak in opposites? It's ruining your pretty dress...
I guess you have to be pretty small to be stealthy. And you might have to fit in tight spaces...
I'm not really cut out to be a ninja, am I? There's too much of me to hide---in every direction.

I-is that---a clone of me? So Earth wouldn't stop at copying our fighters!
...Did they take some of my hair?
I-I can't believe it! Is this what Earth's been up to? Not just cloning our Vandreads, but the pilots...?
...W-well, I'm sure you love the attention as much as I do. We're going to have to work something out between us.
If we're going to keep the peace, then we're going to have to share the spotlight. You understand?
...We're pretty, that's for sure. I mean, I knew that, but...
There really is nothing quite like seeing things in person. I thought I was pretty before, but...

You know what's making me less confident?
...Of course you do. It's the men! Why don't they like Jura?
...Ugh, it's those damn men. All three of them, chasing after other girls. Ignoring our beauty! Anyone's ego would take a hit.
We should put our heads together for other things. That beautiful daughter...she'll need a name! Let's think.
We've both been struggling with the same things, right? Now we can vocalize it. Baby names, let's decide.
By the way, I bet your Barnette is just as cute. Maybe we should trade for a night. Do you think they'd notice?
Do you think it'd be cheating if we traded Barnettes? I'm sure yours is as pretty as mine---and just as jealous.
Sheesh, are you really a demon? You're so cute! Demons should be scary and seductive---and capable of murder.
I think I have more claim to "demon" than you do. Tall, broad, and dangerous, with red wings, terrorizing men!
Mohhn...is it really that fun to go "camping"? It might be too hot, or too cold...your clothes would get all dirty. And aren't there bugs?
Sheesh, I thought Earth people would just stay inside. The temperature's always changing, and there's gross animals around...
You should join our crew, the way you chatter on. Even I can't keep up with the bridge crew's gossip sometimes...
I like to keep up on the ship's rumors, but sheesh, you never stop...it's like when the bridge crew heads down to the spa.
Hey, I have a blade of my own. Are you proof I could turn it into some kind of magical mascot?
Were you magically born from a "blade" or something? Like, someone supercharged a sword? I wouldn't mind another cheerleader at my hip.
Ew, ew, ew...just what am I looking at? Where's your---everything? And why do you think it's pretty?
...Eughh, the---hole is staring right at me. I can feel the breeze coming through it! Is this what Earth's idea of beauty has become?
Is healing the only thing your magic can do? Maybe you could make it more advanced---like leave them more beautiful than before!
Now that I know magic can heal me, what else it can do? Is there a "beautifying" spell? Like, something that cleans dirt off?
Oh, Barnette collects old guns like yours. You know, that shoot bullets? And they make so much noise...
Hey, so are you another, uh---gun nut? Like, you have a whole collection of those "kinetic" weapons? Barnette does...
Ugh, not you again. I can't tell what's true and what's not...Jura likes when girls are open with their feelings!
Hmph. What Jura likes most of all in a girl is honesty. No games or gossip...
How come you call everyone "foreigners"? I know I'm not from this planet, but how about "treasured guests"?
"Foreigner" is a pretty rude thing to call someone, you know. My family is still from Earth!
Have you really lived for hundreds of years? I'm not sure if I'll make it to twenty-five...what a luxury!
Centuries of eternal youth...and you've lived them all? Not in cryo-sleep or anything? So much time to do whatever you want...
Oh, come on, Chihiro, suck it up. No matter what you strip, there won't be much to see.
You're not exactly a bombshell, Chihiro. Is that why you're so nervous? It just means there's no expectations.
Oh, just in time. It looks like your computer wasn't programmed for poker.
Oh! I honestly didn't think you were coming back. I mean, you had a backup here and everything...
...How do you keep calm? I mean...when you've got to heal someone, or take charge. And it's just up to you. It sounds so stressful...
They sure ask a lot of you, don't they? Run our village, bring us back to life, and lead the whole party alone. Doesn't it get overwhelming under pressure?
Sheesh...you can gamble your life away if you want. I don't launch without extra shields.
You risk-takers...whether it's playing cards, or flying out in front, it's not for Jura. Jura plays it safe.
What's so high-stakes about this, anyway? It's just a fun strip game.
How's a gambling addict even get her kicks from something so simple? There's no money, or risk, or anything...
Hoohn...you're kind of lucky, you know. A girl who exists purely to perform...to dazzle her loyal fans!
Your whole life's a stage...and millions adore you wherever you go! You won't even age, or die...it sounds like paradise.

Barnette, come and chat a bit.
{barnette}Uh...you, the camping girl. Do you really just cook instant meals, and things?

Barnette, this girl who just lost---it's like she lives off instant noodles and trail mix and whatever. Can you imagine?
{barnette}...Is that true?
Hey...you really do like all these books you read, right? I mean---you don't read them for the club.
If you're part of a club, and you've always got to name what books you've been reading to all the other girls...hmm. Does that---inform your choices?
Hmm. You've never seen yourself before, have you? Even "seismically." So this far in, you're really---flying blind.
So if all these vibrations stop with you...have you ever "sensed" yourself? Can you tell what shape we're staring at?

Barnette, c'mere. We're playing with a blind girl! Tell her about the time you hit your head...
{barnette}A-and went blind? You were there...

{barnette}Jura, that girl looks kinda shifty-eyed...{!reset}
She's blind! You're lucky the medics fixed you up back then...I bet it was scary.
Hey, Shamiko...my Dread is kind of demonic! Scarlet red, and shaped like a claw! A terror in the vacuum!
If you like the robots in your TV shows, you should see my Dread. Cutting-edge destruction in a sleek red package---fitting for a demon!
Sheesh, you're so annoying. Always yelling and goofing around...that's what girls do when they don't feel sexy enough.
OK, all the joking is starting to get on my nerves. It's not brave, you know. It's a lot scarier to put yourself out there, and be earnest...
...Wait. You read about Vandreads before. Does that mean you know about me? Search for "Jura Basil Elden," this instant!
I don't know who's feeding intel about our crew into your big public encyclopedia...but it can't just be about the Vandreads! What does it say about Jura?

Aren't you glad to hang out with people who really challenge your view of things?
...Well, not from the looks of it.
This change in scenery was exactly what you needed. You're so wrapped up in yourself that you ignore everyone who's different!
So you really hang out with just men? I'm warming up to them, don't get me wrong. But---that's a bit much.
You must have been looking for some female company. I can't imagine just spending all my time with our prisoners...
That crown you're wearing...so it can turn even an ugly monster into a beautiful woman?
If the whole thing about your crown is true, I hope you're gonna leave it on. Still...the fact it can give this kind of beauty to anyone! Anything!
So now that you're a woman, I hope you've realized you've got to move your kingdom. I mean, a giant, dirty, volcanic crater?
The way your "Koopa Kingdom" sounds, it's like one of those planets we say is "unsuited to life." No woman would want to rule a volcanic wasteland.

Hey, Barnette, come here! I heard this girl's good with guns. Even a sniper rifle, I think---
{barnette}R-really? I've hardly ever gotten a chance to handle one!

Barnette, look. This girl says she's sniper-trained. She has other guns, too, apparen---
{barnette}A-a sniper rifle? That's like the one thing my collection's missing!
Hey, so, you're really charming. I don't think that'll make your knees buckle. Which is exactly what I mean!
Mhmhm, nothing shakes you, does it? I love when a girl is steady on her feet.
You should grow up a little and collect some cool things! Elegant swords, powerful gunships...and heavy artillery!
It's really immature to cling to cute things, you know. Big girls like the cool and sophisticated...like a planetary shield mech!
Ugh, don't let your ghosts touch me. You and your weird powers...some things are cool, and some are just creepy.
Ewww...why are there ghosts surrounding you? They're plotting something. Keep them away from me!
Hey...do you have any female servants? Or friends? Or is it all just stuffed animals and swordsmen?
You could use some female company in that castle of yours. Someone to watch your dolls...and your fashion sense.
You're taking this game awfully seriously. I guess it's good practice for war games or whatever?
You are really focused. Are games your tactical testing ground before you're sent out with the troops?
So, um...do you have any hobbies? Besides making fun of people. I mean, I was really excited to learn what rich girls do here!
Tell me your noblility isn't just for show. Jura wants to hear all about fine luxuries and expensive collections...from someone who tells the truth, anyway.
...This is really some kind of---mental issue you have, right? Your face never matches your words.
OK, I think I get it. You've got, like, a---verbal tic. That's why you seem just as frustrated.
Before things get too exciting...I've heard you're a pilot yourself. Is your ship really pretty? Tell me it's got a custom design.
You've got a mech, right? Paint me the full picture! Jura's is crimson red, sleek and powerful...
Hey, are you OK? I mean...you just look really slight, like you should be eating more. Your hair's even white!
You're not---ugly or anything, but you seem...frail. If I pictured an old lady made young again, you'd be it.
Mohhn, I wish Barnette were here...back home, she fills Jura up with cakes and sweets, making sure she stays healthy...
Every time I look at this girl, I feel hungry...where's Barnette when you need her, to bake some delicious treats for Jura?
So you've done some swordplay yourself? I never would've guessed, looking at you...
Swords are heavy, you know. Have you really taken up that kind of thing?
Hmm...sooo, what's something you like about your body? Something you'll soon be showing us.
Maybe you haven't developed the way you would've liked, but...you don't look so bad. In fact...tell us what you're proud of! Physically.
I hear you did a little bit of everything on your fighting team. Magic, healing, even some swordplay!
Heeey, you're pretty multitalented, right? Not bad with a weapon, or with "Psynergy."
You know, Barnette's really impulsive, and she's always taking risks. It's just not with card games...
Maybe I can understand you a little. Barnette likes to gamble in her own way...and she also takes it too far.
Talk about desperate for attention. What was wrong with letting your cleavage do the work for a while?
Did you think you wouldn't hold our interest unless you sprung those things out right away?
Do you really own your own nightclub? That sounds like the perfect luxurious hangout for Jura...ahhn, I can picture it! Club Basil, Mejare's spiciest station!
Club Jura...maybe Club Elden? It's the emblem of elegance either way! Ohhn, to have my own hotspot. You're so lucky...
Unnh...don't play your music too loud. Trumpets in Jura's ear are going to give her a headache...
You didn't bring your whole marching band here with you, right? Jura doesn't want her ears ringing all ~background.time~...
Heeey...who is this Lady Satsuki to you, anyway? It sounds like you've known each other forever.
You're going on and on about Lady Satsuki. And she's just your classmate? Hmm...Jura wants to know more.
I swear, you shorties are all the same. You don't take up much space, so you make as much noise as possible.
Male or female, one thing holds true...the squirts are always noisy. You take it to a whole new level.
Mohhn...hmmnnn. To tell you the truth...you might not be the only one with a limited lifespan.
...Hey. I know you feel like time's running out for you, but, well...who knows how long a pirate will last.
Hmhm...it's a little annoying, but I like how you don't back down. Indignant posture is better than noisy posturing.
It's nice to meet a shorty who knows the value of silence. And yet...you'll stand up for yourself against the big, bad Jura. And always with that grumpy look.
Miss Yae Miko, you're very sure of yourself! Jura always does her best to have that mature elegance. But nothing in my wardrobe is that ornate...
So cool and collected! It's like you already know exactly what'll happen to~background.time~. And your dress is so pretty, too...!

state.text:
Hey, Barnette...I think you should keep an eye on this pipsqueak over here.
{barnette}You mean she might pull out a---trumpet gun, or something?

...This Nonon's got a temper and weird equipment to back it up. Watch her, OK?
{barnette}I admit, I wanna see what kind of firepower a band can bring...

case.state: D-don't call yourself a mosquito girl like that's normal! Are you some kind of experiment? And why, why some---bloodsucking insect?
...Ewww. I've heard about mosquitoes, and honestly...it makes me glad not to live on Earth. Did you get fused with one something?
Saaay, who are you exactly---involved with? You've tossed around, like, three or four names, but it mostly sounds one-sided.
Who's stolen the thief girl's heart, anyway? You keep mentioning different men, and I think there was even a woman in there? Or maybe it was just a gemstone...

state.text: Well, I guess you're never quite going to reply how I think, but---you're really cute! So try not to mess with people from now on.

...OK, I'm just going to say it!
...You look adorable! And you're wasting it on playing stupid word games.

case.state: You do make a cute little case for visiting Edo. What should a tourist know before she goes, huh?
So are all Edo girls as cute as you? Tell me about your customs so I can impress everyone when I visit.
I've got to respect your attitude, at least. Just as happy to lose as to win...you can ask for punishment, but I'm not sure I could torture you like you want.
I always thought I could crack the whip with a girl if she really wanted it. You know, take control, make her my plaything. But you'd probably wear me out...
Your work sounds kind of unglamorous. Shouldn't you be a model, some cultural icon for your homeland?
You must really like publishing to hide your beauty behind a desk all day. I'd want to stretch my legs across the nation!
You should tell us more about your friend Momo. It almost sounds like she's your babysitter!
You and Momo are really close, right? "Friend," "enemy," the vibe I'm getting is "big sister."
Should we be on the lookout for these "youkai," or are they all stuck in your...dimension? Courtesy of you, apparently.
I knew Earth had a bunch of weird animals, but now there's "youkai," whatever that means. You must be doing a good job keeping them locked up.
Maybe once you've shown everything, I'll finally know what to make of you. A good book must really change a girl.
...You're still pretty skeevy, but you're smart, at least. All philosophy to my physics. So go ahead and show us the physical...
Haahn...running a business, running a country. How do you find time for yourself when you're so busy?
How'd you schedule this between paragraphs and prefectures? I worry about that, you know...I'll achieve stardom, and then never get a break!
Do you think you can put your type into words? Time's running out to make your move, after all.
Things have gotten so serious now. You'll have to take this suitor-search seriously, too...can you tell us exactly who you're after?
Gensokyo must be old-fashioned...I mean, you call that underwear? That's an outfit!
You know, where I'm from, this right here has you ready for a day in town. How do Gensokyo girls stand being so modest?
Hahhn...your line of work is just too subtle. Pirates at least ambush with shock and awe! You, you're supposed to not even be seen in the first place.
Slip in, do the job, and slip out...like you were never even there. How do you stand it?
I'd probably let my nails get that long if it were any good for fighting...actually, yours do look like they're for fighting!
Y-you've got a pretty beastly air about you. Do you fight a lot? I always thought long nails were for elegance...
...Is it really so simple? You just say the opposite of whatever you mean?
...I really want to do this whole game over again, just to reverse everything you've said and see if it makes more sense.
So if you and Lady Satsuki are strictly friends, who do you have your eye on? You haven't spoken highly of men...
Lady Satsuki, off the table. Maybe I should believe that an Earth girl would be more into men. Not that you've had nice things to say about them...
You were just born this way, right? I mean, it wasn't the result of some---experiment?
Please tell me cat-girls are born and not made. I mean, you don't look like you've seen the inside of a lab...
I like this new look on you. You should strike some erotic poses for us, Mejarian-style.
You're rocking the Mejarian look. Hey, don't fall asleep on us! It's your duty now to make this sexy.
Does nothing ever shake you? What about back when you were only 200 or so?
One crisis is all it takes to crack that cool image. Tell me there were times you totally panicked...at least when you were centuries younger.
Can "Plus Anima" sense each other? Or, a better question...what animal do you sense in Jura?
Now that you've had time to size Jura up, I really want to hear what my own "Plus Anima" could be...
Oooh! Even ~player~ realizes how beautiful I am---enough to add a clone! You're so adorable.
Hey, what's this all about, ~player~? Did I keep on winning, and you wanted to see me naked that badly?
Would you look at that? My beauty was so enticing that ~player~ figured out the offline version just to add more of me.
Earth's cloning technology is well underway! And ~player~ picked the perfect specimen, I must say.
I never thought ~player~ could manage to flatter me, and then they go and pick two of me! Good show.
My, my, ~player~. You really like the look of me.
Oh my God, is that what I look like? I'm even more beautiful from afar than I am in a mirror.
Well, hi there, Miss Accent! That is just the cutest polka-dot bodysuit you have on!
Omigosh, your funny accent is so cute! It matches your goofy polka-dotted suit.
Well, aren't you the most adorable thing! All dolled up in polka dots, stumbling over your words! I could just gobble you up!
That's a pretty darling suit, with all the polka dots. And the way you trip over your words just makes me melt!
Would you like me to loan some layers? It looks like you're going to need them.
Tough luck, ~player~. But any good woman bounces back from a loss or two!
Poor little Earth girl. Don't worry, I won't make fun of your body too much.
Back-to-back shots always sting the most.
I see the old Mejarian charm to starting to get to you.
Can't take your eyes off me, can you, ~player~? Especially with my sword out of the picture.
Rotten old Lady Luck is such a nasty mistress. I, however, can treat you right.
So many losses...want to talk about it? You're such a cutie.
I live in artificial gravity...so I can understand your situation, so to speak.
Put your back into it, ~player~. What self-respecting woman is no good at cards?
Come on, don't they have cards on Earth? It's Gascogne's favorite way to get to know you.
What's wrong? Have you realized how many trinkets I have and are just throwing in the towel?
Come on, ~player~, Mejarians like a challenge. What would the Earthlings back home think?
Don't let your jealousy just make you throw in the towel, ~player~. All women can be beautiful!
Hey, you can still win...against everyone but me.
Don't just drop the ball. A pilot demands excellence of herself at all times!
What kind of self-respecting woman drops the ball with her opponent so close to being shamed? Earth girls...
Trying to beat me to the punch with all the glorious reveals? Or did you just forget how cards work?
What's up, ~player~? Too preoccupied with thoughts of male tubes to focus on the cards?
I know Earth girls are scared of each others' bodies, but come on, don't you want to see me out of this dress?
Come on, ~player~. I expect a man to get all distracted by my breasts, but a woman should have better presence of mind!
You seem a little distracted, ~player~. Has something caught your eye?
Shall I move my hair aside for a better view, ~player~? You know, since you're staring at them instead of your cards anyway.
I hope you're distracted by my breasts out of lust rather than jealousy. Envy makes your body ugly to match your heart.
It's OK to stare, ~player~---I'm very beautiful. Sure you don't want to pay more attention to the cards, though?
I have lots of secret weapons. My Vandread, my breasts...and my fabulous golden hair.
Thought I was all out of tricks? I'm out of interest, but not tricks.
I just knew flipping my hair back would finally draw your eye. Leave these foul Earth men behind and be with women!
Oh, ~player~, you're embarrassing me with your lustful gazes. Earth women don't love each other the way Mejarians do!
What's with this sudden spell of losses, ~player~? Could it be...you're feeling a certain attraction you hadn't before?
Ah, a wandering eye and a miserable poker streak. Classic signs of a woman in love.
I know that lustful, distracted look, ~player~...it's the same one Barnette and I gave each other when we first met.
Ready to join me, ~player~? Women are always better off sticking together in this big universe of ours.
You're stripping so fast, ~player~! I like women's bodies...and I don't think I can keep up with this!
Don't get complacent, now! A Mejarian leaves her mark on a scene long after she leaves.
Tsk, tsk. The Mejarian girl finishes, and the Earth girl thinks it's safe to play it fast and loose.
Was it worth it, ~player~? Wasting all this effort trying to win, when I'm the one who's relaxed and comfortable now?
And it all comes tumbling down. If it's not life-or-death---why worry so much about winning in the first place?

state.text:
Oh, Barne---
{barnette}I-is that a first-model CZ 75? It's in great shape! We should compare it with my antique...!
Hey, Barnette, you're not the only one packing. Some girl called ~player~ has one that looks just like your CZ...OK, don't get too excited...
W-wha---! ~player~, your gun---it's the short-rail and everything! I've got one, too! I've taken really good care of it! You wanna see?
...Is that a CZ 75, ~player~? Barnette would never let me forget what it looks like. You're gonna steal her from me!

Oh, Barne---
{barnette}I-is that a MAC-10? It's in great shape! We should compare it with my antique...!
Hey, Barnette, you're not the only one packing. There's a girl called ~player~ here...she's got that pistol you have with the bolt and the big magazine...
W-wha---! ~player~, your M10---I've got one, too! Suppressor and everything, both catridges! You wanna see?
Sheesh, another gun nut. Who walks around their home planet with an SMG? I even recognize it---it's the mac-and-cheese, or whatever.

case.state: Ahhn, that costume is even cuter than in the mirror! I feel ready to carve the turkey just looking at it.
Haaahhn! Some things you just can't appreciate until you see them in person. Like Jura's own adorable Santa Shorts...you go, "Red Claus"!
Just like on our Dread team, I'm always supporting others. I must have been shielding you from more dangerous hands.
Looks like Earth girls have some fight in them after all. But of course, the Mejarian is still on top.
Pretty good streak, ~player~. Fancy using some of that luck to beat me for a change?
We have ourselves a loser! But you did hold out for a while.
Nice little run, ~player~. Let's see if you've got smarts down the stretch.
Couldn't hold out against Mejarian wits forever, could you?
Just when you needed your streak most.
Hey, don't give up, ~player~. I don't like women who just roll over and take the abuse.
Quite the poker face you were running. You'd make those stonefaces on Anpathos proud.
More runs like that, and you'd have a spot on our pilot team. Meia's always scouting out recruits, you know.
You've got the ferocity of Mejarian soldiers. Too bad I know how to handle them.
Hey, keep it up. And if you see her, Meia loves women that can put up a fight.
Don't give out on us now! I was starting to come around on Earth women.
Can't get complacent, ~player~. I've got quite a few layers left.
Nothing like breaking those streaks. Stun the enemy and go for the kill!
Not feeling so confident anymore? Women have to keep their composure if they want to keep up with those bestial men.
Don't let the loss of your streak rattle you. Got to grab Lady Luck by the arm and twist!
For a second there, I thought I'd actually lose to an Earth woman. But you just couldn't keep it together.
Yeah, yeah. We always outlast your little Harvest-bots, too, so no surprise.
Don't you want to see me show off the good stuff? Well then, I hope you have another streak like that left in you!
Oh, ~player~? That lucky run wasn't lucky enough. Too bad!
Keep it up. I like women with a little fight in them...like Barnette.
Good work, not getting all distracted by my beauty. Bit of a blow to the ego, though.
You had a streak going. You're one step closer to streaking yourself, though.
Nice little lucky run. Luck's a good trait in a pilot...and in a lover.
If Meia were here, she'd be going on and on about your impressive strategical skill. You'd have to get her naked enough to loosen up, though.
Just couldn't keep your streak together when I'm like this? Yeah, I understand. Just take it easy and ogle away!
Finally broke that lucky run with my exquisite figure. Now do you understand the appeal of your own sex?
Knew I'd finally distract you long enough to lose. If you think I'm beautiful, there's a whole pirate crew full of women almost as gorgeous...
Don't fight your lust, ~player~. I know that look in a woman's eye...a burgeoning love of curves and smoothness.
Broke your focus, did I? Maybe a little? Come on, ~player~, stroke my ego here.
I can't fault a lucky run. Every victory over the Harvest we have takes some luck in the end...and a whole lot of love.
You go. Keep up those winning streaks, since you're so obsessed with winning for some reason.
You've got more fighting spirit down the stretch than I do. Me, a pirate! I can't help but root for you a little.
What incredible poker skills to last so long. Only problem: this is strip poker, and the objective is to strip.
Yeah, yeah, ~player~, enjoy your little lucky poker runs. I'm going to roll over and think of love and babies, fully at peace.
Nice job maintaining your poker face despite our little "session." I've always worn my heart on my sleeve, and it's brought so many wonderful women into my life!
That's not the kind of skill that impresses a pilot crew. Dumb luck is for men.
Streaks like that might earn you a spot on our crew. You know, if you could pull them off consistently, and knew how to pilot.
I won with that? This is gonna be a breeze.
I know damn well I shouldn't have won with that...you Earth people are never gonna see me naked.
Oh, wow. A high card is enough to beat you people? You'd better enjoy the way I look now.
...Yeah, listen. I've got more layers than it seems, so you'd better hope me winning with a high card was a fluke.
Thanks for getting me out of that jam. Here's a little leg for your trouble.
Close shave for me. Thanks for taking the hit.
Too close for comfort. But now I'm quite comfortable...too bad for you.
Seems you can always count on Earthlings to screw up their cards worse than you did.
That was a high card I had, so you really did me a favor.
Did I ever tell you how sweet I've found Earthlings to be? Going and losing for me when I had such a bad hand...
Hah! And I had a high card. Dealer, you're just messing with me.
Yeah, yeah, I'll get started---wait, I didn't lose? I had a high card!
Damn it, I---wait, how did someone have worse than me? Oh, wow.
...I'm just not sure what to make of you anymore, Dealer. You give me trash, and the rest of them burning trash.
You just pissed away your best chance to get me out of my dress...or did you?
To think that for a second there, I was actually worried...actually, I shouldn't have been regardless.
Damn, do I have any accessories left? ...Wait, I won?

Well, isn't this an interesting turn of events? A tie...
A tie? Even in all my games with Meia, that's never happened---truly, this is a monumental night.
Well, now! You don't see a tie every day---what a perfect way to mark the visit to Earth of Mejare's crown jewel.
...Oh, is there a rule for a tie? It seems like they'd be awfully rare---perhaps we should all strip in celebration.

...Hello? What's the holdup?
...Oh, a tie. Big deal...
...Oh, ties are super rare, aren't they? Well, it's hard to care when you're not even playing...
...Well, don't I look foolish? All that talk about being a rare beauty, and I'm out by the time a rare tie comes along...
Oh, just get on with it. Everyone should strip if it's a tie---what do I care at this point?
~blank~
...Wait, one of you is a man? But---you---I...wow.
...Wait, I'm confused. Men and women don't look that close. Are you sure you're a man?
...Oh. I really thought I was getting good at telling men and women apart...
...Wait, you're a man? I mean, Duero wears his hair long, and Meia's is short, so I don't assume anything there...
...Are you sure, Meia? I mean, B.C. fooled you, too.
...Wait, really? Well, wouldn't be the first time, although poor Corrin here seems to have fooled us by accident.
...Uh...good eye, Meia. Well, this is awkward. Sorry, Miss---Mister. You're still pretty cute...for a man.
...Meia, don't mess with me. Are you sure? I mean, look at her---him.
And how would you put it? An adventurous rogue, or just a lowly bandit?
What's this "Matt" look like? Do you think he'd have any objections to making a baby with me?
Well, I'm just frustrated. I've been searching for a man who might impregnate me, and we barely meet any in the first place.
...Really? You should, uh... probably sort that out first. I'd rather chat with someone who knows the planet they're on.
...What? This doesn't seem like the kind of place you stumble into and then stay in. If you're just making fun of me, I really do want to learn about this planet.
W-what? How can you even say that to me? And who exactly is your ideal subject, Mr. Artist?
What? How dare you! I have proportions that would make a statue blush! If I'm not worth painting, then who is?
E-excuse me? I would think even a man would know beauty when he sees it! What kind of woman is catching your artist's eye, exactly?
Oh, I just can't wai---w-what? I---that was charity, and I'm not good enough for you? Take me into a man's mind---who would you rather be painting?
Wha---what? I'm no artist, but I know the perfect model when she offers to pose for you! Maybe you could enlighten me as to who's a better fit!
Oh, and you've even got some proper manners. I guess if men are always falling in love with girls on this planet, then you'd actually know how to please them.
Even paying me compliments? Earth men really do know how to treat a girl. You should see the clueless Tarakkians I have to deal with.
Colt .45s, right? She's talked my ear off about them, but she's only got pictures. They're ancient---even the men on Tarak use automatic guns.
Aren't they those old revolving guns? They're so ancient, she doesn't even have a set. Just automatic rifles, handguns you load with clips, that sort of thing.
This sounds like the kind of talk that comes from my mirror. Maybe you're right, but I deserve a full explanation to honor my visit here.
It's not like I know what men are supposed to wear. Those look good at a glance, but I want details.
Our navigator tried to do that. He thought he'd be fitting in with us better to wear a dress and makeup. But he just looked all boxy and weird.
Maybe it's your slim build. Our navigator's a little bulkier, and he did not pull it off. It was a ploy to get on our good sides.
So would I be any good at it, then? What's the most important skill you need?
Is that so? Well, if you're a champion, then size me up---do I have what it takes?
D-don't flatter yourself! If we weren't playing a game, I'd have ditched you already.
Ugh, who'd want to be with you? Maybe someone who needs a new carpet.
U--uh...P-something? You're making fun of me again---and you're doing this again!
...Pee-niss? I think that's it. Ugh, why'd it have to be the nosehair again...?
We don't throw rookies into a cockpit. If only there were some kind of flight sim for men.
Yeah, right. Maybe we should let trainees crash a Dread on day one. That's what I need, a practice simulation...
...Is it your penis? No, that can't be it. At this point, I'm not sure you even have one.
It's another trick, I'm sure. Maybe your body is just underwear all the way down.
Well, they're more like crewmates. They turned out to be pretty useful. Just not very elegant...
It's not really like that. We gave them all jobs, and they can roam around as they please! They just choose to live like prisoners.
Monado? It wasn't for a weapon that I started learning...
So you're mostly self-taught? That's a thought---a sword so inspiring, you learn for its sake.
So what? I'm a pilot and a blade. Unless...you mean something different?
Um...what does that mean? Driver and Blade. Because that's how I'd describe myself, all in one girl.
Join the club. I mean, I'm not royalty, but...we all used to be a lot better off, as did Mejare.
Mohhnn...that sounds familiar. A lot of Mejare's prestige got whisked away, and we bore the brunt of it.
Oh, I see. It's thin enough to see through, and you just like messing with people?
Ah, I see---it's thin fabric. Men and their deceitful ways, thinking they could pull one over on me!
Could've fooled me, with that hand you were rocking. Still, I guess the fabric's thin enough to see, and you just like playing pretend.
So you're just a fan of the dungeon look, and the blindfold's thin enough to see through? Nice try fooling Jura Basil Elden.
There you go. Fully sighted like the rest of us! I don't buy that nonsense about it being a visor...can I see it?
If that thing's really a visor, toss it over here. If you get to cheat, why can't I see how?
You're not afraid to let a simple human woman see what advantages you had, right? Give it here.
I'm calling your bluff on that thing being a visor. I think you're some weird fetish-man who's been peeking at the cards underneath it. Can I see?
Something the matter, Mr. Muscle? You look so dreadfully uncomfortable.
Am I being distracting, Mr. Muscle? Well, you're guilty of it yourself, with that hunky body of yours.
Am I drawing your eyes? Well you started it---how can I not stare at all those muscles of yours?
See something you like? You seem so uncomfortable around women for an Earth man---I guess you've never seen one like me!
...Wait, you're a man? Aren't men...tall? And, you know, masculine?
...Oh, you're a man. Well, that's disappointing. What's the word for this? Han-droggo-niss or something?
...Huh. You're a man. I guess I can work with this, but wow. You really had me fooled...
...Oh. Well, this wouldn't be the first time a man fooled me into thinking he's a woman, but that was on purpose...
Oh, weapons count, do they? You've just given me an excellent idea, Handsome.
Nice sword you've got there, Trigger Finger. Even better, it's revealed to me what counts as "clothing" in this place.
Do weapons really count? That seems too easy...but I guess this place plays fast and loose with the rules. Interesting...
Would you look at that? Jin is very kindly setting the precedent for weapons counting. I'll keep that in mind.
Eep! I---I thought men liked having sex! And w-what's the flashing about?
...You're not into it? I thought men loved women's attention here---w-why are you flashing?
Ohhhh, you too? Why can't I get a man to like me? I thought Earth men were all over women---oh, and now he's putting on a light show!

state.text: What? Aren't men into that sort of thing? I wouldn't---eek! D-don't---flash at me! What happened?

case.state: Of course you are. Have you considered that might not be the right career choice for a shorty like you?
Oh, are you serious? No wonder a gang of pirates can fend off Earth's assaults---its soldiers are pint-sized scaredy-cats.
And quite a coddled soldier at that, clearly. Hey, I'm a pirate---and that's because I'm a big girl, Mr. Shorty.
Are you sure about that? I've seen bigger, buffer men than you running around---you're better off as a woman's plaything.
Hmm...I never thought about what to actually ask. Well, Mr. Angel, what do you like in your women?
Ooh, thanks for the opportunity. Well, then---since I have a tiny little man in front of me, how do you like your girls?
Oh, Pit, you're so sweet! You know, I have a hard time seducing men---what're the traits a woman should have, would you say?
Oh, a question? Well, you're a man, so what kind of woman do you like, hm? What makes that tube of yours stand up?
Oho. So when I take off my sword, it's a lame first impression. But not lame enough to not copy.
Oh. Mm-hm. Taking off your weapon---I wonder where he got that idea?
I didn't realize men were such fabulous hypocrites, Trigger Finger. But at least you're not too scared to be disarmed around me.
Removing a sword, eh? And here I thought men were the honorable sex. But no, you're content to emulate what you criticize.
I'm just teasing you. I'm sure you'll prove quite an interesting male specimen...oh, is the mask coming off already?
I see you're the type to take every little comment to heart! A sensitive man is a fascinating one---hey, are you dropping the mask so soon?
Ugh, noooo, you're doing this again! Keep it away---!
Ugh, why'd it have to be the nosehair again...?
Honestly, I think I understand even less now...
This whole experience has raised more questions than answers...
Go and do your stupid Hair-Fist. You are not fooling me a third time...
Don't you realize how tired this is getting? If you want flair, you've got to mix it up...
I didn't say I minded. There's no greater gift than a compliment...
That sounds pretty good! Beauty deserves attention, and plenty of it...
You really think so? But women always like it when I flirt with them!
Seriously? Men are a strange species. Girls love it when I come over and play around!
Men don't like being teased so much? But I always tease girls! What am I supposed to do, just wait around for them?
What, so I just have to wait for a man to tease me? That's boring! Women always like it when I approach them!
Come on, ~name~, where's that male bravery I always hear about?
For shame. Little old Hibiki's got a bigger spine than you, ~name~.
That's all you've got for me? So much for the courage of men.
Wow, really? Men wear that? What, to keep lecherous women at bay?
Wouldn't you rather take off something exciting? It'd certainly excite me.
How could a man be boring to me? Just do some jumping jacks, I'll learn something.
You're so boring, ~name~. The three men in my life are much more exciting.
You've still got all that left? Guess I'll have to get creative.
Trinkets on a man? Like a license plate on my Dread.
A man dolling himself up is so cute. Leave that to women---we're more beautiful.
Is this revenge for my accessories? Well, I hope you have some more.
Can I still complain about this? For now...yes.
Exactly what I deserve, I guess...
Are you still going on with your little trinkets?
Come on, I'm actually excited to see your body, ~name~.
Still removing trinkets? Hey Dealer, how about you and I hold this man down and strip him some more?
Oh, give me a break already.
I'm sure Tarak's proud of your devotion to strategy.
Men wear that? Really? Is it for your job or something?
Definitely have no right to complain now. Except that I'm from a planet of all women and I'm very curious about you.
Never thought a man would doll himself up this much. Bad time to learn that.
Hey, ~name~, if you want an accessory, take my thong. Covers about as much.
Ugh! Even now, you won't show me something good?
I can't believe men can even count as high as the layers you have.
Oh, give it a rest!
You're such a pain, ~name~. Is it too much to ask for to see your tube? Maybe collect some seed while I'm at it?
I was planning on seeing a man's tube...I was not planning on men being any good at cards.
I don't need to come back to this place. Maybe I'll just show you what I can do with that rapier.
Oh, come on! Let me see something good! I'm sorry I teased you!
Really? You won't let me see your tube, even when I'm like this?
...Unyielding to the end. Lighten up, for goodness' sake.
...Should I spread my legs wider or something?
Honestly. I knew men were stupid, but boring, too?
I think I'm just gonna leave. Even after all that, the men still don't want to show me any tubes.
What is with Earth men? I thought the sight of a nude woman just turned you into raging beasts.
Oh, the indignity of it all, being humiliated by a man this way. Awful!
~blank~
Ohhh, you're no fun, Nayru! You convinced him not to take more off! I want to learn about men!
Can't you pipe down? I'm trying to seduce men here to learn about them, and you're telling them to be smart!
Hey, this is my one big chance to see a man's tube! Why'd you have to go and tell him not go slow, Nayru?
Buzz off, would you, Songstress? It's not exactly easy for a Mejarian to seduce a man, and I have a lot to learn about them!
...~player~, you're making me look bad in front of Nayru. Couldn't you have taken off something bigger?
...Well, I know I started with little things, but I was supposed to be seducing you, ~player~. Now Nayru's making fun of me.
...Oh, come on, ~player~! I mean, I started small, but now Nayru's teasing me!
Well, that's a blow to the ego. Men aren't so easily seduced, just as Nayru here claims...or you're mad about my accessories.
N-nooo, what are you doing? ~player~, I wanted you to get some shots of me later!
W-what? Heeey, don't throw that away! Mohhhn...Jura thought you were really excited to film her...
N-nooo, what are you doing? ~player~, I wanted you to get some shots of me later!
W-what? Heeey, don't throw that away! Mohhhn...Jura thought you were really excited to take her picture...
So why do you two look the same? ...You're the same person? But---how's that possible?
W-wait, you're the male version of her? Where's the male version of me? I bet he's handsome!
Oh, wow, you're the same person, but the opposite sex? Where's the male me? Tall, gorgeous---and blond!
T-this is really incredible. Are there male versions of every woman I know? I wonder if male Barnette is handsome...
Hmph. I hope I'm not still stuck being a lowly pirate fifteen years from now. I have to start my modeling career while I'm young!
"Mira"? ...Oh, right, men marry women on this planet. My girlfriend is the clingy jealous type, too.
That won't work---I can get my girlfriend to donate an egg whenever I want. You see, if I have a baby with a man the natural way, I'll be famous on my homeworld!
...Hank? The su---I saw this planet's sun on my way here. I don't appreciate being made a fool of, you know!
Who---what are you talking about? This planet's sun looked perfectly healthy from orbit. Stop talking in your little friends' lingo and help me out here!
You---s-sculpture? Erm...well, I'd rather not be some milky-eyed chunk of stone. All because I'm too tall for your canvas?
...Sculpture? You can't be serious---why not just use a bigger canvas if I'm too tall? I want to be colorful, graceful, elegant...I want lights in my eyes!
I'm---too tall? D-don't give me that! You can make your canvas as big as you want! I should be an icon, not a rock.
I---I can't be a statue! Statues are for outside the Imperial Palace, and they're not exactly slender! Make your canvas bigger---it's not like I'm two meters tall!

S-sculpture? I don't want to be a---w-what?
Meia?
What the hell does she have to do with---she doesn't even wear makeup!
Sculpture? L-like, a statue? That's not what I---M-Meia? Wha---just what makes her more interesting? How her hair isn't brushed?

I don't want to be a statue! Come on, just---M-Meia?
Wha---what does that mean? If you want to sculpt one of us so badly, she's the one with abs!
You mean, like, soldiers' fatigues? Men always seem to wear really baggy stuff. Maybe it's comfortable, but it'd be a waste of a good figure.
Uhhm...are men's clothes always those loose fits I see them in? The comfort wouldn't be worth it, looking like I've got something to hide.
Haaaahn...that sounds like so much fun. Having money, I mean. But there are a couple dresses that I definitely find irreplaceable...
Sheesh...that sounds like such a fun game to wake up to, chasing and setting trends. Still, I have a few favorites that'll always define "Jura Basil Elden"!
...Jura likes how poker leaves room to chat.
...Poker has a nice social aspect.
Oh, Barnette does that. She's all too happy to hand me a rifle. I think it turns her on...
You mean your supplier? Barnette'll bring more guns than she can carry, just to get me to use one...then she stares.

state.text: You mean your man-Oma? We're pretty isolated ourselves. The men on Tarak certainly don't want to talk.
...Oh, like a male Oma. Men really like keeping to themselves...as people and as countries.

case.state: Hey, what that supposed to mean, Gearbox? What Barnette and I do in private is none of your business.
Oh, please. I'm the giver in my relationship...Barnette would get to wear the blindfold.
Oho! And Little Dungeon Bot shows some spunk. You're getting more human all the time...maybe we could use that blindfold.
Ha! About time you manned up and talked back to me. But to be honest, Barnette's usually wearing the blindfold.
Well then, don't think I won't tease you! It'll just be in a different sort of way...
A man who looks like a woman might be exactly the kind of seed I need...wouldn't want my children all hairy and gross.
OK. Well, nothing I can't work with! Now you're cute in a completely different sort of way, Mister Corrin.
Don't feel too bad about it, then. Women's bodies are so much smoother and luscious anyway...you should strive to emulate us.
..."Stand"? I have a Dread ship, not...whatever that was. Come on, don't scare me like that!
"Stand"? Hey, who's the one saying nonsense now? I flirt a little and you start scaring me!
I'm a woman on a faraway planet, and you start yelling at me and making light flashes! I don't know any "Stands"!
..."Stand"? "Possess"? Hey, I know you don't like me, but that was freaky, Jotaro! What are you on about?

...Were you trying to give me more time to check out your tube?
...Jura is very flattered.
...Did you forget about ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~, ~name~? Jura won't mind if you say she distracted you...
We'll see if you can keep that up against Mejare's finest.
Well, since you're not being interesting with your stripping...ever slept with a woman?
I think there's quite a lot you could teach me about men tonight, ~name~. Consider yourself a fine male specimen?
You could be very enlightening for me, ~name~...but not with stuff like that.
Makes sense, I guess. Men from Tarak don't know how to have fun, either.
If only Duero were here. He could help treat your no-fun-itis.
Is that some kind of rank insignia?
A man wearing accessories...you're just trying to make me curious, aren't you?
Slow down there, ~name~. Your manly accessories might push me over the edge.
You're a regular Bart for this sense of fashion. He dressed as a woman once.
Stripping decisions like this should be punished. You know what to do, Dealer.
Funny. I consider men accessories.
I knew Tarakkians were no fun, but you'd think an Earth man would be. Sheesh.
I should've played this with Duero instead. He's handsomer and doesn't wear much.
So, uh, is this because of the game, or do men actually wear that on Earth?
Guess living around women doesn't loosen Earth men up at all.
What is it with men and accessories? Women love fashion, men love...military badges?
Hey, B.C. has a lot of trinkets...but for some very good reasons.
Be glad I don't still have my sword, ~name~. I'm feeling a little incensed.
What's a Mejarian to do with an uncooperative man? Try to sway him with a little skin? Or just gobble him up and be done with it?
I wonder if Hibiki would count his dogtag. Why's he got that thing, anyway?
How could a man manage to bore me? I know, like, three of them.
Men can grow hair on their faces, right? Why would you ever want that?
This isn't fun anymore. Now I'm just a bimbo who got outwitted by a man.
Ah, jeez. The men I know are from Tarak, and they'd still throw me a bone.
You would think living around women would teach Earth men how to have fun. But no, apparently not.
Wouldn't you rather strip nude and masturbate to me? I mean, really.
Men really are competitive. I'm right here, who cares about the cards anymore?
It's nothing but competition with you men, honestly. Work together for once.
This is more annoying than when Pyoro is talking but doesn't want my opinion.
Men can be so cruel. I'm at my most vulnerable, you know...
Let me see your tube already. Look how much I'm showing you!
Guess I should've taken this game seriously if I wanted to see any men's secrets.
Never thought I'd get outplayed by a man this badly. I figured you didn't know what cards were.
I mean, come on, ~name~. You think I teased you like that to watch you remove your ~clothing~?
I don't give a damn about men's fashion. Let me see your body already!
Ugh, men are the worst.
Hey, listen, ~name~. I know a doctor who's more handsome and wears less. So get stripping.
~blank~
M-Meia? Oh, come on, not the headpiece! Now you're just making it look like I hate you in front of Zizou!
Wha---hey, I didn't tell you to remove your headpiece! I have plenty of respect for you---you're making this worse on yourself!
Just because I'm fun doesn't mean I don't respect you. Come on, keep your headpiece on!
Oh, don't start with the headpiece just to make it look like I'm torturing you! I respect you! You could've told me no!
...It was Halloween that sparked this change, right? I noticed you don't have beer this time, and it might be...affecting you.
...No beer cans tonight, Miss Misato? I hope this skeletal look isn't withdrawal symptoms.
Heeheehee! I see right through your embarrassment, Chun! You two make a cute couple, being so polar-opposite!
Oh, you don't have to deny it! Juri is so intense, and you're so serious! Opposites attract.
Don't feel bad about your old flames! Barnette's much more serious than I am, too---opposites attract!
I know a thing or two about womanly love, Miss Li, and there's no reason for embarrassment. Girls are always drawn to those unlike them!
M-Meia? What's this all about, taking your headpiece off? Is it because the sweater girl is looking at you?
H-hey, what's going on? The Meia I know doesn't part with her headpiece so quickly! Is Haru staring at you? Should I go threaten her?
Hey, Miss Sweater-stock, what are you staring at---M-Meia? Your headpiece, so quickly?
...L-Leader? There's no need for that...h-hey, Sweater-skirt, don't stare at her!
Ooh, and she's into it! Meia, we can't take a woman-loving Earth girl lightly!
Look at that, she's a fun-loving drinking type. And an Earth woman who's into girls is not a given.
Ooh, a party animal! A cute blue-haired Earth girl who understands womanly love? You two are soulmates!
I honestly didn't think Earth girls appreciated each other at all. Good on you, Sei---and since opposites attract, you're a good fit for sourpuss here.
It's a miracle that we even found a cute Earth girl who's into women. Sei, you're the perfect sugar for Meia's ice!
Well, she's definitely a little miserable, but soldiers strike a nerve with her. And Meia, don't be so vindictive!
Oh, you are impossible! I'm sorry, Sei, she's usually not this wound up. It's because you're military.
Oh, you being military personnel definitely switched her from cold to acidic. Seriously, Meia, give her a chance.
I'm telling you, Leader, you'd be a lot happier if you weren't so judgmental! It's because you're a soldier, Sei---she's normally just icy.
We're pirates, Sei, so none of us like the military. Meia just holds onto grudges...sourpuss.
Hey, what's with the stereotyping? I've met fun-loving blue-haired girls---you're just not one of them.
I'm sure there's a blonde out there somewhere that's as miserable as you, Leader. You can have miserable babies together and die bored.
Ooh, I never took Meia Gisborn for a bigot, stereotyping blondes. Besides, I'm not going to pretend friendliness is a bad thing.
I think it's great Yang is so friendly! You could stand to learn a thing or two from us boisterous, fun-loving blondes.
Is that your excuse to not try and find someone? You don't have to give them a big wet kiss in public.
You always have a reason that you can't date anyone. All those feelings can only come out in private if you prefer.

I guess so.
...H-hey, what're you removing that for? I thought you wouldn't even count it...
If you say so...o-oh, your---headpiece, first up? I know you take it off to shower, but...!
That's called muscle, which you might build up if you actually used them. And you, Erufuda---you might start to see yours with enough exercise!
You mean my thigh muscles? They're the difference between slender and skin and bone. Or fat, if you prefer pigging out on potatoes over flying.
Well, I've never had trouble demanding what I want from people...you're always say you have to rely on yourself first, you know?
...Well, when I want something, I do it. And I don't like losing. You're the same way, right?
...Meia, you don't know what she's talking about, do you? It's a little creepy.

H-hey, you don't need to summon anything here. Or---anyone.
{small}...Meia, we should keep an eye on this girl.
W-what? I don't even know what that means! You look fine! Besides the smoking...and the tattoo.
Uh...w-well, you might look cuter in a dress, but you're not ugly! Stop assuming the worst all the time!
Oh, low self-esteem, hm? I don't know what you just called yourself, but you'd be much cuter if you weren't always grimacing.
...Women are a lot cuter when they smile, Revy. That goes for you, too, Meia, by the way.
See? I say one thing, and now you're blowing up again! You're cute---it's your personality that's ugly.
Hagh...if you think that's hard, I've had my own trouble giving orders. You're not easy to fill in for on a whim, you know, Meia?
I'm actually second-ranked behind Meia, so I've had to give my fair share of orders on short notice. That's a lot harder, trust me.
Hmm. Waiting tables is...well, I'd charm the customers, but Jura wants to be the star.
Something like a waitress or a salesgirl, huh...I'd get attention, sure, but---people should be competing for Jura's attention!
Heeheehee! Oh, you're hopelessly in love now! This is so cute!
I knew we'd meet a girl here who was your type---and with all these hormones flowing, you'd have to break your stoicism eventually.
Do you hear that, Chunners? It's the sound of ice melting nearby. You've lit a fire in her heart.
Go on, Meia, ask her out. You both know how an exercise session is going to end.
Of course she does! She just refuses to show it, which is why I drag her to places like this. She only ever smiles with Ezra's baby.
Why do you think I brought her here, Miss Polka-dot? You need steam to melt all that ice of hers...or a baby.
Oh, my Leader is an absolute sweetheart, Miss Accent. You should see her with Ezra's little baby!
Meia's the sweetest girl you'll ever meet, Miss Ladybug...but she only shows it when she's making our crewmate's baby laugh.
Meia just doesn't like crowds or strangers, that's all. She thinks she's got to be all dignified. But see how she acts with a baby!
Y-your headpiece? ...Hey, Glasses Girl, leave her alone!
Eek! Y-your headpiece? ...Hey, listen up, Four-eyes, don't tease Meia about her headpiece!
...You're taking your headpiece off? ...Oh, ignore Daria, Leader, she's just being rude as usual.
Y-your headpiece? You don't have to, Meia! ...Zip it, you little four-eyed squirt! That thing means a lot to her!
M-Meia? You're taking that off? Is it because there's a man here?
Wha---what's this all about? Your headpiece? Don't take off your headpiece because this man might make fun of you!
...Is this because there's a man around? Come on, Meia, don't take that off if you don't want to!
Your headpiece? Oh, don't do that, Meia, you're making me feel bad! Are you letting the man here mess with your head?
U-uh...please don't start fighting. You two are cute together.
Oh, here we go. You made her mad. You two would make such a cute couple, and you ruined it!
Oh, perfect, now she's angry. You could've landed yourself an adorable girlfriend, but no, it's a matter of principle.
...Meia, if you leave this place with a broken nose instead of a cute girlfriend, I'm telling the captain.
P-please don't hit me. Or Meia. I know she's rude, but you two are so c-cute...
Ah, youthful ignorance. Everyone gets hit eventually---like you are right now.
Am I wrong, or have you been getting hit this entire time? You might have all your clothes on with a shield or two.
I think your current dodging performance is providing some evidence against your strategy. Life's all about taking hits, not dodging them.
Says the girl who's been taking shells head-on more and more. Lots of rookie pilots think they'll never get hit---then they panic when they do.
Oh, Shimakaze...so naive. You're getting hit right now! Hey, Meia, you like speed, too---take a look where it gets you.
That's the spirit! Don't let them ruin the time you have to yourself. I like getting full spa treatments, personally...
That's the best part! Sex appeal is a girl's pride. It's your job to win us over!
People watching is what makes it so exciting! Don't you get a rush, knowing they're drinking in your feminine beauty? It's your identity!
OK. Show us what you're made of. I want you to act proud, confident! You're strong and sexy and you know it!
Well, why don't you give us a taste, right now? Let's see your impression of a bombshell, fierce and flirty.
I'm here for a lot of reasons...I mean, it's Earth! Back before all the colonies were settled...men and women, living together!
It's not the only reason. You live here...me, it's like walking through history! The two sexes, interlinked...
What makes you want to try, anyway? A lot of girls are happy just supporting someone else.
Hey, most girls don't even attempt it. They know their place as one of the "stagehands."
Haahn, tell Jura all about it, OK? I need some fantasies to get me through the weeks of the same old dress...
...Keep going! I need something to dream about every time I open the closet and see only a few hangers...
You opulent types are always so defensive. You can make fun of my dress if you want---I have self-esteem!
Figures Princess would get all huffy when I make fun! Surely you have something mean to say about my wardrobe.
All that money, and yet such thin skin. You won't see a pirate like myself get so defensive about her clothing.
Ohhh, Weiss, don't be so indignant! You're a lot cuter when you're happy---come on, you can poke fun at my dress.
You'd think she'd be more secure, on top of that...
She'd also take the words of mere mortals in stride.
...What are you the goddess of, exactly?
...Instead of getting defensive, maybe you should just demonstrate yourself.
You going to throw up? Looks like it...well, don't face me when it happens.
Can we get a janitor over here? This girl's about to pee herself.
Jeez, this girl's gonna spend the evening sobbing. Can't we just tell her to leave?
You're no fun. You're such a head case that I can't even tease you.
...Well, that's one down.
...I really thought Earth girls handled men better than anyone. I wanted to see her naked, too.
...That girl really needed some time on Mejare to toughen her up. Men are giant pushovers.
Sigh...I should've known we wouldn't all make it through this without someone bailing.
Well, I mean, if anyone was going to chicken out, it was going to be her.
Oh. It seems I've been wooed by a siren, who's come to steal my beauty away from Barnette.
Shut every eye? I never thought you'd try to seduce me! You're so disarmingly pretty---and my girlfriend's armed.
Oh, my. The forest songstress has lured me into her little trap---now she's going to put me asleep and ravish me, unbeknownst to Barnette dearest.
Are you sure you want to put me to sleep, Nayru? Try anything funny, and my girlfriend will get violent!
...You just made that whole Oracle business up to get me interested, didn't you?
...Oh. Well, thanks for nothing. Can't you predict someone else's, just so I know you're not lying to me?
...Spectacular. Really. Truly you're an Oracle for the ages.
...I could've said that. You know, when I talk about my piloting skills, I can actually back it up.
...That's a little vague, don't you think? I was hoping you could get it down to the color of the flowers.
...Hm. So they're those kinds of predictions. I could've said something that vague myself, Nayru.
Hey, I asked for my future, not my horoscope. Trust me, I spend a lot of time in space, and the stars are just as vague as you're being.
...That's it? Come on, I thought you were cute, and you're holding out on me! What's a good place to steal wedding dresses?
...I wanted details, Nayru. I already know we'll go through challenges---we do that for a living. We fell in love in an asteroid field!
Really? Oh, I was worried we were moving too fast! Soon I'll be a Fama---what does our daughter look like?
Ooh, are you sure? Any more details? What's she look like in her dress? How do our kids look? I can't wait to have a daughter!
Perfect! I'll propose tomorrow---she'll be so excited! Oh, what'll our little girl look like?
Ohhh, that's great! I'm always afraid we'll get into a fight---how do our daughters look? Beautiful?

What? What kind of answer is that? You know what a bad future could be to me? Getting shot down!
...I---uh---that bad? Is one of us going to die? Because that's what a bad future is to a pilot!
What? Why'd you get all evasive? You think we garden for a living? You don't just tell a pilot her future is bad!
W-what? What's a dyke? Why are you so mad?
Eek! I---I, uh...what's a dyke? Among other questions.
...Dyke? What's that mean? Other than something rude, judging by your tone.
...I don't know what dyke means. Besides being an insult. And what's with the attitude?
W-what? I don't even know what that means! You look fine! Besides the smoking...and the tattoo.
Uh...w-well, you might look cuter in a dress, but you're not ugly! Stop assuming the worst all the time!
Oh, low self-esteem, hm? I don't know what you just called yourself, but you'd be much cuter if you weren't always grimacing.
...I tell Meia all the time she's much cuter when she smiles, Revy. I think that advice could go a long way for you, too.
See? I say one thing, and now you're blowing up again! You're cute---it's your personality that's ugly.
