Clearly you need the woman's touch for a confidence boost. After all, Barnette's a gun nut---and she has me!
Revy, men are overrated! Be with a woman instead---a dead-serious gun nut like Barnette found me, after all.
Men must be very judgmental, then. Try women for a change---I said you were cute, and Barnette's kind of like you! Just less vulgar.
Hmph! I never thought an Earth woman would get under my skin like this. I miss Barnette...
Ohhh, how'd I get stuck with this awful woman? Those metal men's guns...she's like a vulgar, classless version of my Barnette.
Now I want to go home and hug Barnette, just to prove you wrong. I knew living around men might make Earth girls vulgar, but you're just awful!
Oh, just shut up! I come here to learn about Earth, and I get a foul-mouthed bitch! Barnette, I'm sorry I even came here... having to strip near this woman.
...Uh...what's a grandfather? Like a grand-Fama? It's mostly the "father" part I'm confused over.
That's, uh, a lot of family history. You lost me at "father," whatever that means.
...OK, I know what "grand" means, but what's a "father"? Is that some weird Earth term for Omas?
Wait, wait, stop, forget the makeup. Now I'm confused as to what a "father" is, though apparently they're grand.
Oh, come on, honey, don't be like that! Come on, give details! Put on a light show!
Now, is that any way to treat a guest? I'd show you the fabulous things my Dread could do if you asked.
You'd really refuse the pleas of a beautiful, exotic alien woman? All I want is a little demonstration!
Don't brush me off like that! You're a shrimpy little cutie, but I know plenty of those---dazzle me with magic!
And what is "Planeptune," exactly? You rave about it like it's some kind of paradise.
Are you? I am a twenty-year-old beauty in the prime of my life. I guess you just stopped growing around twelve.
Ew, stay away from me. Even your weapon is creepy and inelegant. I don't want you looking at me, either.
Well, why do you have a mask? Don't play dumb with me, you weirdo! And don't talk about killing!
That would be nice. The least you could do to put us at ease is not look like a crazy homeless woman.
I'd appreciate that, thank you. Did you really have to show up to strip poker looking like a deranged slob who couldn't wash herself?
Eugh. You certainly don't have a cute personality. What's your immense power, to make your breasts shrink?
Eugh, you don't have to yell. If you're so powerful, why can't you make yourself grow to an adult?
Oh, this isn't what I wear for protection. We have spacesuits that make us look like chubby demons---but really, what's so protective about a short skirt?
Tripping, when this dress is cut for me to make full sprints in it. I suppose you're "protected" because attackers can't find your head underneath that floppy thing.
Well, what do you know? We have something in common. Even when I ask men to give me some of their seed, they just get all flustered and make excuses.
Men haven't responded well to my requests, either. What's so scary about asking them to make a baby with me? I've been so direct about it.
Men do seem to chicken out when girls ask them for anything concrete. We have some shared experience--- have you been asking him for his seed, too?
No, I wouldn't. Don't desecrate this dress's style with your flabby fat folds.
I'd prefer if you were thin, because then you could make anything look good. A dress like this deserves a lithe body within it.
And I'm disgusted right now, but I'm holding my vomit back for everyone's sake. You could learn something about holding back.
I can tell. I guess exercising self-restraint isn't how you got to this point.
I'm jealous of Barnette back on the ship, getting to change with girls who are in shape. I've got to have her cook for me less.
No, I'm doing just fine, thank you. In fact, I don't think I'll ever eat anything again.
Oh, sure, go ahead and savor them. If you came here to find your one true love, I think you already have.
Ugh. Why don't you make out with them while you're at it? I haven't embraced Barnette the way you "savor" those things.
It'd be totally clean. Why don't you do us a favor and pull up a chair? You could chomp away as you watch your striptease---no undressing needed on your part.
I guess some girls are born to be in the audience rather than the spotlight. The least you could do is excuse yourself and just watch us, then.
Maybe we have different definitions of shoveling food, much like we have different definitions of beauty. Why don't you speed up for my sake?
I guess so, with how long I've had to watch you munch on them. Have you tried going faster? Maybe swallowing them all in one go?
...Oh, God, you're serious. Earth has more horrifying cases on its home ground than we ever saw it inflict on others.
...You really mean that, don't you? And I thought the Harvest was the worst Earth had to offer.
...Oh, did I let that slip already? Well, this didn't look like the Earth I know when I arrived! So watch your mouth, and that knife!
...You know that? Oh, I probably mentioned it already---Earth shouldn't be my enemy in this time! So back off!
That doesn't mean it's OK for you to get all stabby with me! The Earth that's after us is a gear-covered acid planet, anyway---don't make assumptions based on passing comments!
Oh, come on, do you Earth girls really consider men marriage material? Like I said, I'm busy with all our scrambling, and I still make time!
Oh, don't give me the "busy" excuse. I'm stuck on a ship that's always getting attacked, and I'm still in love. And I really wouldn't marry a man---they don't seem too reliable.
You sound like an instructor. Of course, they were always very interested in what exactly we were reading, as if there were things we shouldn't have been.
Are you a student or the librarian? I remember looking for books on Earth history once, and they got all quiet before saying those were "by request." Not worth my time.
Oh, I've gained plenty of knowledge firsthand at this point. Our instructors always told us to read like you just did---read from a very specific list of approved books.
Perhaps on Earth, the world of books is wide. On my homeworld, they said the same thing, but so much of it was about the glory of our women's empire.
Is that what your teachers have told you? Just make sure that wide world of books you're reading isn't all from the same publisher...like on Mejare.
Ugh. It's just the arrogance of it all. How many other psychic ghost girls are wandering Earth after what I assume are twisted genetic experiments?
I suppose there's even more of you? Do the authorities kidnap random children and pick at their brains to create superhuman freaks?
That's called muscle, which you might build up if you actually used them. It's just the active life a pilot leads, in between getting my flying fix.
You mean my thigh muscles? They're the difference between slender and skin and bone. I can't help but build them up as I dash to our hangar to go flying.
Well, perk up a little, then. Maybe get into the spirit of things with a sexy flourish.
Maybe stripping a bit will help put you at ease. You know, loosen up and socialize.
Well, how should I put this...? It's sexy, but there just isn't any class. Maybe Barnette and I can give you a Mejarian makeover!
Well, it's thoughtless sexiness. Just wantonly flaunting your skin, your hips...oh, Barnette and I should dress you up!
Well, you're dressed for the beach. All the sex appeal is in your body, not the outfit...oh, Barnette and I should find an outfit for you!
Hagh...if you think that's hard, I've had my own trouble giving orders. It doesn't help that it's always been in emergencies, like our leader's down.
I'm actually second-ranked on our squadron, so I've had to give my fair share of orders on short notice. That's a lot harder, trust me.
I-I didn't mean they were killed! Just---only children. Are you all drawn up into some kind of war where you live?
Oh, God, I think Gascogne's sister was killed...well, that's not what I meant. They were always only-children. What's going on where you're from?
Power our ship? I thought it was just some silly game you played---like, on a computer.
...Are you serious? How are you playing games with the sort of thing that powers a starship? And why would you call it "Puyo"?
...The whole team, by yourself? Shouldn't you be on the team, then?
...The team? You mean, with yours? That's a weird thing to say.
Trained like birds, where they land on your arm and bow? Or are you always---whipping them?
I don't really know much about animal training. Don't you have to whip the big ones or something? I've seen bird shows where they look friendly.
That's easy. It's when Barnette and I got together! We crashed after a botched mission and had to survive in Mejare's asteroid field...
Aaah, I know exactly what it is! A decoy ship explodes, two pilots marooned on an asteroid, awaiting rescue---that's how I fell in love with Barnette!
Is that it? Barnette's been feeding me for two years now, but I shot up to this height in school and stayed there. It took me a while to embrace it.
I haven't grown in a while. It all came at once, in junior high, and I've learned to love it. Even Barnette's cooking hasn't filled me out.
If they're so devoted, there must be a use for them. They could be your hairdressers. Or maybe carry you around on a throne!
That sounds like the makings of a fan club! Just have them set up lights and cameras wherever you go, or fan you and paint your nails...
Hard at work butchering them all. What's the rest of your day filled with, paperwork?
Maintaining your death chamber, maybe. What else do you do all day that's so hard?
So you really mean it with the whole goddess thing? What's that even about? I want to be one, too!
You're really serious about goddess powers? You have to tell me more! I'd make a stunning goddess---just imagine me with magic!
This game's all about sharing, right? No "you" things. Not if they might involve me!
Seriously, I'm not from here. Don't go keeping things to yourself that I really ought to know!
"Pull it off"? We can see the roots! What was wrong with your old look, anyway?
You're not fooling anyone with your---brown crown. Seriously, what was the problem with "brunette"?
We're talking, aren't we? I really don't get what's so hard about it. Haven't you ever met a girl and wanted to just cry into her chest?
...I don't know, I've always found it pretty easy. Most girls see you showing some weakness and are happy they can do it, too.
So it's more about the animals. I guess I don't get that---there are no native animals on Mejare. Just whatever we brought to be useful.
Oh, right---Earth has wildlife. That's so weird to me...I mean, all the animals on Mejare are for food, or as pets.
...I don't know what that means. Is it maybe like---it's got a mind of its own, sort of? It only lets you control it?
...What is it, a person? Or---do you have some special connection to it, like it only listens to you?
Are you telling me you've never made anyone jealous? That's why they say that sort of thing in the first place.
Really? I mean, a man's not comparing himself to you, right? Girls know we have them beat, so they start making up ways that they're better.
...Huh? T-they're just poking fun! What's wrong with flexing your looks a little?
...W-what? I---get along just fine with everyone! And if I want something, I turn on the charm---that's what they mean.
That sounds familiar, too. Behind every murderous machine is a human controlling it...
Where could all those machines come from but people causing trouble? That's our story.
Ohh? So what do you revere about the elegance in this room? The glory of the naked form?
Now you're talking. Is it the nude body's elegance that's got you reverent today?
You don't see a lot of animals on Mejare in the first place. What are you raising, exactly...?
Are these animals all, um, "livestock"? Like, chicken and beef---I mean, cattle? They don't exactly just wander around back home.
I don't know, I think you need some kind of bonding experience to make something that really sticks. This is just too silly.
Even if that does happen, is a lasting relationship really going to come out of a silly strip game? You need to---go through something together.
Mohhn, whyyy? It's just a silly game, anyway. I'll tell you everything I love right now!
Waiiit? Jura hates waiting. Can't I just explain while we play?

...Still, who wants to sort through all that? And clean it up after...
...So it's, like, junk? Or scrap metal? That still sounds like such a pain to deal with afterward...
Ugh, fine, I guess you don't want it brought up at all. I don't like dancing around things!
W-well, it's weird, yeah! I'm sure you get that a lot, but I'm not going to ignore it!
It's not the only absurdity back there. How about how a generational beauty like me ended up stuck as a homeless outlaw?
If you want to know how absurd my home is, look no further. What kind of nation forces its best specimen into piracy-exile?
Did they also take your home and force you into crime? I should be on magazine covers, not a wanted list!
The fakes have always been worse than the original, but I can't spot a single difference...
But they've never been perfect copies. As far as I can tell, she's---as perfect as me!
Yeah, it annoys me, too. Just take things off the way you were planning to.
Better than fighting and ruining our hair. Or our dresses...or tossing them off first thing to one-up each other. How pathetic.
Yeah, it annoys me, too. Just take things off the way you were planning to.
Better than fighting and ruining our hair. Or our dresses...or tossing them off first thing to one-up each other. How pathetic.
It's stupid...there's much bigger things to worry about.
Mostly I save for doubts for other things, so that one especially bothers Jura...
It can't be physical. There's no one who compares to us! They must just not trust women, and we're being too forward.
We must be thinking about this all wrong. It's got to be personality! They like sweet, or ditzy, or...just don't want attention.
Uh...do you mean that literally? I feel like you're gonna start sparking any second!
Thunderous energy? D-don't discharge anything onto us!
I've had close calls! I lost a liter of blood once and had to fly back out on painkillers a day later.
Try being the wounded! One time I got gashes on my head and stomach. Off to medical straight away and I was still out for over twelve hours...
That's no fun at all! You must never get a chance to show off. I guess that's why you came here, right?
Sheesh, I don't think I'll come to visit. Wouldn't you like to show some skin? This must be your one chance!

It's not one or the other! If there's combat happening, then everyone's focused on that. You should dazzle friend and foe alike!
You'll never get attention on the sidelines! That's why I became a pilot---to become our crew's shining golden heroine!
I'm just saying, it's all for fun. Maybe they really hammer in the competitive spirit when you're army-trained...
If you say so. I guess after years of officer's school, it becomes second nature...
What happened? Some kind of spell-gone-wrong?
Did magic do it to you? Jura wouldn't go anywhere near some kind of aging hex...
Huh? Well, all our supplies are on the ship, Lysithea. You also like that kind of thing?

Oh, do you have a sweet tooth, too, Lysithea?
...You could've fooled me. Anyway, it'd have to be back aboard.
...So you don't know what you're talking about. Just "swing a few times" and then lay down judgment.
...How proper of you to lecture me, then.
Uhhn...well, I was talking about other girls. You know, watching them stammer and stutter?
O-oh, I...wouldn't know about that. I meant coming on to girls...men are a mystery.
Our crew's just been under a lot of pressure lately! You don't wanna die leaving things unsaid.
Well...when every day brings a new battle, you wanna tell someone you love them---in case you don't make it back.
I'm just saying, it didn't make the journey to Mejare. Then again, neither did men.
Well, it's not like I really know what's normal here, especially so far back. It's just not on Mejare.
Oh...well, you sure seem to know the place. Maybe you know the staff?
...Oh. But Jura really waned to be serviced...are you like a regular here? Call someone over, OK?

Hmph!
...I guess we're all lucky in our own ways.
...How fortunate for you. People's luck must even out like that.
You. That hat is like a quarter of your height.
You come up to my chest. That hat is gonna come off soon, you know.
Please. Mine are in proportion.
I'm not jealous! Sure, yours are bigger---and they're stuck on that tiny frame.
Jura is a hard worker. I run the pilot team in Meia's absence, you know! And I always get what I want from people. What's your biggest source of trouble?
That's no trouble at all! People are already drawn to Jura, and I put in the work to become our subleader. What business takes up most of your schedule?
Jura is strong! I'm just---sensitive. Barnette can grit her teeth and not feel anything...
Right, inner strength...I usually let Barnette handle that. I don't want to close off all my feelings, OK?
I wonder if our doctor could diagnose you...maybe if he did a brain scan.
Apparently our infirmary can produce whole readouts of the brain or whatever they are...Duero would love to hook you up to one, I bet.
Well, I wouldn't have said anything, but you're kind of mussed-up and dirty, too.
Either way, you're a really active type, right? Or, on this planet...outdoorsy. It'd explain the mess.
Really? Tell Jura more. What kind of adoring crowds do you draw? What about works of art?
Ohhh? Are there paintings, statues of you? Maybe half those novels are from fans!
Hey, if you've got something special, you should flaunt it. All tousled and tenacious...
...Why not? Some girls love that wild look! You shouldn't be ashamed of what makes you stand out.
Not allowed to leave? Like, since you were a child? Oh, that just tugs at this free-spirited pirate's heart!
Oh, you poor thing! Cooped up in a house all those years...my pilot's heart yearns for adventure!
Who was making you stay inside? You're an even bigger girl than me---just force your way out! I love adventure...
The universe is a vast place, Aella...take it from a star pilot. How rude of...whoever it was that imprisoned you.
Oh, good, a magic trick. Still not very monstrous, you know.
Well, I can't say the Monster Lord isn't one for showiness. Nice smoke job.
Heeheehee! It's certainly a lord's job to entertain, so whatever this is, I'm up for it!
Oh, she's trying to surprise us one last time. Let's see just how monstrous the Monster Lord gets, shall we?
Well, let's just say Mejare's government is a little...wasteful with our resources. Hence my piracy.
I'm a pirate for a reason. The reason being that "Mejare" and "efficiency" are enemies.
It's not really a matter of space travel. Mejare just goes through resources in a way that makes pirates out of its most beautiful citizens.
Oh, don't worry about the space travel---that's the Paksis's job. Mejare is just so very wasteful...it made pirates out of me and my family.
So long, Ang---oh. Well, I guess that counts.
Awww! And here I thought I had beaten you. But no, you proved too wily for me.
Damn Earth girls and their tricks. Who would do that, bring a bunch of accessories to a strip poker game?
My pilot's eyes should've spotted that, but you snuck right past me---and yourself, even.
Eeeek! Not the face! Or the hair! Or the dress! Don't hit me anywhere!
Aaack! Stay back! I'll use my sword, you hear? I mean it!
...Are these your friends, Cammy? I think I should leave now.
Nooo! Don't tear up my dress! It's all I have! I'll stab you, I swear!
Aaack---oh, it's just Cammy's ex-girlfriends again. You really get around, don't you?
More disgruntled ex-lovers? How old are you to have broken all these hearts, Cammy?
It's really bizarre seeing this fistfight---normally I'm at the center of fights, being a pirate and all. I guess sleeping around makes even more enemies.
My, so many angry exes! I think you might want to stop cheating on them, Cammy---I'm nothing if not honest to my Barnette.
Ooh, dropping your sword, are we? That gives me an idea...for later.
Swords count in this dinky little place? How lawless...and fortunate for me.
Well, as long we're counting swords...I happen to have one, as well. Thanks for the tip.
Oh, good, lovely Miss Pegasus is setting the precedent for counting weapons. Now I have an excuse...
Teehee! What's got you so tired, anyway? Is there a girlfriend I should know about?
Seriously, why so sleepy? You know that's no good for your looks!
Awww, you can use me as a pillow. But why are you so tired in the first place?
Sleeping is even more important than eating, Chiaki! But before you pass out, fill me in on what's made you so exhausted.

Hey, Princess...you can't strip what makes me beautiful.
Royals...talk about jewelry for jewelry's sake. It's supposed to improve your looks, not create them.
Thaaaank you! Now the property of Magno Vivan's pirates, little Miss Princess! So sorry.
Heeheehee! Such a tease, Miss Valentine! You can deny it all you want, but I see myself written all over you.
It's OK to want to distance yourself from me. I am, after all, taller and more beautiful.
Why deny the similarities? Women across Mejare wish they could be mentioned alongside Jura Basil Elden.
What, too proud to admit we're alike? Afraid I do your image better than you?
Wha---oh, goddamnit! Just take things off in a proper order!
Hey, I came here to see some Earth nudity! I don't appreciate being toyed around with!
Yeah, yeah, hotshot. Real clever. You definitely played this game and didn't want people to see you naked.

I hate it when people bounce around with the importance of what they take off. Let the audience know what to expect!
Ooh, have a little fight in you, do we? But once you've signed up for this game, it's all up to chance.
Oh, don't start pretending the idea of being nude doesn't excite you. You came here...and now you've left it up to fate.
