Oh, my! Adorable and polite! Jenetta, any woman would be lucky to have you!
Just pretty? Don't you think I'm beautiful, too? Oh, I'm just teasing---you're so polite, a girl should snap you up soon!
Oh, how flattering, Miss Bunnyhop! With those sorts of people skills, I bet you've got a girlfriend---or will soon.
Heeheehee! Are you single, Rabbit-ears? Because you'll find a woman quickly with that sort of flattery.
Oh, that commitment to your costume is so adorable! ...Wait, you're serious?
...What? T-that's ridiculous---women don't have rabbit ears! This is an act you're doing, right?
Oh, just stop it, Jenetta! I've sniffed you out like the bunny you claim to be! ...Right?
Oh, don't insult my intelligence. Even on Earth, girls don't have...did those things just t-twitch?
Ooh, you are mean. Don't be that way---I like your colorful sense of style!
Ohh, don't be so rude, Jolyne! You're cute, and your fashion sense is making me dizzy with excitement!
Well, I was on the money there. What a shame such a fashionable, adorably cute girl is so nasty.
Ouch. Even with that cool outfit, anger makes a woman look ugly---you're much cuter when you smile!
I sure hope I age as gracefully as you do, Kitty-cat. Of course, I hear that's easier for shorties...
Oh, you're reminding me we all grow old! Even I won't remain the pinnacle of beauty forever...plus, being tall is taxing.
I'm sure you were quite the looker back in the day. One day I'll be in your shoes, and being big is hard on the body.
So, Short Stuff, what's it like being old? I'm worried that being so big means I won't age well...
...Wow, I was just kidding. You really are a sex fairy, just presenting like that.
Honey, you can't just present like that right from the get-go. The audience can't get what they want until the grand finale.
Seems Earth girls overdo it as usual. What kind of tease would I be if just spread my legs right here and now?
Easy there, hot stuff. You're already wearing so little---no need to spoil what surprises you have.
And a Bless You to---to...where'd Launch go?
...That's, uh, a pretty hard sneeze. Didn't realize it could turn your hair blue.
...Uh...is this an Earth thing, or would my hair turn blue if I sneezed too hard?
...Launch? Where'd the blonde girl go?
Losing your sword, hm? Not a bad idea...I wasn't aware this place counted weapons.
Maybe you're smarter than I thought, Swordswoman. Why bend the rules when you can slice right through them?
Is that your sword you're throwing out? I guess that makes me the leading blade-wielder at this table.
Oh. And your sword was actually quite stylish. Perhaps I should strip my rapier, too?
Oooh! That sounded so cute, honey, whatever it was! What does that mean?
Teeheehee! I don't know what you said, but your home language sounds so silky smooth and romantic! What's it mean?
Ooh, what's that mean? Because it sounded like the most romantic thing I've ever heard!
Omigosh, that's so romantic-sounding! What does it mean? I want to talk like that!
Anyway, I---your headpiece? Really?
O-oh wow, your headpiece. I...didn't think you'd even take that off.
Huh. I thought you might save that for the end, if you took it off at all.
Wow. Your headpiece? You're taking this pretty seriously.
Y-your headpiece? It's OK, Meia, you don't have to...
Awww, c'mon, you can tell me! I'm not even from this planet---how's the secret going to get out?
What kind of organization is this where you won't even tell an alien? I pirate and fight organ-harvesters---there, I told you!
It's OK, I'm from Mejare---no one here is going to know! You can tell me anything.
Really? You won't tell me, the alien? I'd gladly give you a tour of the Nirvana! I could show you my Dread!
Does this establishment frown upon you bringing your own beer, Miss Katsuragi? You seem like you're here to have fun, but it's a bit rude to the owners.
Would you look at Miss Military? She's chugging down beer she brought herself. Mejarian bars usually prefer to sell booze to their patrons.
I hope you brought enough booze for everyone, Misato. I'm sure the proprietors would prefer if you sold it and gave them the proceeds.
Did you really bring cans of beer here, Miss Misato? I don't know much about Earth money, so maybe the prices are a bit much.
Management? What is up with this girl?
...I'm totally lost. There's rules about what you can strip? They didn't tell me any rules.
...Honey, did the bouncer clock you upside the head before you came in? I'm not teasing, I'm dead serious.
I...what? Management? Yeah, you could use a little management, that's for sure.
...Did I miss something? Can't we take off whatever we want?
...Is there really a nebulous management that's got guns to our heads if we don't strip how they want?
...Who exactly is holding a gun to your head and making you do this? Hey, are you listening?
...Why do you have to take off your shoes next? I mean, you should, but apparently you have to?
It's refreshing to know you won't acknowledge anything I say. Real liberating.
...Look, I know I tease a lot, but I'm just having fun. Nothing about this is fun.
Talk about a lost cause. She won't even acknowledge me.
Hey, Ocean Girl. If you're being held against your will, blink twice. I'm a pirate, I understand.
Sounds like the words of a woman with only a cursory understanding. How do you make them twitch? Or get the seed out?
That's all there is to it, hm? Come on, Mr. Man---where's the seed come from? How can I get some?
Blood isn't the only part of that equation. I know men's seed is made of something else, and I want some.
Oh, but I'm not satisfied with that explanation. I want men's seed---how can I make it spurt out? Or just cut it from them directly?
And those fantastic pointy ears! And your flowing dress! Ooh, you're so cute!
That flowing blue dress is almost as delightful as your hair! Oh, I wish I had something like that!
Oh, I just want to wrap myself in those azure locks of yours! Or maybe slip inside that magnificent dress! I'd really fill it out.
This is the only fancy dress I have! Yours is so bright and lively---I love the way it hugs your little frame!
Dominion? Well, now...I guess we know which one of us is the kinky goddess.
What do you mean, dominion? I treat my partners like equals, because I'm a selfless lover.
Ooh, getting into your sex life already, Miss Goddess? You like to dress up and exercise your dominion?
Er...dominion isn't exactly my style. I'm beautiful, so I like to be ravished, you know?
Sure you don't want to cling to that? It is what marks as you as better than the rest of us.
I guess I can understand losing that, even as a princess. It'll let your blonde hair flow free and unencumbered!
Miss Princess dropping her overinflated jewelry? Oh, I forgot---you're blonde, so you're not so bad.
That's it. Lower yourself to the level of us dirty commoners.
Ohhhh, she even learned how to speak like an adult! You're so cute...hey, where'd your hat go?
Heeheehee! You must come from money to speak so refined at such a young age...wait, didn't you have a hat?
Oooh, Miss Remilia, you just ooze class, don't you? Even as you...make your hat...disappear?
Awww, am I really so old already that kids are calling me a hag? Oh, well...wait, what'd you strip? I thought you had a hat.
O-oh, are you putting the guns down? I-I promise I won't touch them...Mejarians use laser rings anyway!
Er, Revy, good choice there. Women are more suited for laser rings, you know? They're elegant.
Hey, uh, now that you're disarmed, try to relax a little, would you? I can let you see a Mejarian laser ring if you want.
Th-the guns? I thought you were going to cling to those things all game...I like our laser rings.
Oh, am I being too forward? My apologies. Just know you'd have your pick of the bunch over there.
Oh, sorry, I got carried away there. But you're still a beautiful, musclebound woman! That's a plus anywhere.
Maybe that was a little forward of me. But Mejarians would love you! I wonder if men feel the same.
Well, just know how in-demand you are on Mejare...if these bumbling Earth men start giving you the cold shoulder.
Dear. Removing your fancy jewelry so readily? Don't you care about that precious title of yours?
Blonde women are always favorites of mine...even better, you're removing that ridiculous crown early. Come have some fun with us commoners.
No sense keeping it on long, right? You're already lowering yourself by playing this, anyway.
Make the gown next to go, Miss Princess. I think you'll find how fun we dirty common folk can be.
Hey, what's with the shocked look on your face? Is it not a thing on Earth for two women to be in love?
Your horrified expression is an insult to my planet's culture, Miss Matoi. Don't they teach girls to love each other on Earth?
Hey, what's with the weird look on your face, Schoolie? Is it not acceptable to love a woman as beautiful as yourself on Planet Earth?
Oh, gosh, is that a faux pas on Earth? Well, I love Barnette no matter what, and you should love other girls, too!
Just a little nervous? Damn...I guess I'm too gorgeous to be scary.
Nervous? I was really trying to scare you---I guess you're already falling in love with me.
I was hoping for a better reaction than that. Maybe you're tougher than you look---or I'm just that lovable!
Just trying to break you in. You look positively miserable---I wanted to scare you into having fun!
...I wasn't serious about the fire thing.
Eeeek! I-I wasn't serious! Fire!
Aack! Fire! I came here to relax, not deal with more ship fires!
Eeeeek! No! Please! M-my dress can't catch fire---it's the only one I have!
...Speaking of which, you've, uh...caught fire.
The Nirvana has to sink to be a ship-girl? Oh, boo. Well, our crew members are beautiful, anyway.
...Yeah, I'm not sure being shot down is worth getting a cute girl out of the Nirvana. We already have plenty aboard.
Hm. Being destroyed doesn't sound like a worthy tradeoff for a little ship-girl. All my crew members are cute, after all---it'd be a net loss.
We have to be sunk to get a ship-girl? Damn...oh, well, at least our crew is beautiful. Maybe we could give Pyoro a female body...
Ah, youthful ignorance. Everyone gets hit eventually---like you are right now.
Am I wrong, or have you been getting hit this entire time? You might have all your clothes on with a shield or two.
I think your current dodging performance is providing some evidence against your strategy. Life's all about taking hits, not dodging them.
Says the girl who's been taking shells head-on more and more. Lots of rookie pilots think they'll never get hit---then they panic when they do.
Oh, Shimakaze...so naive. Meia's obsessed with speed, too, but she knows when to retreat. You're getting hit right now!
Come now, Sola, I don't bite! Tell me all about your fantastical magic school!
Hey now, I flew all this way to Earth, and now I meet a girl in a uniform from a magic school! What's it like there?
Hey, Miss Magic-Hat, you can't just let it slip that you've got crazy powers from a school and leave us hanging.
Can you teach me some magic, Sola? Maybe tell me about your crazy school for it or whatever? Earth is so cool!
...What, is there a requirement? Why are you a ghost, then?
...I'm afraid to ask what happened if you earned the right to be a ghost.
I came to Earth to learn about men, but ghosts are worthwhile, too. So what made you special?
Ooh, there's more to the story than simply dying, is there? Well, do share. Jura Basil Elden isn't afraid of new developments.
Heeheehee! Oh, so you are the embarrassed type! I was just calling you sexy. Relax.
Hey, when a woman compliments your figure, you say "Thanks, you too." Talk about rude.
I call you sexy enough to rock a bodysuit, and you get all flustered and offended. Earth woman are so scared of each other.
What? That was complimentary, silly! That suit is doing all sorts of favors for your hips.
There you go! Take off that helmet and show the world the cute face to match your sexy figure. I wasn't teasing you before.
...So, uh, Ochako. You're floating. ...Are you going to explain that? Because it's incredible!
Wait---are you---omigosh, Ochako, you can float? That's so cool! How are you doing that?
Ooh, Ochako! You can just float like that? I'd have been doing it all game if I could float!
...OK. Ochako. You're...levitating. And that is so cool! What's your secret? Can I learn to float?
You're, uh, a little on display there. Unless that sort of thing excites you.
Oh, please. You're flashing us on purpose, aren't you?
Don't act like that flash was an accident. I know your type...nerdy little Parfet is a freak, too.
Showing off the underwear early? Should've pegged you as the falsely-modest type.

state.text: Aaack! No! Wait! I'm too young to die! Too beautiful!
Eek! Noooo! Wait! I'll give you whatever you want!
Ack! The Harvest! I should've known this was a trap!
Eeeeek! No! Please! I have a girlfriend!

case.state: Yes! Yes! Go for it! Roll that die! Can I have one?
You are so cool, Vriska! Where can I get one of those things?
So it's that die that does it for you? Can I have one? I want to switch my outfit on the fly!
Where'd you get that die? I don't want to have to steal yours, you know!
Atta girl! Now show me something magical! ...Besides this.
These vortices are pretty fantastic, but it's the end result I care about.
You really are something else. I've already grown accustomed to your magic vortices!
All that magic, but all I care about is the outfit waiting for me. I never thought I'd meet someone like you!
...Seriously, do you have any control over this? Even a little? Or is it all luck?
...Talk about living life up to chance, by the way. This is so weird...and I'm a pilot. I've seen weird.
There she goes with another vortex. Life is just a game of luck to our little fashionista here.
Too bad this isn't the spectacle it used to be. But the random chance does keep it interesting!
My, my! What a bad attitude you have, Princess. I was just poking fun!
Figures the obscenely wealthy take offense to the most innocent of banter. Lighten up, Coinstacks.
Oh, come on, I wasn't serious! You're too cute to rob! And absolutely zero fun, just as I would expect from a rich girl.
What a surprise---I open with an affable joke, and Little Miss Moneybags gets all huffy.
Oh, give me a break, Cash-or-Credit. One joke and you come at me with a bad attitude.
And what do we have here? Miserable old Miss Brunette is admitting she's no better than the rest of us?
Hey, Miss Princess. You don't mind if this pirate holds onto that tiara, do you? Just for a little inspection?
Don't stop there, Miss Princess. Nothing satisfies a pirate quite like watching nobles stripped down to nothing at all.
Take away her tiara and she's a brunette in a dress. Take away her dress...and I hope her butt is cute.
Are you really some sort of goddess? Like, with magic? Show me some, it'll be so cool!
If you're really as magical as you say, then let me see some! Otherwise you're just a stuck-up Earth girl!
I think I'm a tad more beautiful, so you better wow us all with a display of that magic of yours.
So are you going to show us some magic or not? I heard you were capable of that, and I like calling bluffs.
Oh, look, now Catria's removing a weapon. I guess we know which gorgeous blonde woman she has to thank for that.
As usual, women follow the trails I've blazed for them---in this case, Miss Pegasus counting her weapon as a layer.
Counting your sword, are we? Is that a trick your sisters taught you, or are you simply following my lead?
Hm? Seems I've set a precedent for stripping blades...I set a precedent for beauty, so it only makes sense.
You got that idea from me, you little cheat! Once again the crafty Mejarian paves the way for the rest of womankind.
My, my, Lyn. Bending the rules by removing a weapon? The audacity.
You're just copying what I came up with before...but you've got Barnette's cute green hair, so I'll let it slide.
I'd teach you a thing or two with my rapier for copying me like this, but, well, I threw it away.
Wait, your headpiece? I...OK, then.
Uh...OK. I---I didn't think...you'd take that off.
O-oh wow, your headpiece. I mean, they'll think it's nothing, but...
...Meia, are you---f-feeling alright? Did you hit your head last battle? Meia Gisborn doesn't take her headpiece off!
Y-your headpiece? You're not serious?
Your headpiece? Are you...feeling alright, Meia?
O-oh, wow. That's...unexpected. OK.
So what's fir---uh, really? Uh...uh...
So now that you're finally playing along, what'll it---be...uh...
Y-your headpiece? I mean, first? At all?
Oh...well, that's a...downer. Worried about awkward questions?
...I'm sorry I said anything. You're really in it to win it...and to avoid weird questions, I guess.
...You don't have to take this game so seriously, Meia. Or are you worried people would ask questions if you saved it for later?
Now I really feel bad about all those trinkets. Didn't think you'd take any off...I guess you'd rather avoid pressing questions.
...OK. That's a fair trade. Yeah.
I---I wasn't serious, Meia.
M-Meia? You know that's your headpiece, right? You're gonna...really?
Uh...you, uh...didn't have to match my embarrassment.
...I was kidding about being embarrassed. You don't have to do that...
...Who are you, and what have you done with Meia?
...Uh...we're supposed to be having fun, Meia. Not dredging up painful memories.
I...I...why? You don't have to, Meia...
...Hey, listen, I know I'm naked, but I'm not saying you should have to take that off.
...I was just teasing. That's way more than my whole outfit...even if they don't know it.
Um...are you trying to shock me out of masturbating?
...Uh...I can't masturbate to that. And not for the reason these Earth people are thinking.
...Well, this is awkward. Are you OK, Meia?
I may have lost, but...now I feel bad for you.
Well, that stunts my libido. Why are you doing this to yourself?
...OK. I agree. You don't want to have fun.
...Point taken. No fun for you. Got it.
...OK, now you're just actively trying to make this awful for yourself.
W-wha---but...why? You should be having fun, not torturing yourself!
...You'd still look sexy with that on. It's not what I meant by stripping...or fun.
You...do? That was a joke! What are you, some kind of cult of gun-worshippers? I know Barnette loves that CZ 75 of hers...
I...I wasn't serious. I better keep Barnette away from you before she joins your little cult and calls herself CZ 75.
...What? Oh, and I'm made of porcelain, myself. You mean to tell me you're some kind of living statue?
M-marble? Hey, I'm not from this planet---don't try to tell me some tall tale! I suppose you're a statue who walked right off her pedestal?
...What? You seem like the type to stay in your palace and hold tea parties. What are you doing hanging out with pirates?
Younger than me? What is she, a little kid? And just what kind of princess are you, running around with little kid pirates?
Ugh, forget I said anything. Just keep your twenty fingers to yourself.
Well, whatever your problem is, keep it away from me, and yourself along with it. That includes your extra limbs!
Oh, forget it. How can the beautiful symmetry of the female body break down with a few extra arms? Maybe it's how you look like a spider.
Ew. You're not much better on the inside. Maybe your brain has extra limbs, too.
Hahahaha! Well, I've never played a stripping game, either, but I'm quite enjoying my first. Now, what do you have to nervous about?
Well, then, you should want to make this Crimson Demon Clan proud. What's got you so nervous? I'm no stripping veteran myself, you know.
Suit yourself. Me, I don't even feel like fighting unless my hair's set just right...and moisturized, and brushed...
How can you even focus on fighting if your hair's a mess? I need a trip to the spa after each battle to set everything straight again.
Well, don't get too excited. Unless you study machines, too, she'd probably make your head spin.
Good luck with that. She's not easy to keep up with, unless machines are your second love after animal training.
Hahahaha! Come now, Pyrrha, you don't need to deny anything! We're all dirty for coming here.
Oh, come on, none of us is any more modest than anyone else. We all signed up to strip...and maybe a little more.
Whatever you say, Scarlet. Really, though, you're not fooling anyone...didn't we all come here because we're naughty?
This is going to be a long evening if you play dumb the whole time. I can admit I just like people ogling me---so can you, cutie.
That's it, huh? Earth women are awfully boring.
Just that? Why, you won't see me taking off something that small. No way.
I didn't expect any different. Was sure hoping for it, though.
Just what I expected, nothing like I hoped for. Try not to let us down tonight.
Don't be like that, ~name~! I just met you---excite me!
Kinda cute. Where can I get something like your ~clothing~?
That's it, huh? Well, I have no right to complain about it.
Way to get into the spirit of things, ~name~. I'd never take off something so frivolous.
Have you been giving lessons on fun to this girl, Meia? Jeez.
I'm slacking on Dread maintenance by being here, you know. ...Hey, Boss, forget I said that.
Seriously? Why do Earth girls wear so much?
Take a fashion tip from a Mejarian. Less is more.
...Hey, Barnette, tell me about your guns. It'd be more interesting...
...I don't like losing. Maybe not as much as you, Meia, but just in general...
That's it, huh? Earth women are awfully boring.
Just that? Why, you won't see me taking off something that small. No way.
Boring and perfectly sensible. You'd be good friends with Meia---you know, if Meia wanted any friends.
I didn't expect any different. Was sure hoping for it, though.
Don't be like that, ~name~! I just met you---excite me!
Fine, fine. Let's get this one over with.
I see you're taking my approach to stripping.
Bold choice. I can see why you'd come to a place like this.
What a brutal blow to your modesty. Women all over Earth shroud themselves in shame!
Kind of cute. Where can I get something like your ~clothing~?
That's it, huh? Well, I have no right to complain about it.
Way to get into the spirit of things, ~name~. I'd never take off something so frivolous.
Jeez, did you take fun lessons from Meia or what?
Hey, I'm slacking on Dread maintenance by being here, you know.
Earth women are so boring.
Hey, at least I'm making a show of it.
Still miffed about those armbands?
Oh, come on, don't be so vindictive about all my accessories.
Good thing I'd never remove something so inconsequential. I've already revealed my gorgeous bare arms!
Hey, I have a body worth teasing for a while. Yours is just passable.
Is this what I've been doing the whole time? It is annoying.
Just an accessory? Why, I'd never take off something that small! The audacity!
I hope that meant a lot to you, because it didn't really bring the outfit together.
Oh, hurry up already! You're such a bore.
This is really making me feel guilty about all the accessories I took off first.
Really? Is this because of what I did?
...I know I was like this, but come on, be the bigger woman here.
Looks like I've got to do the stripping for everyone around here.
Oh, come on already! Look at how I am!
Hey, I'm already naked. You're not topping that reveal.
Maybe I should remind you that I'm a pirate, and operate outside the law. Give me a reason to still follow it.
Earth women's accessories are not worth this frustration.
...You suck, ~name~.
Give me a break here! Is this because of how I taunted you before?
Look, I'm sorry about the teasing, alright? You beat me already!
This is giving me a headache...good thing finishing up should cure that.
Seriously? Why do Earth girls wear so much?
Take a fashion tip from a Mejarian. Less is more.
...Hey, Barnette, tell me about your guns. It'd be more interesting...
...I don't like losing. Maybe not as much as some people, but just in general...
...Is this because I counted my sword?
Perhaps you should wrap that up and gift it to us.
~blank~
Ouch. I hope you don't think I'm as snotty as Miss Goddess here, Leader.
And you say we have a tense relationship. I would never talk to my dear leader like that!
...See how ratty girls can get with each other, Meia? We're friends deep down! You're my steadfast boss!
Eep. I hope you don't think I talk like this behind your back, Meia. I care what you think!
Hey, I show a little genuine concern, and I get swatted away! How do we know Sweater-vest here doesn't have a sadistic side?
Well, excuse me for actually being worried about you. For all we know, Haru's some kind of weird sadist who gets off on women's pain.
You're being awfully trusting of strangers' intentions over your own second-in-command's! This girl could turn out to be crazy, you know!
Hmph! I just wanted to make sure you're alright. Instead you'd rather reassure the sweatered schoolgirl---who may or may not have something to hide.
Talk about a terrestial booze-a-thon. Oh, well, I've got the height to drink with the best of them!
I get that this place is a bar, but damn, ladies, at least pretend you're trying to win.
You two aren't disguising how you're planning to take some of us home afterward.
I do love drinking, but I don't think I could keep up with you two. I guess living around men forces you to drown your sorrows.
Hm? Oh, we're fighter pilots! I'm actually second-in-command---Meia here is our leader.
As if I'm just some brainless flirt! I happen to be second-ranked on our Dread pilot team...behind Meia, of course.
I'm so glad you asked---Barnette and I are expert Dread fighter pilots! Only Meia here is ranked higher.
Hey, Barnette and I are two of our highest-ranked fighter pilots! ...Meia here being the leader, of course, but she's a workaholic.
...You don't think you can have that kind of relationship? Hey, they're whatever you want them to be. The point isn't to change yourself.
I'm telling you, you could be someone's girl! And that someone should let you do your own thing, the same as always!
N-nooo, what are you doing? ~player~, I wanted you to get some shots of me later!
W-what? Heeey, don't throw that away! Mohhhn...Jura thought you were really excited to film her...
N-nooo, what are you doing? ~player~, I wanted you to get some shots of me later!
W-what? Heeey, don't throw that away! Mohhhn...Jura thought you were really excited to take her picture...

O-OK. Don't feel like you have to.
...I think you trust this planet more than I do.
...Sheesh, you're committed to the mission, alright.
Hahahaha! It's a work-in-progress. You still got annoyed with your birthday party like always.
Hmph! Since I'm getting more responsible, it's only fair you be more social. On your next birthday, try acting a little appreciative for once.
H-hey, we know firsthand what passes for "darkness" according to Earthlings. Not to mention your "outside forces." Is Mejare part of those?
O-"outside forces"? Oh, no, I think we know exactly what you're talking about. Why don't you just leave our homeworld alone?
Can we make it a group session? These headaches are awful sometimes...ugh, and the nightmares!
You are not leaving Jura out. I think I get them worse than you do, Meia...the dreams.
Ugh, can you believe this little imp? We ought to hop in our Dreads and show her what Mejare is capable of.

state.text: Hey, can't you see Meia's sensitive about that thing? I can show you how real our planet is, Miss Biker-girl!

case.state: Hmph! For a girl with a gas bike, she sure likes to play with fire. How about I rattle her bones overhead if she thinks Mejare is a joke?
Are you listening to this little punk, Meia? She thinks we're just playing dress-up. I wonder what she'd think of Vandread firepower.
It's true. Barnette made the most delicious yule log for Christmas---covered in icing and powdered sugar. I helped organize the celebration, of course.
I admit, I've never seen you touch the sweets. Even the cake Barnette baked for your birthday---everyone else had a piece!
...Hello?
Wha---what am I, in rags?
Heeey, you're perfectly cute! You're just too shy. I've never worked a job like that, but everyone knows you've got to make them like you!
Don't say those kinds of things about yourself! Your problem isn't looks, it's confidence. The popular girls probably chat them up.
Don't ask questions you don't want the answer to, Meia.
This is why I mostly stick to asking about men and fashion. See what happens?
See, Meia? Don't encourage people to discuss things you don't care about.
Oh, this ought to be a treat. Have fun, Leader!

state.text: H-hey, shut your mouth, freak! Meia's Oma gave it to her!
Hey, don't you dare talk to her like that! That's a gift from her Oma, which you might realize if you had feelings!
Hey, that was a gift from her parents! You know what a parent is, Gearbox?
Watch it, Needle-arm! That's a gift from Meia's parents, and I'll slice that syringe off before you talk to her like that!

case.state: U-uh...sorry. Should I not have said anything?
You little runt! I---ugh. Sorry for losing my temper...
...That's not true, is it? I-I was just defending you!
Stupid little twerp, talking to you that way...sorry, I'm making a fool of us, aren't I?
H-hey, don't worry about trying to explain Mejare to him! Are you feeling OK?
You don't have to be a tour guide right now, especially to some man! You're OK, right? Not feeling weird?
I...I've never seen you take it off in public like that. And now you're fine explaining Omas to a man?
W-what's gotten into you? Taking off your headpiece so quickly? Talking to men about Mejare? Or to men at all?
She's even taking an interest in your headpiece! It's very dear to her, Sei---be polite.
Aww, Sei likes our tech, Leader! Listen, complimenting Meia's headpiece will really tug at her heartstrings.
If you want to get on Meia's good side in a hurry, Sei, that headpiece was a gift from her Oma. Compliment how it looks.
Word of advice, Sei---Meia loves that headpiece. Tell her you like it, and the ice'll melt a little.
Oh, please. All this titillating nudity is enough excitement for one evening.
As if I need to drink to have fun when there's full-blown Earth nudity in our midst! I resent your implication.
Hey, Miss Misato can drink alone. I only drink when I know my darling Barnette is there to take care of me.
Hey now, I'm tall! I can handle at least...uh...a few beers, give or take.
Oh. Now you've done it, Rinkah...Meia loves women with muscles.
Just try to ride this out. Meia acts icy, but those muscles melt her right down like nobody's business.
Don't believe her cover stories, Rinkah. Meia doesn't want your muscles...she wants you.
Heehee! Meia tends to get like this around particularly fit women, if you follow. Don't mind her desperate advances.
Oh, a medic? Now we should get her aboard just to have a woman operating on us.
Hear that, Meia? Get in this girl's pants and we could get a woman doctor on the ship.
Our only doctor's a man. Even if you don't want to get all cuddly with Meia, could you maybe join us anyway?
A medic, hm? OK, Meia, forget the girlfriend situation---now you need her so we have a woman doctor on board. Think of the ship!
...Is this a cultural thing? Don't let people boss you around!
Why not? You're pretty cute. Or did a bunch of people tell you it's not your place growing up?
The stage waits for no one! Come on, I want to see your unique take on it.
Right now! Oh, but don't just copy Jura...be original!
In private, huh? I wouldn't mind capturing one---to use as my private little plaything.
Well, who wants to be exposed all the time, anyway? In private is where you can experiment all you want...maybe on a live capture.
I was kind of hoping for some! They already walked in on me in the hot spring. Everyone else got embarrassed.
Ahhn, but that's exciting! Knowing I cast the same spell on men that I do on women. Besides, the prisoners already got a peep at us all while we were bathing.
You can't? Jura is very selfish...but that's the Jura that Barnette loves to dote on!
If they don't love you when you're you, all that "doting" is more like "controlling."
What about that mesh of yours? I'm disappointed it didn't go all the way down! Now that's a look I'd love to try...
You know, I'm really taken by that top. Imagine a full-body mesh my size...I'd never be left alone again!
Oh, you're back. Try not to make a habit of that...it's not very intimidating.
...Well, at least you came back. Seriously, did a man kill your family or something?
Listen, you ought to come my my home planet sometime. It's nothing but women...and we make a habit of shooting nasty men.
You have nothing to be scared of. I've fought the toughest, burliest men around and come out on top!
...That's it? I come from a planet of all women! There's no special word for two girls dating.
...I'm from planet Mejare, Revy. There's no men to date---so there's no word for two women dating.
Earth has an insult for women in love? My home planet is nothing but women---that's all love is to me.
What, it means two girls dating? How can you even insult that? There aren't even any men on planet Mejare to date!
Why can't you just accept a compliment? I mean it! You even remind me of Barnette a little with those guns...
Tch! Sounds like you're convinced you're ugly, not me. Barnette loves guns, too...she's just sweeter.
...I know I tease about Mejarians being more beautiful, but self-deprecation isn't healthy. The way you love guns actually reminds me of Barnette...
God, who hurt you? I call you cute, and you respond by insulting me! I miss Barnette...she loves guns like you do.
Hm? Oh, we're fighter pilots! I'm actually second-in-command---and Barnette's third.
As if I'm just some brainless flirt! I happen to be second-ranked on our Dread pilot team. And Barnette's a sub-leader!
I'm so glad you asked---Barnette and I are expert Dread fighter pilots! I'm second-ranked, in fact.
Hey, Barnette and I are two of our highest-ranked fighter pilots! We're downright indispensable on the Nirvana.
Uh...ew. That's kind of ratty, actually. But you've got more, right?
...Now you kind of smell salty. Don't you have something else? Something nicer?
...I have no clue what that is. Kind of looks like men's clothing...all tattered and gross.
...That's certainly a lot of extra stuff. But somehow it just ends up looking like rags, whatever it is.
Ohhh, that's cute! Now you're all dressed up like a maid---which Mejare frowns upon, but not as much as it does pirates.
Maid outfits are so adorable! I'd dress up my girlfriend in one...if I could afford one.
Ohh, I wish I had something as cute as that! Barnette and I could do a little roleplay, you know, pretend we have money.
Life's tough for a Mejarian pirate...but the alternative is to be a maid for some rich old hag. No thanks!
Oh, I see! These must be Earth women's street clothes, right? You're so considerate!
Starting off simple, huh? Just basic Earth street clothes on display? I get it.
Jacket and jeans? Seen it---but I guess street clothes on Earth don't have to be all that different.
Earth's street clothes sticking to the familiars, eh? Mejarians tend to aim a little tighter.
Ooh, a sexy red-and-black! I like your style, Vriska---and it clashes with your skin!
Nothing like blood-red and shadow-black to get the heart beating. Plus, those bullets get it going even faster!
Talk about making my heart jump. Red, black, and bullets on the side!
I wish I owned something red...and this dress is the closest thing to black. A pirate's problems!
You're getting sexier all the time, cutie! I like leaving my shoulders bare, too...
Now you're speaking my language! A woman's shoulders should be as free as space is vast.
As long as the universe is expanding, a woman's shoulders should be unmasked to see it happen.
Exactly what I would go for, with those uncovered shoulders. I feel like you already know me so well, Vriska!
Oh, I see! These must be Earth women's street clothes, right? You're so considerate!
Going for something simple, huh? Just basic Earth street clothes on display? I get it.
Jacket and jeans? Seen it---but I guess street clothes on Earth don't have to be all that different.
Earth's street clothes sticking to the familiars, eh? Mejarians tend to aim a little tighter.
Oho! I knew you weren't so above it all! And what a shift---bodysuits are pretty sexy.
Heeheehee! I think the die was getting annoyed at you hiding your figure! Go on, show off your hips!
Going to do a little dance, Vriska? Show off that figure a little? Because that adorable polka-dotted suit is giving you a head start.
That's positively adorable, Vriska! Polka-dots and a revealing shape. Now it's Mejarian fashion!
Bare midriff? My dress brings me pretty close to that...but Dita's the girl who wears it best!
Ooh, my crewmate Dita dresses like that! She's such a naive little thing, even with her midriff exposed all sexy-like.
I know a sweet young girl who dresses like that! Dita's her name---she's so naive. Barely even notices her exposed belly.
Yeah, Dita shows off her belly too. I can't tell if she's just too naive to know how sexy she's being or just doesn't care.
Hah! Going for my look, are you? Yeah, cleavage tends to get people to do what you want.
Feeling a little breezy? Don't worry, you'll get used to it---I did.
Pfft! How do you like my style, then? I'm flattered you had this on the backburner.
Doesn't the breeze feel good between your breasts? It always perks me up when I'm down.
Would you stop making assumptions about me? I don't have any money---I'm a pirate, for God's sake!
Who're you calling rich? I'm in a pirate band---this dress is the only good one I have!
Pampered? Spoiled? I stole my dress---I pirate for a living! I've hardly seen a credit since I was a girl!
Barnette and I are pirates, you whore! Everything we have, we share with the ship! I'm not rich!
Swords? Regenerating? That isn't flashy to you? What a spoiled little girl---where's my magic?
Hmph. I can't believe that doesn't sound flashy to Miss Magic here---my Vandread is fantastic, but I acknowledge that.
Ugh, now you're threatening me over it? Summoning swords and healing yourself sounds pretty flashy to me.
Not flashy? Honey, I've shielded whole planets with my Vandread, and that still sounds impressive. C'mon!
...I see. Goddesses must come in all shapes and sizes---such as mine. What does the great and powerful Neptune preside over?
I'm something of a goddess myself, but even I admit I'll age one day. What might you be the goddess of, exactly?
"Nation"? Only the most backwater planets are still split up into countries. But if you still have "goddesses," then I guess that makes sense.
...Oh. I shouldn't be surprised a little squirt is hailed as "goddess" on your planet if it's still primitive enough to have different nations.
I'll stop playing fancy-girl when you stop playing crazed murderer. And when you manage to leave that thing in its sheathe for five minutes.
Oh, of course, I'm so fancy and entitled for wanting you to keep your sword sheathed and your murder-fantasies to yourself. Just stay over there!
And you appear to be the prime example of that. Well, I'll defend myself if need be!
You almost seem to be rooting for Earthlings to turn into violent murderers. I guess you'll have more friends that way!
Oh, believe me, suddenly the Earthlings of this time seem much more capable of creepy, horrible violence.
I can't trust a word that comes out of your mouth. Enlighten me---why are you so sure you're alone?
As if I'm asking the right person. And what is it that makes you so special, exactly?
That's why you've got to create opportunities for yourself! When I want something, I take it. A girlfriend, a top rank, a dress off an officer's back...
Well, no wonder you're alone if you keep waiting for some perfect moment. You've got to march right up to love and take it. That's how I approach everything in life...
Well, it made a pirate out of me, so the system's wrong somewhere. I mean, really. I should be on a magazine cover, not a wanted list.
That's some eloquent rebellion. Me, well, I made my feelings known more forcefully. It's what they get for rendering my beauty homeless.
Well, I'm not a bodybuilder! Let's see what you've got underneath that poofy dress!
What would you know about staying in shape? You're hiding whatever flabby sticks you've got under two layers of ruffles!
Well, no, I'm not trying to turn my legs to stone! But at least I'm proud enough to wear a dress that shows them off!
I don't suppose you chose green for the same reason? It's like a pair of planets orbiting each other...
...Is green a slimming color? For your sake, I hope not.
Sheesh. I'm sure the right half of your butt would fill it out quite nicely.
Which half? If this dress didn't have a slit, you couldn't wear it as a bath towel.
Well, I certainly got a good look at it. It's got an enormous presence, like it took up my full view.
The elven form looks like it could crush me from way over here. I must be getting weak in the knees around true beauty.
I---eugh. Well, I could certainly admire it---in the same way you can admire a planet.
...You know, my Vandread can shield an entire planet. I guess sometimes size alone is worthy of admiration.
You want to talk rude, how about sticking your butt in our faces? I could barely breathe with that thing staring at me!
Ugliness is rude when you come to a place meant for the beautiful. You even just tried to stick your massive backside into my space!
I think a fast food joint is a better place to satisfy your base desires, Tubby. Hunger is clearly higher than your sex drive!
I'm a model, period. Well, I should be, anyway. You should be in line at a fry stand if you're so concerned about your base desires.
Very funny. You'd better hope there's a doctor in this place at the rate you're going.
I would love if you left the table every so often, even if it's to retrieve more food. Just don't wheeze in my direction when your heart fails.
That I can believe. It looks there's another me's worth of body weight hanging off your waist.
...Well, judging from the view I just got of your backside, my entire body weight is probably rolled up in one of the cheeks.
I'll think of myself, thank you---forever thin and beautiful. She can join me if she's so concerned about my attention.
...No. No, I don't think it will. I have the results of overindulging burned into my eyes now---a pair of big, glowing green suns.
In my very short time knowing you, I can safely say you are never satisfied.
Oh, sure. Taking cues from you, I'll slobber all over her face. Maybe even throw in a few burps while I'm at it!
...Well, Barnette's more a gun nut than a fashionista. She'd probably just get jealous if I started fawning over you.
Maybe we could just stuff you into one of our flightsuits. If I spent too much time looking you over, Barnette would start pointing guns your way!
...Well, maybe not. Barnette is too jealous to trust me around you. You'd certainly fit in on our crew, even if you wouldn't fit into a lot of our uniforms.
We couldn't stand each other! She was this uppity little reg clerk questioning my loadouts. Then she got promoted to pilot and broke our formation...!
She helped cause the crash. She was riding my tail, and before that, she was this backtalking newbie...I guess she still rides my tail! Ahahaha!
W-what? That's---are you even human? No wonder they need so many organs from us!
T-twice? Hey, are we the same species? I guess you would need whole planets full of organ farms if you're four meters tall!
That's not the rack I usually hear about. It's not some complex, I just---like being the tallest in the room. Don't you enjoy that feeling?
I'm not gonna---break my spine over it or something! I'm just used to being the biggest and brightest light in a crowd. You can relate, can't you?
That's what my work is! Either watch the enemy, or your team, or usually both. You can handle a few servants.
Don't you know what a pilot does? Juggle at least a dozen things demanding your attention! Jeez...
...What other stuff? Don't be so vaaague! Hey, are you listening to me?
Are you gonna tell me what that is? Don't make me play guessing games! And pay attention when I'm talking!

Black?
...Now I want to see that. It's a fluffy little ball on your head either way.
Maybe you look creepy because you're keeping secrets. Do you have any photos of Cheryl Naturale?
You need to meet some nicer people. I guess a crew is like family, though...we don't have anyone else.
Hmmm...maybe it's a crewmate thing. We were definitely a lot meaner back in school, before...all the accidents.
Strength of heart makes about as much sense as whatever's powering our Vandreads. I wonder if I could do it...
Oh? I have the strength of heart to pilot a powerful fused mech---and even make it fuse in the first place. Now I want to try Keyblades.
So they can kill you whenever they feel like. Who's the one being trained, exactly?
So they're vicious monsters that you try to keep happy? Some training. No wonder we left them on Earth.
Men are the enemy. They always have been. If you've got an advantage, I don't think you should grumble about it.
What kind of attitude is that? Any pirate should know---when the enemy gives you an opening, you don't complain about it.
Meat sounds pretty useful to me. Is that a moral issue or something? I guess you've got that luxury here...
Is there a better use than to eat? Milk's good and all, but...oh, do you have a problem with killing them? We can't be so picky with food.
Life on our ship is a lot of chores and flight practice. You have to find ways to make it fun.
Then you should make it fun somehow. That's what the elegant do---take a boring routine and make it beautiful to behold.
So what's caught your eye in the meantime? This planet is pretty beautiful, with its shimmering blue swirls. I didn't want to land and lose sight of it!
We should all look gorgeous even with clothes on...but I understand. What about the planet itself? Flying in here, it's such a brilliant blue.
Well, if you're me, then you should know it's not hard to assume the worst from this place! Let's not kill each other over it!

Fine, I believe you!
...And if we're the same, then you believe me. And you'd like to avoid a fight just as much.
Ugh, am I this much of a pain with everyone? I think I get it now...
Stop arguing---you're giving me a headache. Is this what the rest of the crew puts up with?
...Yeah. There's really no comfort for that kind of thing.
...And the worst part is, it's out of our hands. Jura Basil Elden has to sit and watch...
Maybe we should stay here a little longer and see if Earth men are less resistant.
It's got to just be a Tarak thing, right? Not all Mejare came around as quickly as us. We should investigate around here.
O-oh, our treatment's pretty good. I'm just saying, make sure you give them some bedside manner! Don't just magic them back up like nothing happened.
I was back soon enough. No scars or anything. B-but my point is, don't treat them like just another spell to cast!
{barnette}Ugh! A-are you sure? I think my family's related to Beretta!
{barnette}You don't want anything for them? I have my family's whole stock! And Beretta is---I-I think they used to do business together!
Sooo? Are you feeling sexier already? Maybe there's a heat building up inside you?
Taboo...I can't even imagine. Well, now that you can work your body, you'd better do it! Don't you feel compelled?
Yeah, the joy is written all over your face.
Of, of course. The delight is practically radiating from you.
Ugh, who would do that to you? A girl's beauty is her life! And her youth is her most beautiful!
Gone right? Who was jealous enough to cut down on the prime of your life? No power is worth a girl's looks!
Ahhn, Jura likes hers with lots of strawberries and cream...what about you? Vanilla? Blueberry? Barnette makes this soft one with grapes and olive oil...
Jura can't decide her favorite between Angel's and Devil's Food...ohhn,and red velvet! Mmm...I picture you eating grape cake for some reason.
Just fly the Dread, while you're at it, on the enemy's flank. Shoot them and don't get shot...
...And in a cockpit, fly in the appropriate formation. Position so that you can fire while the enemy cannot...
Uhh...are you a bad tipper or something?
Do you...know why that might be?
Why don't you look straight down and ask the same question?
That's would you should be asking the mirror, in all directions.
"Nuh-uh!" Eugh. Who do you think you're winning over like this?
Jealousy just makes you look even smaller, you know.

Oh, are you one of those evasive types?
...Well, we already knew that. When you're big, see, you can just take hits.
"Open" means you're going take damage. But Jura's Dread is big, and her shields are strong. That's more security than dodging forever.

It means you should be grateful to even get to go to school, lead a club, live in your own country!
...Mmghn.
You know what I mean! Just count your blessings, got it? That includes things like finishing high school...and having a home.
...I see. But most men still tower over me, anyway! Don't tell me height is a problem now...

Men are bigger than me!
...Most of them. What, do they all love how you have to take off to kiss them?
Hmph. I didn't know animal people were some protected race. But if someone's going to take you for granted, it'll be the humans who live with you.
Oh, the Mejare are a very peaceful race. I'd say you "animal girls" have more to worry about from your fellow Earthlings.
I help plan our Christmas parties, too. You know, you can just hire people to manage all those things, and you can be the pretty face on the sign.
Hmm...that kind of micromanaging doesn't suit me. Everyone already knows their own thing better than you do. You just need to pose for the poster!
...Are we going to see yours flood out when you deem it appropriate?
You seem pretty stoic to me. Are you saving them for later?
Well, he is very handsome. Tall and dark and brooding. He'll be looking you all over, sternly asking questions...
Wow, and this is before I told you how pretty he is. You'll just love his undivided attention, even if he doesn't talk much.
I mean, I've never been! All the dirt, and heat, and---animals...it's a little intimidating.

You say that like it's no big deal!
...OK, I guess it isn't around here. Still, there's, like---animals running around.
...Do you---maul them, or something?
...Should they be? Your claws do look pretty sharp...
Aaaack! Ew! Ew! Ew, ew, ew, ew, ew, ew!
Eeeew! Was this supposed to excite us? You're all scaly and slimy and eeeewww!
Wha---ew! W-what is this? Now you're not cute at all! Go back to the old look!
Eeeek! OK, you're the Monster Lord, I get it! Now go back to being fleshy!
Me-ow! Heeheehee---wait, you're serious? Like, the animal, a cat?
...Earth girls can have cat ears? Like, the cats I see in zoos? How?
...You, uh, going to explain this to me? I'm still shaky on what a cat is, much less a "Faunus."
...Listen, I'm not from Earth. You can't expect me to understand why you have cat ears...or why you've been hiding them.
Eek---o-oh, you won. Who was that, your feisty ex-girlfriend? You need better taste in girls.
Ah! Y-you---oh, she's down. If this is some bizarre ex-girlfriend revenge, you've got to date an accountant or something.
...I guess that's the peril of dating your fellow muscle-girls. They try to beat your face in after a breakup.
Was that some gym girl you broke up with, Cammy? ...I better hope Barnette and I stay together, or she might shoot me.
Seeing you pummel girls like this really makes me think I ought to practice my sword skills...or bring a laser ring next time.
I really need to get better with my rapier---you're doing a better job taking these girls out with your fists. Of course, you could just use a laser ring.
Why even let them get close to your pretty face? I could train with my sword and repel them better...or just use a laser ring.
Want to borrow my rapier for the next time they show up? I could stand to get better with it...actually, if I were you, I'd use a trusty laser ring.
A laser ring would be quicker, you know---and they wouldn't get up again. Still, I should get better with my rapier, since you're so good unarmed...
What do you mean, not fun? The fun is starting off with some teasing and then revealing your beautiful body!
Hmph. It would seem I'm the only proper seductress around here, properly building up to nudity like a lady.
There's a right way and a wrong way to strip, and you're starting to fall into the wrong way. It needs to escalate!
Well. I'd never make it as a model if I deflated the excitement like you do.
What do you mean? Oh, right, you Earth girls date men...really, no love for each other?
Hm? Oh, yes, dating men is the norm on Earth. Don't you ever flirt with girls?
Oh, of course, Earth girls only love men. I think you're missing out---have you really never saw a woman you fell in love with?
Oh, don't start going on about men. Sure, they're beastly, but even an Earth girl has to appreciate shapely curves, no?
...W-what? "Poppy"? "...Mom"?
...I'm so confused. Mom? Papa? Are these Earth words or just a clown thing?
The...guy who did my...what? What's a mom? Stop confusing me!
What? Is this another gag? What's a mom? Or a papa?
I've got my eye on you, Miss Pixie...because my ears are totally confused when you talk.
Little Miss Pixie must think she's clever, saying all these things that go over my poor foreigner head.
Have some sympathy for this poor alien woman, Kyu. You're always saying things only an Earth woman would understand.
Feel free to start making sense for everyone, Miss Pixie. Think of the poor aliens in your presence when you speak.
Seriously, what just happened? You can't just shapeshift like that and act like nothing happened!
Are you even a woman? Or an Earthling? Are you some kind of alien shapeshifter?
I'm so confused. Are you a shapeshifting alien? Is this what Earth women are capable of?
I had no idea Earth genetics were so...advanced. Just changing your hair color on a whim.
Ooh, what's that thing? A men's gun fused with a woman's? Not as unlikely as you might think.
Is that a men's gun that shoots lasers? Listen...combining male and female weapons is par for the course on the Nirvana.
Ohoho. So your sword is divine, is it? I guess that blows my silly little fashion item out of the water.
If that thing's really so divine, maybe you should keep it on. Who knows what could happen here?
Seems a little silly bringing a divine sword to this seedy little dump. Does it know its owner is dirtying herself?
Divine, hm? I like your style...sword, green hair, and the favor of the gods. If it's true.
Oh, you flatter me! But this is the only good dress I have. I'm a Mejarian pirate, so I have to steal these things!
"French"? We on Mejare only speak the common language. And you're too kind about this stolen dress of mine.
Oh, there's no need for flattery, Marinette! This dress is the only fancy one I've managed to pirate on Mejare.
Oh, no, I'm from Mejare! We only speak the common language there. But thanks for complimenting my stolen dress.
I---I'm sorry. You didn't have to do that.
I hardly ever see you without that thing...this is weird.
You, uh, want my sword? You shouldn't have had to count that...
You OK, Meia? I don't want to antagonize you over that...
Knowing what I do about Earth, you do have plenty of reasons to drink. So get to it, Miss Military.
Isn't Earth devastated where you come from? Same here...bottoms up, drink it all away.
The world's a terrifying place...especially where you come from, I hear. So don't feel bad about your little booze habit.
What's all the beer for? Depressed about losing your boots, or about this "Second Impact" I keep hearing of?
...Er, did I miss something? It just vanished...you know what, you kind of skeeve me out in general.
...Wait, where'd your blazer go? H-hey, don't mess with me! I already get a weird feeling in my stomach when I look at you.
...OK, I was ignoring the sinking feeling your eyes give me, but your blazer just vanished. What's your deal, huh?
Eep! W-what was that just now? I have a pilot's eyes, and you made that disappear! Actually, you've been giving me butterflies this whole time!
Not to be rude, but, uh...you've totally got a screw loose.
...Is this what I sound like? I just think flirting is fun...this girl's nuts.
...Maybe I should stop flirting so much. If this girl is the end result, that is.
...Does sex with men do this to you? Because this girl's really starting to freak me out.
Am I getting through to you? Jura to Ocean Girl! Hello?
Hey, Ocean Girl! I'm talking to you!
What's your name, floozy? Moon? Yeah, you're a lunatic, alright! Say something to me!
Hel-looo? Am I breaking up? Have we achieved first contact? God...
For how excited you are to strip...I'm not sure I want to see what lies underneath.
As if we want to see your nasty little twig body. You keep going on about how you're just a public plaything!
Oh, good, you're almost out. Maybe then you can lose and leave and stop freaking me out.
Whatever ocean you're swimming in, I bet the fish are all dead.
Ooh, Ping! You're so forward---I have a girlfriend, you know. And she's taller than you.
Oh, you horrible man, trying to steal me away from my girlfriend! My girlfriend...who's taller than you. A man. How sad.
I'm right here. If you're man enough to come and steal me away from Barnette, well...you don't have the physicality for that.
Well, I doooo have a girlfriend...but if you can prove you're better than her, Ping, I might consider. You're starting off smaller, though.
Aren't men usually bigger than women? My little girlfriend's got more of a presence than you do, Mr. Soldier...so do try harder to win me over.
Hey, you little shrimp, I have a pilot's sharpness! You pulled some kind of trick on me!
Ugh! What a horrid little gremlin. I thought she was cute, and she just keeps calling me old...as she plays tricks with her hat.
...I don't know what kind of prank you're pulling, Miss-Six-Century, but it's not funny. And stop calling me old!
Honestly! Every little Earth kid I meet is a punk. How are they raising you, playing tricks on adults like that?
You're quite the fit little specimen, Rinkah. I know a certain squadron leader who'd fall head-over-heels for you...
I know a woman who loves muscles very much, Rinkah...you'd put her in a tizzy. Do Earth women like each other in that way?
Mind if I play a little matchmaker? I brought my boss here...and she loves muscles on a woman, even if she won't admit it.
