Hey, Miss Liquor, your little pick-up lines are off the mark. Meia wears this thing to show off her butt, so compliment that.
And apparently Hibiki was a similar story. Barnette was so fiery, she didn't even try.
Miss Gasco's got a system for breaking us in, for sure. She did the same thing to Hibiki. Barnette...Barnette was a tough one.
She says she can take care of herself. This year we hit a milestone, though---she ate some of her birthday cake.
Nothing to distract from her training, Erufuda. But we did manage to get her to eat a slice of her birthday cake for once.
I ask sometimes, but the answer's always the same. She's fine training on her own. I know she likes extra meat in her soup, though.
I've tried, Erufuda. She doesn't share my sweet tooth or fashion hobby. Sometimes she orders her soup "extra hearty," though.

condition.saying: nowhere near as interested in men as she is

case.state: Stop reading so deep into things, would you? "We come in peace." Honestly, Earthlings have always been the aggressive ones.
Can't you trust that we mean what we say? Mejarians are a peaceful race, you know. We're always fending off nasty Earthlings these days, in fact.
Maybe, maybe not. Your homeworld's been trying to kill us for the better part of a year, so when you start talking all high and mighty...
It's hard not to have any doubts after what this planet's sent after us...

Hoohn! I love it.
...Hey, do one for Meia, too. She won't ask, but she's thinking it.

Aaahn...that was great. You didn't miss a beat!
...Did you see Meia glance over? Treat her to one, too.
That we are, Lizzie! I'm glad you're so interested in these boring old alien women.
We are pirates, Elizabeth...but don't worry, you're too much of a sweetheart to kill and rob!
Don't you worry your pretty little head off about it. We may be pirates, but we only attack nasty soldier types.
Pirates we are, Elizabeth...and we've got so many stories of high adventure and death-defying stunts to tell.
Sailors? Ghosts? Meia, this girl's nuts---don't bother with her little tactical advice.
...OK, I think we can safely ignore whatever Miss Politics has to say, Leader. Now she's talking about ghosts like it's Halloween.
...Well, I know what sailors and ghosts are, but not Buddhists. In any case, I think you're officially crazy. Agree, Boss?
You're not taking this girl seriously, Meia, are you? God, she's babbling about ghosts and Bood-whatevers now.
...This girl's had too much to drink, Leader. I wouldn't take the advice of some Noble-Sword type who's stuck in the dark ages.
No? I do like seeing what girls are made of. You don't have to pose just for ~player~...
Haaahn. For ~player~'s eyes only, right? You talk like I don't want to get a nice, good look at the girls who walk in.
You guess. I can pay compliments as long as you're not rude, you know!
Isn't it nice when we're nice to each other? There's more where that came from if you return the favor.
...Hmm. Well, I crossed that bridge a while ago. And you're back on the other side of it...

Virgins only?
...I guess you don't want to punch above your weight.
Wouldn't mind? Everyone would call me the dumb girl! Or I'd end up running with punks, or whoever else was left...
What? I'd be labeled dumb blonde for years! The only other girls who repeated were the lowlifes.
Uhh...you certainly can. I certainly have. But you might end up more than friends.
Ahaha. Everything has a price. In this case, your friendship---swapped for something more intimate.
Ugh, I know that feeling. There were a couple years where my mom couldn't buy me new bras fast enough.
...Hoohn, memories. I was bursting through every bra I got for a while. Mom was proud and annoyed...
Maybe they're not so beautiful on their own, so they try to create it somehow. I just need a mirror, you know?
Well, men are kind of dirty. And their bodies...it's just not the same kind of natural beauty. So they must try to make some.
A Vandread is also capable of more than it appears. Hoisting a brilliant blade at my side---I love that image! Where can I get one?
I want one. A fighter who shines like a brilliant star, piloting a craft with impossible power---her sidearm should be just as striking!
H-hey, are you calling me stupid? It's hard work piloting a Dread, especially in a team! And I have to take command in emergencies!
I-I have plenty of intelligence, lady! Maybe it's not ancient runes, but Dread controls aren't easy, and neither are formations! Or leadership!
Oh, I'm just teasing. At least you aren't out of shape for your age---and I bet you have experience with men, don't you? I think you'll make for some fine reconnaissance.
Oh, you still have the right to be here. You could look a lot worse, after all---oh, you're perfect, actually! You've been with men before at your age, right?
I just expected this place to be frequented by younger women, that's all. I'm sure I can learn a lot from an Earth woman with experience.
A...girl with a gem on her belly button? Some girls do piercings, but I don't think they give magic powers.
No...? I think you've got Mejare all wrong---we've got issues, but magic gem girls aren't one of them.
W-who, me? Er, no, I don't think so...not unless there's a whole elite force of magic pierced girls we don't know about.
Hmm...no, I can't think of anyone, Sayaka. Does Barnette have piercings? I hope she'd tell me about any magic.
What do you think I do in combat, stroll up to enemy lines demanding a duel? A pirate's job is to surprise, to flank, to offer no chance for retaliation.
Oh, I see. You're a soldier clinging to notions of an honorable duel, aren't you? I'm a pirate, and I'd run you through from behind once my comrades have caused enough commotion.
I'm a pirate, you know. I've already done a bad job if my enemy has the chance to strike at all.
I think I'm at the perfect level of exposure. A pirate wouldn't want heavy armor thunking around while she sneaks behind for the kill.
Oh, I agree---I'd have to be a fool to challenge you head-on, with your thick sword and thicker armor. But I'm a pirate, and we don't really play by the rules.
It's certainly a fashionable choice, but I'd say skintight clothes are the most popular on Mejare. Girls will be girls, even across the galaxy.
It's not that strange---why shouldn't girls want to look good, no matter what planet they're from? You see dresses like mine sometimes, but skintight suits are all the rage.
That's even more bizarre. So you keep them around as second-class citizens? Or are they there for you to keep your population up?
Oh, they're some tiny lower caste of people? That actually sounds kind of cruel---most other places seem to have even numbers of men and women. Do you just breed with them?
Eugh. I should have figured men's simple minds would think bigger is always better. But why?
...This explains quite a lot, unfortunately. Is it because you might last through one of Earth's winters, or something else entirely?
...All my scheming to get men's attention, and it turns out I needed Barnette to feed me her food instead. How could they prefer something so hideous?
Well, what the hell is wrong with Earth that it's got ghosts floating around? You've started extending your lives even beyond taking our organs, all so you can party more?
So there's so much weird energy on this planet that girls die and go right on partying as ghosts? Stolen body parts weren't enough, I guess!
So even death is no obstacle for an Earth girl? Just turn into some energy ghost and float back into the bar! It makes you wonder why they bother with organ harvesting.
Gar-chomp? Well, that---doesn't sound cute. Don't tell me you train these things to fight.
...You're right, maybe you'd better keep something called "Garchomp" on its leash. Are you some kind of attack trainer? For security, or---for sport?
...What do you train these animals for, exactly? I was picturing cute little things jumping through hoops, not---well, chomping on each other.
Oh, he knew perfectly well what he was doing! He was trying to kill us all for being inferior humans! I suppose you're quite smug about your powers yourself.
Control was not his issue. His issue was being a maniac who thought his little powers made us inferior. Quite a lot like the tone you're taking!
Are you sure about that? I didn't question Mejare's account of things until it gave me a reason to. What do you know about where Earth gets its fresh organs?
Mejare's information was for everyone, too---at least the parts they felt like sharing. Have you got an article about Earth's colony-harvesting program?
...I see. Even undoing your buttons, somehow? I can't bend like that.
Just---curious. Well, if you born that way, then I guess there's no reason at all.
Hmph. Why weren't you this friendly to begin with? Were you just seeing if we'd put up with it?
What were you acting so high and mighty for, then? Just waiting to be called out for it?
Don't you? It hasn't weighed me down at all. They thought I couldn't play sports, or fly a Dread!
Yeah, that's the next thing they'd say. Then they'd start talking about how they were sporty, like I couldn't beat them at that, too.
W-what's that supposed to mean? Can't you sense my brilliant radiance? A beautiful, elegant aura emanating from my presence?
"F-flashy person?" That's all you take away? What about my aura of elegance? My distinguished air of sophistication?

H-huh? "Supernatural"...?
U-uh...could you explain a little more?
What do you m---w-what? I'm not---supernatural. Unless you mean---what are you sensing, exactly?
Well, Mejare loves my type. I wonder how we'd look if we swapped outfits! I'd have to play all girlish, and you elegant...could you really manage?
Cultural differences...we've run into a lot of those lately. Well, if you could pull off a dress, then I could pull off a little crop-top and skirt! Hmm...
...Yeah? So what? The whole planet was water. And besides, it was my co-pilot's idea.

W-well, it wasn't really draining. Trust me, that planet wouldn't have missed it.
...Are you OK?
U-uh...OK. Why do you have to be away from people?
Um...what are your reasons, exactly? I mean, how'd you end up alone so often?
Aah---uugh. I'm sorry I asked. W-why does this planet have monsters running around, anyway?
Eeeewww. I think that's how the men picture us...w-what are they even doing here? We're not gonna run into some, right?
Some of them are so scatterbrained that they can't even manage that. And they wonder why their schemes never pan out!
I swear, some get the simplest tasks, and they still can't stay focused. They'll need a babysitter their whole lives...
Personally, I just ask how my Dread's doing. She's serious about it, though---once, I heard her say that "everything that moves is alive."
As long as I can fly, the rest goes over my head. But she really treats machines like living things. I've heard her say as much.
Who cares? Just show me a picture. Maybe I can catch one and make it my mascot!
Ruujura, Jynx, whatever. I need to see it! Jura Basil Elden and her mascot Ruujura! So coooool!
W-what's your deal, then? You're talking like they're just another animal rolling around in the dirt.
And a tongue of fire. Seriously, I feel bad just listening to you tear into them...I mean, all of them.
But think how pretty you'd look! Didn't they teach you that as a princess? Or have you not grown out of your rebellious phase?
...Are you really a Princess? I'd figure they'd drill that into you, you know, being beautiful---or are you just acting out still?
So you do have an ego. You came to play this game, after all---but showing your body just isn't enough.
Oh? So you're not just the prim and proper soldier. You want to dazzle us with a good show.
Hoohn! I love it. It's just effortless when you see me, right? Do another, please!
Aaahn...and I didn't even blow a kiss or anything yet. I look good no matter what I do! Give me one more!
That's not bad. Mejare doesn't have the surface to grow any yet...we have to set up artificial gardens on all our ships and living units.
Ohhh, flowers are nice. You must see a lot outside, huh? You can't take them for granted on a spaceship---or the wrong planet.
We're coming around on our prisoners. They've made themselves useful, that's for sure. I think they get some kind of kick out of it.
Men seem to get pretty anxious if they're not doing anything productive. But it might just be to please their captors in our case.
Tofu? That's a little weird...ohhh, wait, do you have a thing against real meat? Because you're a---fox?
Uhh...I guess I'd try that. Why use fake meat when you could cook the real thing---o-oh, wait. Is it a little too familiar?
Perish the thought. You should be like me and do all the hard work while you look pretty.
So you're more like me, saving the day without tarnishing your beauty?
Wha---don't make fun of me! I thought your magic spells were energy blasts, not---laundry detergent! I have to treat cuts and bruises!
M-magic? You don't get it at all. I wish I could just lift my sword and soap myself!
...As a matter of fact, I know a man your size.
...Well, then, I'm sure you can demonstrate. One of our prisoners just so happens to be your build...
Y-you talk just like me! And when Jura does it, it's a fun contrast...not a candy-coated squirt!
W-what do you mean, a mouth like Jura's? Jura's full, supple lips, adorned with a crimson sheen? Because you don't talk any different.
That's still pretty good. And so convenient...ohhh, but Jura likes the shower. That warm, soothing stream...

Cleaning isn't bad. I could fight as hard as I can and then magic away the grime!
...But I'd probably still shower, just for the feeling.
Who cares? If people are jealous, it just means you're doing well.
"You don't lose anything by being seen." Being enviable is a good thing!
I can tell. You even let us think you'd strip in a decent way. Go on, show us all your pubic hair next.
Don't stop there---your fancy look was a lie, too. Next will be your blouse, or panties, or something...
Isn't there anything you want to keep safe? Where protecting it is more important than the thrill?
I figured. Tell me there's something you'd never risk. You know, because you love it?
Girls have been passing around a lot of...I think it's called techno? At a reasonable volume.
Not when I can feel it vibrating. I don't really know music that well, but that electronic dance stuff has been all the rage lately.
Well, hey, demons can still be noble and elegant. Maybe they can be cute, too. What is your plan?
Maybe so. There's not a lot of rules for that kind of thing. Is that your goal, to be the friendliest little demon around?
O-oh, shut up! I'm not drunk! Y-you're just---weird!
W-what are you implying? Give me a headache, and then call me a boozer! You have some nerve!
Oogh, mysterious and unexplainable...maybe it's too late. M-Magno's Family appreciates any support!
...Preying on fears, huh? We may be dealing with a nasty one already...are you sure you can't spare a few blessings?
Really? So what's she done lately to make you feel safe, treasured, and beautiful?
Muhuhu...Jura knows what it's like to call the shots. How does she show her demonic devotion?
...Hmm, I guess that's true. You don't work hard, you just have to carry the burden. It's like the Captain...
...Maybe I should've figured. The Captain's not the one flying Dreads and lifting crates. She's got a different kind of "responsibility"...
Is that so? Hmm...I happen to have awakened my own powers in a tight spot. You just need to be touched by the right energy...
Oh! In that case...we might not be so different! This snafu of yours didn't involve any balls of light, did it?
Where do you get the nerve to climb out of these portals and then start asking questions? I was hoping to meet some normal Earth girls.
I'm the one who deserves to have her questions answered! Don't tell me every Earth girl is running around with a portal-necklace like it's no big deal.
I can't get over how cool this is. You should join our crew with aim like that!
...That's never going to get old. It's brilliant to watch!
The skill is one thing, but the daring! You're not scared at all!
This is unreal. I never knew Earth women could be so cool! Or daring! Or spunky!
Every bullet looks like it's going to hit you, and then it just grazes! It's spectacular! Can it be taught?
Could you shoot my dress off, too? Not that I'd want you to, but could you? Could I learn how to do it?
Absolutely phenomenal! And you even manage to look beautiful as you do it! Could you maybe teach me?
I'd be quite the pirate if I could shoot like you! Can you give me some tips?
Attack from the air? You really are from a darker time---why not just use a lovely fighter ship, like my Dread?
Now, why are you forcing poor animals to fight for you? The wonders of technology have given us machines to fly---like my sleek, glorious Dread fighter.
Hmph! I didn't take you for such a cruel soul, Catria---torturing animals when machines exist! And I bet my Dread is faster, too.
Horses? Like, the animal? That sounds slow, cruel, and inefficient---can't you afford Dread fighters? You know, machines?
Omigosh, Faye, that jacket is so stylish! And the way you let it hang there just screams personality.
I like your style! A scarlet-red jacket, just draped all sexy-like around your delicate frame...exquisite.
Ooh, that jacket is so cool-looking! My dress is the only fancy thing I own...such is the life of a pirate.
Ooh, I barely noticed that thing, the way you draped it around yourself with style! You've got an eye for sex appeal.
Hahahaha! Oh, don't take things so seriously! You're still cute---you're just a little on the short side, that's all!
Oh, relax! I'm just teasing you---it's not often on Mejare you meet a woman so short!
I'm just teasing! Don't take it personally---I'm quite used to towering over women.
Oh, are you sensitive about your height? Don't worry---I hear short men get much more flack for it.
Uh...you alright, Miss Detective? What's up?
Oh, you're taking off the gloves now? I just figured you really liked them.
Oh, the gloves? I thought you were just committed to some kind of fashion statement. Why now?
Hey, Kyoko, you look mortified. Something happen? Bad memories of men resurfacing?
Hey, Miss Pokerface, you're not really living up the nickname anymore. What's wrong?
Ohhh, so that's what it's called? Short and simple...and romantic. And they speak it on Planet France?
And is that the official language of Planet France? I simply have to move there, then!
And is every woman on Planet France as cute-looking and sounding as you? It sounds like heaven, then!
Omigosh, Marinette! You're from planet "France," right? And everyone speaks French there? That's so exciting!
Watch out, folks. That armor can take some abuse...and it takes a while to get it off.
Did you know? Meia wears that armor to show she's our squadron leader. She's a smart cookie!
Your armor's pretty tough stuff, Meia, but it can't stop aces.
Ace pilot, sure, but that armor can't seem to deflect aces.
Oho, and here comes your cute---floating...legless...servant woman.
And who's this adorable little servant girl? Who's...floating. With no legs.
Eek! A g-ghost! ...Your servant woman? You have a legless floating ghost for a servant?
...What planet are you from, again? Mejare has a servant class...but those girls have legs. And they walk on the ground.
So what's your story? Don't you keep going on about "Angels" or something like that? I'm curious.
I keep hearing about these "Angel" attacks. Are they bad? Because you came out looking pretty cute.
Don't you fight "Angels" or something? I hope you don't mistake me for one...I could understand doing so.
So you're all about fighting off "Angels"? Hey, you're looking at one...don't shoot.
Should I ask why you wear so much extra stuff when you just want to take it off in a hurry?
I'm trying to be sensual and fun. This girl is advertising her diseases.
...You all know I'm just flirting, right? I'm not like this girl, I swear.
I can't believe what I'm hearing. I was just making jokes about Earth girls being sex fiends thanks to men...and now I meet one.
Ooh, really? I'd be honored, Palutena---maybe you could bless our union!
Seriously? Oh, Palutena, I was thinking about asking Barnette to marry me---could you bless us, maybe?
Omigosh, Palutena, do you mean it? I kind of want to propose to her---do you think you could bless us?
Ooh! Just between the two of us, Miss Goddess---I think I'm popping the question soon. Could we get a blessing and some holy light?
Hm? Oh, right, you brought your partner along. Why isn't she playing? Or saying anything?
Your partner seems like the strong, silent type. Not sure which part to emphasize.
Is that your wrestling partner helping you out? What a loyal friend...even if she doesn't have much on her mind.
Hey, this table's full! Oh, she's just helping you...and has little to say about it.
Well, you're chalk-white, is the thing---w-wait, what are you doing? There's shades for us to change behind?
Oh, wait, that explains things. You brought a shade to a strip game---the sun's never seen an inch of you.
Really? Maybe pure-white skin is a thing on Earth---hey, what're you doing? We get shades in strip poker?
You're not serious? Your skin's pure white---hey, since when do we get shades? Where's my shade? My beauty is worth covering!
Eek! W-what is it with Earthlings and weird mind powers? This isn't fair!
Wha---oh, of course she's got messed-up mind powers! I didn't realize how common this was on Earth!
...And now you're floating. Well, that one Earth boy could pin us down with his mind, so why not do the opposite?
...Another Earthling with freaky mind powers? At least it's a girl this time.
Look, just take it easy, OK? It's just a game...
Are you fine now? You sure? You need to relax...
Don't be all embarrassed, Meia. They don't know about your headpiece...
Well, you'll feel better after this, right? All loose and limber.
Getting out of that armor would certainly cheer me up.
Come on, now. Perk up a bit. Where's that fighting spirit we all look up to?
You're too cute to be this sour, Meia...even though you always are.
OK, I think everyone'll be happy with that one.
That's more along the lines of what I expected. Don't freak me out like that, Meia, OK?
I guess that armor's a little sentimental, too. Gee, your outfit's nothing but personal mementos.
That's what you're going with? Didn't you bring a laser ring or something else small?
This'll cheer you up, right? Or at least free you up. Come on, it's not so bad.
It's OK, Meia, come on. Get into the spirit of things and relax! Gascogne wouldn't want to see you all embarrassed like this.
That's it. That armor just reminds you of fighting the Harvest. Lighten up and enjoy yourself for once!
Don't be sour the whole night. What will Earth think of Mejare, besides how it's got a pirate problem?
OK...that's more what I expected. Don't get all weird on me.
That's better. Be the Meia I know and love, why don't you? Just a little sexier.
OK, that I can get behind. Go back to the Meia I'm used to, please.
There's the Meia I know! Already taking off the good stuff, and insisting she isn't sexy.
So is that armor actually comfortable? I'm only second in rank to you, after all. Might have to wear it soon.
Isn't that armor all pressurized? You poor thing. You've probably been hoping for this.
That armor looks so uncomfortable. But you wear it well, because you're such a cutie!
Feeling better? I could never pilot the way you do in that bulky armor.
That's it! Wiggle yourself out of that armor and show off your figure!
You've worked hard to get your figure, right? Well, don't let that armor hide that tight little bodysuit.
That bulky armor almost makes you look like a man. Shed it and show off how svelte you can be.
That's the way. Lose the armor...women shouldn't have big, bulky shoulders.
That's the way! It's all big and clunky. Now you can enjoy yourself in just the bodysuit!
Now with just the bodysuit, you'll be able to stretch out...like me.
That's more like it. Just think how cute you'll look in just the bodysuit, especially to these Earth people!
Here comes the good stuff, folks. Meia's bodysuit is just the cutest thing!
Wizards? I don't suppose you could show me what this magical help is all about.
...Magical? What's that about? I thought our crew would be the oddballs...
Er...I've met women with pierced belly buttons, but they tend to be unsavory types. Not...magical.
...On thuggish women, maybe. You seem like a cutie, Sayaka, so I'll take your word for it.
Well, that's the first time a thuggish pierced-navel type called her jewelry a Soul Gem. Unless you're really telling the truth about this magic business.
Pierced navels are usually the mark of the dregs of Mejarian society...says the pirate. Nothing to do with magic.
Apparently Earth women subscribe to your ideas of fun, Meia. Well, maybe not the whole Dread-formations thing.
What a letdown. I should just masturbate already---that'd be fun, at least.
Yeah, yeah, we get it. You're a real poker master. Show some skin already.
That was all the Mejarian fashion I had to show off. Is your outfit common on Earth?
You're such a bore, ~name~. I guess men suck the fun out of a planet.
Meia, this girl's got a real killer instinct. We should get her in a cockpit.
Is that in style on Earth? Fashion's the most I can get out of your stripping now...

{jura}Earth people really are intense. I mean, I guess the Harvest had taught us that already.{!reset}
{barnette}Don't compare that...
I think I own something like that. I just love this dress so much, I can never wear it!
Earth fashion is a curious thing. Why cover up your wonderful body?
Hey, the body is meant to be enjoyed. Mejarians certainly enjoy each other.
What are your other plans to rattle me? Blowing a kiss?
Oh, why are you covering so much skin? I love the way you look...it's how I was raised.
Soon you'll be showing the skin I'm always showing.
Don't act all wounded about it. I started showing more than that.
I still say my sword was a heftier loss.
So much beating around the bush. Maybe I'll follow suit.
I'm a busy pirate with a gorgeous girlfriend, ~name~. Either show some more of that cute body or beat it.
Can't you give us a show, ~name~? The audacity of it all!
Is that really it, ~name~? I'm showing some leg right now.
Get into the spirit of things, would you? Yeesh.
I flew a long way to come here, you know. Space is pretty big.
I hope you're not proud of this.
There she goes...
A little more skin, but not much elegance.
That would pretty obviously come next. You'd better give us a flourish...
I hope Barnette's not getting into a fight with the owner...
I'm on the edge of my seat. What could be hiding under there, a few inches of skin?
You tease better than I do, ~name~, and I don't think you're even trying.
I wonder what Paiway will look like when she's old enough to come here. Her little nurse outfit is so cute!
Barnette takes after Gascogne in so many ways...but not cards, that's for sure.

Bar-nette, come look at ~name~!
{barnette}...Her ~clothing~? I don't get it.{!reset}
...Jura just wanted you to come by.
Boring...is Jura being this boring? I mean, you could see my armpits and cleavage since I walked in...
I'd better make sure this is fastened just right...
If only two Dreads could combine to make something elegant...
Make sure to toss ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ to the side in a really sexy way.
A boring choice for a boring woman.
That alone is probably more than everything I've lost so far.
This game just isn't grabbing me. Maybe I'll return to my life as a heroic pilot.
Does that outfit attract men? Or are they solely focused on what's underneath?
Apparently Earth women subscribe to Meia's idea of fun.
What a letdown. I should just masturbate already---that'd be fun, at least.
Yeah, yeah, we get it. You're a real poker master. Show some skin already.
That was all the Mejarian fashion I had to show off. Is your outfit common on Earth?
Is this what karma feels like? An irritating groin tingle?
Just what I deserve, I guess. Next time I'll come with just the dress.
Would Parfet be any good at poker? Nah, total scatterbrain. And no street smarts.
What do I have to spread to excite you into taking off more? Because I don't want to do it with cards anymore.
That's all? What, are you Earth girls shy around each other? You all have the same parts!
I can't take this...you're making it painful.
...Well, ignore her, Barnette. I'm sure that's what you wanted, anyway.
I don't masturbate often, you know. I have help the next room over on the ship. So make this good for me!
You're such a bore, ~name~. I guess men suck the fun out of a planet.
You've got a real killer instinct. We should get you in a cockpit...
Is that in style on Earth? Fashion's the most I can get out of your stripping now...

{jura}Earth people really are intense. I mean, I guess the Harvest had taught us that already.{!reset}
{barnette}Don't compare that...
~blank~
Erm...I appreciate the thought, but I'll pass. An old flame won't ignite any new passion, if you follow.
I'm...not sure she'd appreciate that. It's basically telling her I find her so boring that I invited a woman twice her age into bed with us.
Oh, don't judge my boss too harshly. Sure, she's sour, but that discipline keeps us all alive!
Hey, it's that mood that keeps Meia all-business when the squadron's panicking. She just can't turn it off.
Yeah, she's usually miserable like this. But she's still our fearless leader---you should see her in a dogfight!
I know my leader's a bit abrasive, Sei, but she cares. That dull stoicism keeps our heads on straight when we scramble.
Meia might be a pretty dull girlfriend, sure, but that apathetic mood keeps our pilots calm. I always panic when I have to lead...
Well, I can play nice with others. Just look what I've roped you into.
That's because I don't pick fights with every girl I meet.
Hm? Well, obviously they didn't want us learning how interesting men and their fleshy little rods could be. Look how curious it's made two young Mejarian girls.
I guess they figure young, impressionable girls' minds shouldn't be poisoned with questions of male anatomy. As you can see, curiosity has left us outlaws.
I can't imagine it's easy to keep girls away from men once they start asking questions. Just look at us, stripping on planet Earth for the chance.
Hah...if they'd just bothered to keep us fed and sheltered, maybe we wouldn't have gone searching for men. You can see what it's driven us to.

Hahahaha! Meia might not be very fun, Saki, but that's what makes her such a good leader! I trust my life to that cool head.

Piloting teaches you how cool any girl can be, "Number-Two." Meia's our best one, and she keeps our heads on straight as she does it.
Hmph. He's really turning on the charm, isn't he? But I don't think the Paksis would take as well to him as our current prisoners.
How kind of you include me. I do appreciate compliments, but I get a lot of them---and from more trusted sources.

Hmmmn, you could've been more complimentary. Hard shells have a sweet center.

This isn't exactly Meia's idea of fun like it is mine. I mean, she likes feeling sexy, but she'd never admit it.
Meia's not the type to admit it when she's having fun. Don't worry, you're good company for her.

I know!

What's that? Is the man not so sure about his lead anymore?
Oho. Is the man starting to sweat a little?
Thought I'd just roll over and die? Well, I might roll over and masturbate.
Oh. I'm so embarrassed already, and now a man is taking off the good stuff.
That's more like it, ~name~. Show me what a man likes to hide.
Hey, ~name~, you don't strike as tougher to handle than Tarakkian soldiers. Though I'm usually clothed when I deal with them.
That's the spirit, ~name~. I'm glad you're starting to work with me here.
Trust me, ~name~. You're gonna want to be naked when I start going at it...and I want to see how you react.
Now you're on a roll, ~name~! Keep it up!
This has been good for me, ~name~. Now make it great.
About time! Let's see if your body is as bristly as they say.
Just what I've been looking for. Well, I guess your tube would be a liiiiiittle better...
What's this? A man showing skin? Hide your Mejarians!
That's quite the choice. I hope you don't regret it later.
I've already gone over the edge...but who knows? Maybe there's another one you can push me past.
Oh, I just can't take this! A man leering at my defeated nude body, stripping himself down...it's enough to make the hardiest Mejarians swoon.
~blank~
Hah! What'd I tell you, Nayru? Even men can offer no resistance to my womanly charms.
Heeheehee. I can't say I'm surprised, Nayru---there's never been a woman I couldn't seduce, so the same should hold for a man.
What did you expect, Nayru? I'm the most beautiful woman on a planet full of them---it only makes sense a man would throw off his clothes for me.
Oh, my, ~player~. I know Nayru questioned your love for me, but this is too much! My beauty knows no bounds, it seems.
You're so lucky. Cooler Vandread, cozier co-piloting...
...Meanwhile, he'll slide circles around me. I'm so soft, too! Who wouldn't want to sit in Jura's lap?
Yeah. Girls get married all the time on Mejare. Men and women don't?

Oh, is that not a thing you do here?
...Wait, did we invent that?
Well, it's just not elegant to have my butt smacked, you know? Jiggling from behind looks silly.
Even if I'm making love, Jura wants to be pretty! There's nothing pretty about poking a finger in there...
...It's not like they can hear me, you know.
...You know I'm in a cockpit in space, right?
Oh, my! And I thought men were courageous! But this mountain of muscles hides his thing from my teeth.
What's the matter, Cap? Afraid this Mejarian will just bite it right off?
Come now---there's no reason to hide behind your shield. I don't eat every man's organs.
Don't be that way. If I wanted to eat you, I'd go for those delicious shoulder muscles. So put the shield down.
Oh, Dita would be going crazy right now. That girl is so adorable with her men-obsession!
Game moving too fast for you, ~name~? I haven't even lost any clothes yet!
Don't mind Meia's nasty looks. She acts all cool, but don't be fooled---you're driving her crazy.
If you think you're close to getting me out of my dress to match you...maybe you are.
Such a poor show from our male friend here. Can't you make me work for it?
Earth men are popular with the girls, right? They just flock right to you?
I read something about how men think about sex nonstop. Is that true? I mean, Tarakkians have no outlet for that.
If Tarakkians weren't brainwashed to fear women, I bet they'd be awful jealous of you Earth guys. Surrounded by beauties.
Oh, Dita would be going crazy right now. That girl is so adorable with her men-obsession!
Game moving too fast for you, ~name~? I haven't even lost any clothes yet!
Ever play against Meia? She acts all cool, but don't be fooled---you'd drive her crazy.
If you think you're close to getting me out of my dress to match you...maybe you are.
You've been around the bend with Earth girls, right? Well...Mejarians are goddesses by comparison.
What's the Earth dating scene like? Any girls like me?
I hope Barnette won't mind if I'm spellbound by your manly charms.
And I stripped you all by myself. Pilots tend to need teamwork.
Forgive me if I get a little too excited. I've never seen a man quite like this!
I was taught as a little girl that men's hides were all rough and scaly, you know. Doesn't look that way.
If you think your manly appeal will so easily sway me from Barnette, you should know she's a pilot and a great cook.
Duero's a smart cookie, but I guess he's the exception among men.
I wonder if Paiway's hitting puberty. Better keep her away from men's degenerate influences.
I thought men were brave. Just going to stop there?
I should've brought Duero. He's handsome and he'd be naked by now.
You're leaving me hanging, ~name~. Think my breasts'll hang next?
Shame, but it looks like Hibiki and Bart's intelligence is about the benchmark for men. You know, lovable idiots.
Not too far behind me after all, huh?
Jura Basil Elden doesn't go down that easy.
Getting worried, ~name~? Men should always worry around Mejarians.
I like what I see, ~name~. But I could always see more, if you'd be so kind.
Jura Basil Elden doesn't go down that easy...unless your name is Barnette Orangello.
Beautiful as I am, sir, don't forget I'm also a cunning pilot.
Catching up to me? I'm so flattered, sir.
I just don't know how to react. Men are so frightening!
What else is a man hiding away? It's got to be something worth seeing for this Mejarian, right?
Finally, something good from you. Took you long enough.
I don't mind men watching me do this...except for Rabat, that jerk. He's so gross!
I'm on the edge of my seat, ~name~. And at another edge, too.
Don't stop there, ~name~. I'm sure a man exposing himself would be enough to make us go another round.
Men's bodies are so fascinating. How do they balance themselves out without the extra...assets?
Little Hibiki's got the moxie to make up for his size. How do you compensate...and for what?
The men in my life are a fascinating bunch. But now you're starting to catch up to them in that regard.
~blank~
And it all comes together perfectly. You're even wearing more clothes than usual---no silly midgame underwear.
It must've been meant to be. It fits you better in a lot of ways---see, you didn't even have to bring extra.
So it really was that bad? When I held her, I just thought about how cute she was.
...I hate to say it, but I'm not sure I would've been that selfless. Maybe if it were my baby.
Well, hey, you make it work. Now give everyone a great show---!
You're still really pretty. Prove it to the others now, why don't you?
But you'd look so cute with a baby bump! We could be pregnant together.
You can put up with a little pregnancy. Won't you, so I'll have someone who understands?
She'd probably call herself out before I got the chance. Besides, she'd lose her mind waiting around to get fat.
A muffin top, in that suit? Honestly, it'd be hard for her to gain weight. What's she meant to do with her time?
I don't think Meia's patient enough to get fat. She might seem calm, but that's because she burns off all her energy.
Maybe it's just the antigravity, but this girl's lit a fire in my heart, Leader! Do you think I should wear a suit like yours?
Hey, Leader, this girl's making bodysuits look good even for a woman with some meat on her. Should I wear one?
I think you've managed to make bodysuits boring for me, Meia. This girl is making me want to get one now!
Maybe I should abandon this silly dress and opt for a bodysuit like yours and Ochako's, Meia---just bare it all! What do you say?
I know I'm not as slender and lithe as you, Leader, but neither is Ochako. Should I get myself a bodysuit?
Not about that. I'd have to be...well, doing something dirty.

I've got nothing to be shy about!
...Physically, anyway. We all get up to things we'd rather keep private...
Oh, is it different with men? I used to fool around with girls in school. It wasn't a big deal or anything...
Um, OK. It's just good to play a little, see if you'll make good girlfriends. Or---boyfriends. Is that more serious?
Ahaha...well, if you want to stay warm, you could just nuzzle up in my chest.
Oh? Mhmhm...Jura has an especially warm embrace. Free to any girl she deems fit!
Uh...maybe if you're fourteen. By now, you should really be more comfortable with yourself.
...I guess? But this is kind of late for a first time.
I know. For a moment, you were actually asserting yourself. Do men not like that, either?
It's also OK to have an opinion. Now I'm really concerned what they've hammered into you...
...I could honestly be better about that. It's one thing between girls, but when the enemy sees you tremble...

Maybe I could learn from you. It hurts my image to blow up on someone!
...Plus, you don't want to lose your nerve in combat...
Nooo! Nayru was so cute! How many girls do they have to take from me?
Nayru! Noooo! This isn't fair---she was the cutest one! They wanted her lovely blue hair!
Nayruuuu! The absolute worst girl they could've killed! Her hair was so gorgeous!

state.text: Eeek! No! Nayruuu! Damn it, how'd the Harvest follow me here and steal the cutest girl?

case.state: ...Is "China" some other country? I'm wandering out of my depth here. What's the difference between all these Earth factions, anyway?
..."China"? I'm still wrapping my head around Japan. Is this planet really split into so many different pieces? Mejare has enough trouble functioning as one.
Wait, are you saying all these Earth countries had different writing systems, too? It sounds like such a mess. Why can't you all just unite as one planet?
Ah, I see. Two girls competing for one man's affections---I've seen that play out on just our little ship. You should really just come out and---well, write it.
Well, now. I may not have much experience with men, but I know that the best way to treat the wounds of love is to rip the bandage off. Just tell him how you feel!
Two girls chasing after one man? I consider myself something of an expert on these matters. You're wasting your time---the sooner you confess, the better.
Oh, this is just the way schoolgirls are, I suppose. Always tiptoeing around the issue---stop wringing your hands and just admit it to him already!
...Oh. Well, that puts a damper on things. It's one thing for men to not be marriage material, but why doesn't your daughter like you?
...A daughter, but you're not married? That's terrible---I won't get too attached to the man I take seed from if they can't commit. And what's up with her, ignoring her mother?
...Oh. I suppose men don't value marriage and romance the way we do. Is your daughter just going through a rebellious phase...?
Oh, a school for goddesses, I should've known. Is this part of your graduation research, observing human anatomy?
Oh, right, you're a goddess who goes to goddess school. Are you doing work for the film club now, recording humans in their bare skin?
Well, it certainly got the attention of our weapons trainers when I joined the crew. No one expected the haughty buxom girl to have such a unique skillset.
Little did I know I'd be applying those skills with a real sword in just a few years. I filled quite the niche on our armed squads, delicate as I appeared.
I always wanted people to notice me! And when I filled out, I made them notice both my body and my strength. And I could still be vulnerable at times...
Growing up just made me want to shine even brighter. I could be an elegant woman, and a powerful warrior, and still a sensitive little girl...

Not what?
...Oh. You're so loud, but you can't spit it out...life's too short to hide how you feel, you know.
Oh, give me a break. Why not shout your confession, get it over with? I mean, what are you waiting for?
It wasn't my favorite thing, but I do float pretty well. What I really like is lounging poolside.
It's OK. I don't exactly sink. Which is good, because I love just floating around...oh, but that messes with my hair, so I usually just sit nearby...
Would you? A guy, you mean? I've thought about making a baby with one, but are they really cut out for relationships?
"Boy"-friend? Like a man? Aren't most men kind of dirty? I want to try getting the seed from one, but then I'll wash my hands of him.
What do you mean? You just---know. Maybe you should get closer to all these friends of yours.
You mean you've never had that feeling? You lock eyes with her, and your heart races, so you sidle up real close? It's only one step past friendship.
Ahaha...right around the time the search party found us. We don't have the average love story...

Me and Barnette?
...I don't think you should follow our example, unless you don't mind broken arms and going blind...
Like who? Come ooon, you can't just blurt that out and then shrink away...
Well, I'm taken, but I appreciate the thought. Or is there someone else you mean? Are you really gonna keep us hanging?
Just let me borrow it for a second! It's probably a really common make, anyway. Riiight?
She'd come running right over for something like this. Do you know the model number and things?
...Well, it takes one to know one.
Ahaha. What better expert for true beauty than the best example of it?
I wonder what could be the cause of that. Just put your food down for once!
You are literally eating right now. Where do you think that fat comes from?
Are you? Why didn't you pick that time to play strip poker?
I'd love to see that. I'd love to have played with that version of you.
...It's not just in your gut, you know.
Ugh. Now if only you could suck in your thighs, and your butt...
Aaaagh, don't put the picture in my head. Trying to stuff this dress on, jiggling around in all the wrong places...uuugh!
I am not gonna try my luck with that. Godddd, what if I split my dress? I'd be a laughingstock!

Hmph. That bad attitude is going to bite you in the---I---pfft.
Ohhh...

Sure, just make fun some more. Remember that next time your back is turn---o-ohh.
Ahaha...ahhhn.
A little belly, and a whole lot of butt, too. If you don't watch yourself, you might---uuhhh...u-um.
Don't you know girls? Even if you're an elf, it can't be that different. Besides, you're chubby in other spots, too, like your---y-your---butt.
I have to keep my ear to things. I'm the star of our ship, after all. And, when a girl doesn't listen, I figure---u-uuum. Well, she gets what's coming to her.

Well, I don't wanna be out of the loop. Besides, if a girl's hopeless, you might as well get some laughs out of---h-herrr.
O-oh, no...

A little? It's all over your body. Be careful you don't go splitting your---p-pants.
...That was supposed to be a joke!
You could clearly use a rude awakening. I mean, you're a few more fries from splitting your---y-your---ohhhhn.
Back in school, sure. Girls were always jealous of me, especially after puberty! But that didn't bother me, because---b-because---oh my God.
I guess so---because they were jealous. Don't you wanna steal the show like that? Instead of---o-oh. Whatever this this.
You'd be surprised what the nice ones are capable of. She might even slip up in front of you if you manage to really embarrass---y-your---self.
Please. You may be an elf, but you're still a girl, right? Who knows how nice she really is. Especially if you go and---d-do something---embarrassing.

No one?
...Well, I guess if you're stuck with just men to go after. Aren't there any nice, clean, handsome ones?
Aren't you picky? I know all of three men, and they don't seem that bad...I mean, can't you force them to shower, at least?
W-what do you mean by that? I mean, fighting's not my ideal, either, but we've got to do our best with it.
What's your ideal of beauty? Fighting isn't pretty, sure, but that's no excuse to just be dirty and miserable.
Like I said, she's busy. And she bristles about it sometimes, anyway...come onnnn, I'm the perfect subject!
I told you, she's been doing it less and less...and I just want more and more! Imagine if I had a dedicated helper!
Heeey, ~player~...Hayase keeps her feelings all locked up. Not Jura. Jura lets you know exactly how much she loves you...
~player~...Hayase's dam is about to burst. She just can't control herself. But if you were with me, all the love would flow out for you, all the time...
Hey, ~player~...what're you messing around with this shrimp for, huh? No breasts, no hips, and no fun...not like Jura.
...It's not just Hayase's body that's tiny, ~player~. It's her heart. She won't give you what you want...but Jura has more than you'll ever need.
Oh, I'm sure. You must be about to demonstrate what exactly sets you apart from the peasants...
Sure, whatever. You must have something very special about you I'm not seeing...
H-hey! Where do you get the nerve? Sure, show up to an adults' event and play your little-girl games!
Wha---hold on, now you're just making fun of me! Well, it's getting old, fast!
What is Edo, anyway? I've never heard of an Earth country like that.
You know, if you're not used to guests in "Edo," that might explain why I don't know it.
Sure, but...this isn't a battle.
We're not...fighting?
Ohh, your legs? They're nice and long for your height. Nothing beats stretching them out bare.
...Showing a little leg, you mean? I love when taking a stance lets me do that. You might be a shortie, but your proportions are good.
No! She's too reckless...always charging ahead, firing everywhere! You know our reg chief had to talk her down from a kamikaze once?
That's what I don't like! She gets mad, and then nearly gets killed...not thinking of how Jura would feel!
No! Ugh...Barnette, you're too reckless...always charging ahead, firing everywhere! Remember when Miss Gasco had to talk you down from a kamikaze?
That's what I don't like! Barnette...you get mad, and then nearly get killed...not thinking of how Jura would feel!
Hmmm? How special? Jura's a little jealous of someone who found love so early.
I'll bet. Since childhood? How romantic! Playing together, bathing together, exploring new things together...!
...OK, then. I hate to say it, but half the time we're looking for trash on away missions...A.K.A. "salvaging abandoned assets."
...Well, yeah. Digging through old junk is---well, a pirate's domain. It's as much fun as it sounds, rooting around hoping for one pretty dress...
S-she looks like you? That's a little vain, even for me!
Y-you pilot---a giant robo-you? Even I've never dreamt of that. I don't think I'd translate well to gears and gaskets...
That's it! That's the fire I love so much. Barnette is the same way...!
Hahahaha! See? Let no slight pass without biting back! I really admire that tenacity...in fact, I fell in love with it.

state.text: No! Please! I'm too beautiful to die!
Ack! Don't shoot! I didn't steal anything! Honest!
Not in the face! Or the breasts! Don't ruin my corpse!
I-I can't die here! I have a girlfriend! And hundreds of admirers!
Nooo! Oh, I only brought my sword! I should've known Earth girls were all crazed gunwomen!

case.state: You have a secret? Well, here's your chance to keep me interested, Plain-Jane.
You haven't impressed so far, Plain-as-Day. So color me interested with this "secret" of yours.
I'm listening. You're so average that I'm honestly willing to buy that you have a "secret."
Unless your secret is a third breast, I just can't see you wowing me.
Uh, well, moving on from the skin business---I'm actually more concerned about that giant syringe you have for an arm.
...So anyway, what the hell is wrong with your arm...syringe...thing?
Why do I care? You have pink skin, you're taking your dress off already, and, uh, you have a giant syringe for an arm.
...Are you really not aware of how strange you look? Like, I was nice and didn't immediately comment on your, uh, syringe.
Well, I care about other things, too, like Oh My God you have a giant gross needle for an arm I hate needles what's going on.
And what have we here? Ooh, you're more depraved than I thought, Miss Vampire Hunter.
Heeheehee! Undoing your bra beneath your shirt, you little tease? A woman after my own heart...if I wore bras.
That's a sexy little move there. I'd try it, too, but bras have never been to my tastes in the first place.
So are you trying to be fun and sexy, or just throwing us all off? I'd certainly prefer the former.
Pfft! So much for the cool-and-calculated act! Even I wouldn't stoop that low...maybe.
There's no need. You're showing your true colors already.
OK, even I wouldn't count my makeup. It's just luck, don't be so sore about it.
Look, if you have to wear enough makeup that it counts as clothing, it wouldn't save your looks in the first place.
Oho---and the Masked Woman is revealing herself! I'm sure she has a good explanation for hiding.
What's this, now? The Masked Woman feels like looking us all in the eye? I'd love to know why you waited so long.
This had better be interesting. I want a face worth waiting for, because the rest of us are revealing more sensitive areas.
Afraid of my evil alien gaze? How xenophobic---now take off that mask so I can see why you wore it.
So soon? I guess that "Secret Identity" of yours isn't worth hiding your pleasure from us.
I guess you'd rather look your admirers in the eyes than conceal you identity any longer than a few rounds.
So much for your "Secret Identity," honey. That's the second thing you're taking off!
Oho! And the mask comes off. Why you bothered with it at all if it's going this quickly, I'll never understand.
Well, look who's overcoming her shyness! Guess that "Secret Identity" didn't last too long when you could've been nude instead.
Wait, what? I thought you were just dressed in typical overly-conservative Earth wear, but instead you're royalty?
That was a disguise? Hey, next time try hiding your face. That might throw people off the princess's trail.
You were disguised? You're royalty? If the commoners can't recognize their princess's face, I can see why you're still in power.
Oh, what's this? You're nobility? Well, well, well...you'll make an excellent ransom.
My, my, another magic trick? Can't you dazzle us with your own naked body?
This is getting old already. By all means, show your body instead---that's far more interesting.
You Earth girls and your parlor tricks. Is this the sort of thing that amuses men and their tiny primate brains? I'd rather see you naked.
Can't you just magic-off your whole outfit? I'd rather see how far down your makeup goes.
Well, aren't you feisty? I make one little joke and you get all menacing!
Are you some kind of dominatrix the bar hired? So intimidating after an innocuous comment.
I don't like your tone, Missy. You think you're oh-so scary by taking offense to a little joke!
You like making threats, don't you? All I did was say we have cute names and you start plotting my demise.
..."Sensitive to clothing"? I just like talking about fashion---er, well, there you go throwing your shirt off. Can you hear me?
...Apparently you're not sensitive to clothing---not if you're starting that big. Is this girl deaf?
Now that I look at it, you're kind of glowing. And way to skip the striptease! What's up with you?
..."Sensitive to clothing"? What am I, a robot? Jeez, I get an absolutely adorable girl, and she's a nutcase.
...Well, at least you're blonde again. Blonde's a good color...I can stare at that and tune you out.
At least there's no gun this time. Now you'll have to make a racket by shouting.
Yeah, yeah, keep on screaming. I'll just stare at that lovely blonde hair and try to forget what's under it...
Your blue version really taught me the value of peace and quiet.

state.text: Ack! No! The Paksis! I should've known this was a dream!
Eeek! Ladybug! The Harvest has got you! Nooo!
Aaack! Don't touch me! W-what's happening? Help!
Aaack! T-the Harvest! They're here! Run! I'm sorry, Ladybug!
Eeek! No! Please! I have a girlfriend! I can't die here!

case.state: ...Ladybug?
Heeheehee! What was that again? Too-ayy-jolee?
Too---too-ay-julee? Did I get it right? Help me out here, cutie.
Tooayyjolie? Was that it? Oh, all your words just melt together into a chocolate fondue of language!
Too---tooayy, uh, what was that? I mean, it was adorable, but I didn't really catch it.
Haha! I have no clue what you just said, but you've got to teach me, Marinette! This'll drive my girlfriend wild.
I can just picture the look on Barnette's face when I start whispering these sweet nothings. Could you teach me?
What was that? Anyway, omigosh, Marinette, you have to give me some French lessons! Barnette will melt in my arms!
Whatever you just said, my girlfriend Barnette would absolutely melt, it's so romantic! Won't you please teach me?
I can't believe you're down to your underwear already. Make me lose something, Meia.
Feel free to, you know, involve me in this game. Don't leave your crewmate behind like this.
I can't believe sourpuss Meia is stealing all the stripping fun for herself.
Come on. I came here to strip, and somehow Miss Pokerface can't make it happen.
Oooh, the dress! Now we're talking! ...What's the matter, Misato?
Aww, someone's embarrassed even through the booze! What's got you all shy suddenly, huh?
Even half in the bag like this, you're all nervous. Hiding something under that dress?
Hey, Miss Misato, what's wrong? You look a little on edge suddenly, even between burps.
Whoa. OK, you meant it. Can't say I understand the rush, but more power to you.
You're not kidding around, are you? This your first time stripping for an audience? Don't overdo things.
Try to keep the audience interested. Strippers don't walk out onstage naked for a reason.
Straight for the bra? What an amateur...it's shock value. The tease is half the fun, silly!
Oh, dropping the little light show already? You kind of looked like our Paksis energy core---it was nostalgic!
Oh, Navi, I wasn't complaining about the light that much. You look just like our energy core, the Paksis!
Oh, you have a body underneath the sparkles, do you? And here I thought you were a little mini-Paksis.
Sorry to dim your light, Miss Fairy---I know I can shine with beauty myself. You remind me of the Paksis, which powers our ship!
Aw, dropping the light right away? You gave me the same warm feeling as the Paksis, glowing like that...I wonder how the ship's doing.
Ooh, that's a nifty trick! You can bet I'd give it a shot if I could...do you think I should wear a bodysuit?
I've always felt I'm too pillowy and soft for a bodysuit, but you really make it your own! Could I pull it off, too?
Hey, Miss Gravity, I was really liking the look of your figure all stuffed into that suit. Do you think I'd look good in the same thing?
Mejare has a thing for bodysuits, you know...I wonder if I should get myself one. There's just no tease to it, you know?
Seriously, slow down. Feeling self-conscious next to me?
Listen---I know I have this effect on women, but there's no reason to be this jealous.
Just rushing to outdo me, huh? Sorry, but you're still a little frumpy by comparison.
Feeling inadequate? You should be proud of your body---don't fret about how I'm much more beautiful.
Come on. Throwing off all your clothes like this reeks of desperation next to a goddess such as myself.
Is that your own special die, or does it just work for anyone? ...Can I try?
So if I rolled that thing, could it give me a whole new outfit? I mean, I do love my dress, but hey.
Now I'm starting to get curious about that die of yours. Would it work if I rolled it?
Does that die work solely for you? What if I just snatched it like the pirate I am?
But don't worry about all that! Let's see what outfit's next, cutie!
Another vortex, another wonderful piece of fashion to ogle. I'm so lucky!
You call yourself the lucky one, but I came here hoping to see some cool fashion choices.
Simply magical. My luck that I'd meet you, not these vortices. Things just work out for me!
You always have such a hard time admitting that things just went sour for you. It's always your fault, isn't it?
You're not going to insist there's some kind of strategy to this "throw away four cards" business, are you?
I guess fortune just smiles on the beautiful.
Yeah, folks, it's all one piece. I said she didn't wear much...but isn't it sexier that way?
And there it goes. But what a dazzling move, zipping it all down in one stroke!
Like a beautiful butterfly emerging from her cocoon. And all at once, too!
I wonder if I can make my dress come off all at once like that...it's bold and sexy.
Avert your eyes, ladies---a whole lot of lovely Mejarian skin is about to hit them all at once.
Prepare yourselves, mortals---that bodysuit's all one piece. She's down to underwear already!
Try not to lose control of yourselves. Meia's about to drop that whole suit in one sexy little move!
Everyone got their pacemakers primed? That suit's one piece, so you're about to get an eyeful of Meia's figure.
Ever seen a woman with abs? Ever seen a Mejarian with abs? You're about to.
As you can see, folks, I was a real sweetheart bringing Meia here. That suit's all one piece!
Meia here is good at cards, but she doesn't have the wardrobe to last around here. Down to underwear already!
Aren't I great bringing Meia here? Look how little she wears. Not that that bodysuit left anything to the imagination.
Meia barely wears anything, as you can see. I think she secretly likes the hungry looks the other pilots give her.

scene.directive:
{b}WARNING:
This epilogue is legacy content featuring older art.
A new, expanded version is in the works!{!reset}
Hel-loooo!
Come on inside!
I've been waiting for you, ~name~...
...And so has my girlfriend, Barnette Orangello. Don't try to rhyme that.
This is the man, Jura? He doesn't look all that special to me.
Oh, but he's got that special something I've been looking for...
You mean, he's handsome?
Yes.
Now then, ~name~, did you enjoy your little tour of the Nirvana?
She's a magnificent ship. And I picked out the name myself...
...The commander picked out the name.
...And everyone loved it!
You're a lucky man, you know.
After some careful consideration, I've decided you're going the be the man-Oma of my child!
...Oh, right, you don't know what that means. What's your Earth word for it?
Oh, right. Father!
Don't worry, I'm not going to make you raise her.
I wouldn't trust a man around something that delicate anyway...besides me.
See, Mejare is nothing but women. If I have a baby with a man, it'll propel me straight into Mejarian superstardom!
So I need your seed to give me that beautiful child. And I know a fun way to do that!
Now, I'd never be so cruel as to do this behind my darling's back.
Nor would I force her to just sit here and watch you ravish me.
So she'll be joining in on our fun tonight! Men are into that, right?
...I don't know about this, Jura.
Oh, come on, it'll be fun!
Earth women must keep men around for a reason.
No, I mean...you know.
It's just one baby...just to make me famous. Don't you want your darling to get the fame she deserves?
Besides...the next one will be ours.
Wha---I---we're starting a family now?
That's how much I love you.
Listen up, ~name~! Time is of the essence.
Normally I'd opt for some foreplay, but you've got a job to do, and it's making both of us happy.
Especially Barnette over here. She's a real saint for letting me do this, after all.
Don't you dare---do anything funny to her. I have a gun collection.
Such a sweetheart.
Ah, there's the man of the hour!
And he's standing at attention for us. What a gentleman!
I'm still not sold on these tube-things...
That's OK. He doesn't need to sell it to us. We're pirates...
So we take whatever we want.
Agh!
Mmm!
Oh, yes!
That's it, ~name~! Give it to me!
S-so deep inside...men are so beastly!
Oh, I'm overwhelmed! These tubes---they're fantastic!
...I'm not feeling very involved.
Uh...sorry.
Your seed takes more effort to coax out than I thought it would, ~name~.
Luckily, I have some help this evening...
I can't believe this...fighting alongside men is bad enough, but sleeping with them?
Oh, shut up, you're having fun.
These tubes are such a blast to play with! Men are like living, breathing sex toys.
Don't say I never did anything for you, Jura.
What, indulge your curiosity about our alien friends along with me?
Our bodies cry out for these things...
Ooh, I just remembered what I wanted to try!
I saw this paizuri thing in a book and absolutely fell in love with the idea!
Tell me, ~name~, how does it feel to be between the loveliest set of breasts in the galaxy?
Those poor flat-chested Earth girls could never make this happen for you...
Eek!
O-oh, this must be your seed!
Well, this is wasteful. Don't you have to cum inside me to get me pregnant?
I can't believe Earth women have any children at all when it's this messy.
We Mejarians just head down to the nice doctor and ask her to splice our eggs together.
Come here, Barnette...my darling.
This is the taste of a man...
Shame on you for wasting precious seed like that, ~name~.
A-are you really...do I have to do it? It's so weird-looking...
I know you've got some kind of refractive period, or whatever it's called...
So sit tight while I do a lover's duty. And once you're ready again...
I think Barnette deserves her turn.
Some time later...
Agh! N-ngh! T-this thing---
Incredible, isn't it? So fleshy and turgid...
I knew you two would warm up to each other.
It---it actually does feel good...
I told you!
...Go faster.
Feels so warm---I don't---
Wait a second...
Did you just...?
Ohhh, you idiot!
You're supposed to be getting me pregnant!
J-Jura...did he---?
Is it really so hard to shoot that stuff where you're supposed to for once?
I-inside...me?
I swear! You try to do something nice, and people just disappoint you.
Well, Mr. Earth-man, I hope you're proud of yourself.
You've managed to waste every drop of seed you spurted out, and thus wasted my evening in the process.
I always get what I want. One way or another, some of that stuff is ending up inside me...
I don't care how long it takes!

The Nirvana...
Far in the future.
Why, hello there, ~name~!

Just be glad you're not a man, or things would've been much uglier.

And you're not trying to get me out of my dress this time!
But I'm forgiving, and you're gorgeous, especially for an Earth girl.
So let's sit down and get to know each other as the food comes out.

~name~, this is my lovely girlfriend I was going on about---Barnette Orangello!
Hello, ~name~. Nice to meet an Earth girl who's not trying to kill us.
Now, I know Barnette's not quite as tall or voluptuous as I am, but she's just so adorably cute!
Not to mention a skilled pilot---and a lovely cook!
It isn't much, but I used what ingredients we had.
Nonsense! I love it when we can have some warm, savory stew and cuddle up together.
Now...where were we?
So, ~name~, you're a smart girl.
Have you guessed why I, the crown jewel of Mejare, would invite you all the way here?
Well, you see, Mejare is a planet solely of women, as I've said.
But in time, with this crew in the public eye...it'll start to warm up to men.
I may be a lowly pirate at the moment, but if I become the first Mejarian to have a baby with a man, I'll be a superstar!
A celebrity! Maybe even a model! Everyone will admire my beauty---you're a woman, you understand.
But there's one problem.
I can't seduce a man for the life of me!
I approach them, I flirt with them, I have Barnette make them delicious food---all they do is run and hide!
It's not my fault---I didn't grow up around any!
